Reports and communication with my health care team is an important part of every day living with diabetes.

title: Whaaaatttt the .....
body: I am newly diagnosed and I’m looking for an app to use so I download your app. The first thing that I see is a pizza for a snack. Diabetics shouldn’t have pizza!!! Then I notice it’s a hamburger and a bowl of noodles As a graphic. What the heck! I feel it is very insensitive to use food graphics that diabetics should be avoiding. A snack could be a slice/wedge of cheese. Lunch could be a salad. Breakfast should be ham and eggs and dinner could be a fish. Honestly I don’t know if I will use your app just because there is a pizza assaulting me visually!!
response: Hi there, sorry to hear that you feel this way! Please reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com and we will be more than happy to explain why we are using specific icons.

title: Fantastic. Encouraging.
body: I’m the guy that stops checking his BG because I just hate doing it.

title: Lacking one thing!
body: I’ve been using this app for years and I really like it. It would be perfect if the developers could add a carb counter of basic food items that would enable us to look up foods quickly. There are a million apps out there that have this but most of them are geared towards keto dieters and really not applicable to PWD.

title: Very useful!
body: I have been using my sugar for several months now and it is very user-friendly! I like that it has a place for my blood sugar but also I can add several other categories like weight and blood pressure and numerous other things that anyone who is watching their health needs to keep track of.

title: Love this app!
body: Thank you to the developers for responding to my previous comment about the alarm.  They are awesome and so is this app!
response: Hi, thanks for your review! I am sorry about that. Please send a message to support@mysugr.com, then we can have a look at it :)

title: More than just a tracker
body: I’m very new to diabetes and I’ve been blown away by the support and resource that MySugr has provided.  I have a ton to learn but i feel like I’ve found a partner for the road ahead and it seems a little less daunting because of the team behind this great app.  Thanks!
response: Thank you for the positive review! Keep taming that pesky diabetes monster!!!

title: Great app!
body: I didn't think I was going to like this app when I first got it. I was wrong. The features are great and it is easy to use. Even the free version is quite useful for tracking blood glucose and carb intake. The paid app makes a great app even better. Taming the monster adds a fun element as well.
response: We love hearing that people are having fun with the app :) Thanks a ton for the awesome review!!

title: Good but still needs work.
body: As a family practioner with IDDM, i would like to make the following suggestions.
response: Hi! Wow, thank you so much for the review and the great suggestions. We will definitely take these into consideration as we are constantly working on improving our app. I will hand them off to the right people so we can figure out how/if they can be implemented.

title: Great product!
body: I wanted a place to log my BG and my meals.  When I started MySugr I discovered that they have challenges to help you stay within range, and encourage you to exercise.  Very happy with this!  Looking forward to being able to bring the data to my doctor.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear you have been happy with our app :)

title: Mysugar review
body: This app does not require to be hooked up to a constant glucose monitoring system which makes it easy for people without that device to log and keep track of glucose throughout the day. The app also accounts for other factors such as exercise, emotions, etc.

title: Finally, I can take control!
body: I love this app!  For the first time since I was diagnosed have I been eager to monitor my blood sugar several times a day. Knowing how my A1C is progressing is what sold me on this app. This app allows me to be in control and not feel helpless and lost. Worth the cost for the full spectrum of the app!

title: Great app for newly diagnosed individuals!
body: Recently diagnosed type 2 and this app helped me get my sugar under control quickly.  Love the auto import from my Accumate Guide Me.

title: Super App!
body: My doctor recommended this app for tracking my gestational diabetes. It’s easy and convenient and overall very helpful. I wish it would allow for different ranges for fasting and after meals, but maybe it does and I just haven’t figured it out yet.
response: Thanks for the awesome review! We're so happy to hear that you're enjoying the app and that it's helping you through your gestational diabetes :)

title: Works good
body: Easy to use once you learn the inputs It’s was different than other apps I was using Now only have to use this one app to do all the tracking including A1C
response: Thank you so much for your feedback and suggestions!

title: User friendly!!
body: Really love this app. It is so user friendly and allows for multiple users to remotely track results (including our clinic) Would love for it to have a carb calculator included ie so it can automatically enter the carbs for 1 cup of rice etc. other than that it is the best app out there!!
response: Thanks for the great review and feedback!! We love hearing from our users and are always making improvements. The idea for a carb calculator is a great suggestion :)

title: Amazing Tool for Diabetes!
body: After seriously out of control blood sugar and 2 hospital stays, this app has helped oh so much! For the first time in close to 10 years my blood sugar is under control. Can’t thank the team enough for developing this. It is very user friendly and even fun.
response: We're so happy to hear you're getting your blood sugars back on track and that you're safe and sound after the hospital. Thank you so much for the awesome review! We love hearing success stories like yours :)

title: A place to keep all my data.
body: Just started using about 2 months ago but I find I can keep all my data in here.  Easy to use.  There are probably more features of the app I could learn about.  No glitches, works well.  And the little guy’s giggles make me smile.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We love being able to keep all our data in one place. We are glad the little monster makes you laugh, it makes us laugh as well!

title: Data love
body: I’m obsessed with data gathering when it comes to my diabetes! Sugr helps me to keep track of things I can only keep track of by writing them down and that doesn’t help alagaesia6750me with actual long term graphs to let me make informed changes.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are glad to hear you love data gathering and that our app has been working well for you.

title: Easy App to use
body: I like the fact that data in this app copies to the Health App on the IPhone.  This app is fun to use.  I do wish they would add a few more times to the selections, like waking.  I do like that the icon is animated and alerts you to values outside the norm.  I know the values, but it makes it fun to keep a log.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and the great feedback! We are glad to have made your experience logging fun and we will definitely keep your ideas in mind as we are constantly working on improving our app and making it the best it can be.

title: Great app!
body: I love this app, the logging and tag features are great. I wish there was a way to set a reminder at the same times every day, vs a timer to check again after a logged event. I can’t wait for the bolus calculator to be available in the US as well.

title: Great but
body: This app is great and has helped me reduce my A1c from over 8 to 5.9 by making more conscious of my blood sugar throughout the day. However, there is now way to know how much carbs you are taking in without using another app. Having the ability to calculate your meal carbs and track in one app would make this app a no brainer

title: Good Window into my Diabetes Management
body: Testing with the details; meals, medications, activities, and commentary, provides more into factors and variables of why my test results are good, bad or indifferent... the price to have “cloud” access, graphing, and additional features are too expensive... Otherwise, I would recommend the mobile application.

title: Great Diabetes Tracking tool
body: I just began using MySugr after using a different App for many years.  I wish I would have changed sooner.  It has options to track not just blood sugar levels, but moods, carb intake and a notes section.  I recommend this app.

title: Still learning
body: I really like this app, however it could do with a link or something to add in foods for the freebie section so it is easier to figure out the carbs than having to use a separate app to figure the carbs out and then put it in.

title: Loving this machine
body: I love this app.  It makes it so simple to email my Dr my sugars especially if I forget to take my machine to my appt.
response: Thanks so much for the great review! Unfortunately the micro usb connection only provides data transfer. Batteries are replaceable in the meter and you can find them at your local drugstore. If you have any further questions or concerns please feel free to reach out to our awesome customer support team support@mysugr.com and they'll get back to you in no time :)

title: Great App
body: I love this app. It’s great and relatively easy to use. I would like to see FitBit integration as well as somewhere to put body temperature. Also, the little icons are fun but don’t really help if you can only see 1 imagine in the summary. I would love to see a section purely dedicated to how you feel instead of it being an icon mixed with other icons.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We appreciate the feedback and it will be passed on as we're always looking to improve :)

title: MySugr
body: Using for a while now. The more you use this journal, the more beneficial the results for you and your blood sugar levels. Helps with discipline because you know very specifically what an evening snack will do to your morning blood sugar levels. I call this the good angel on my shoulder app!!

title: Absolute favorite glucose app
body: I’m managing both my son & I both have T1D. This app is user friendly. Managing diabetes with app has much easier. Just wish I could manage more profiles than 1. I need a family option. Some of us are managing family members, young & old.

title: Look forward to entering my Glucose readings
body: I enjoy using the app to easily see the trend in my glucose tests through the day and week. I enjoy the cute giggle when my numbers are on target. Thank you. This helps this process of checking blood sugar enjoyable and easy to track.

title: Keeps track of testing
body: Much better than writing down all the info but it’s a little confusing & every thing is metric. Sometimes they don’t have the icon you need for a description. Like I said,  it’s a little confusing.
response: Hi! thank you for the positive review. We apologize for the confusion you are experiencing! If you have specific questions please feel free to reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com.

title: WSimpkins24
body: Been using it for 1-1/2 months. Easy to use. Especially with the Bluetooth feature. Also have a different tester at work and can manually enter information while at work. Gives instant average for the day, and estimated A1c which is nice.

title: I share with doctor
body: She has the ID and password which allows her to see how he is doing. The pump is great, but it doesn’t let us give the doctor notes. This app allows us to provide notes on what is happening and the decisions we are making.

title: Excellent app for keeping track of sugar
body: I have found this app to be very useful to keep track of my sugar, meals, etc. My only suggestion would be to add support for other glucose test devices. As of now it only supports AccuChek, I would like to see it support others like OneTouch.

title: Best diabetes management app!
body: This app really helps me manage my sugars and even my diet. I log all my foods and see what I really intake and how it affects my sugars. I never used any app with activity or food logs until this one. I highly recommend it for getting yourself on the right track.

title: THIS is the app you need to download.
body: When my 3 year old was diagnosed with T1 Diabetes, I downloaded pretty much every app in the App Store. This is the one that’s still on my phone.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review and we're so happy to hear that mySugr is helping! Hang in there and keep taming that pesky diabetes monster :)

title: Not just me but, my family Thank You!
body: I already see positive results and I feel better, too! Thank you for creating a user-friendly, manageable, and securely private way to record glucose related information in an entertainingly creative way.
response: Thanks for the positive review!!

title: Works well. Very helpful.
body: I am new to diabetes and trying to manage down from my surprise A1C of 8.3 by changing my lifestyle.  I like this app because it gives me a place to record all my blood glucose results, my food and my movement.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been helpful for you. Keep an eye out on our newest integrations we are always working on releasing new options for our users!

title: Awesome App
body: I recently was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes searched for an app that would help track my blood glucose in relation to what I eat. This app does that better than any of the other apps I found. This app is helping me map out a plan to stabilize my blood glucose levels. Thanks mySugr. You app is Awesome.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad you found us and that our app has been useful for you. Keep fighting and we've got your back!

title: Great app ~ but...
body: I’ve been using the app for about 2 months now & really love all the features, but... I would like to avail myself of some of the more advanced features but I don’t need supplies. My diabetes supplies are provided free through my health insurance. For instance, I’d love to be able to download my numbers but I can’t unless I upgrade. Since my supplies are already free, it would be a waste of my money.
response: Thank you for the positive review! We think Burt is a great monster name! We love how flexible the app is as well and we are glad it works well with your lifestyle :)

title: This app is a game changer
body: This is by far the best app for tracking numbers. I downloaded many before this and the reports that print off or send to doctor are an easy way to communicate with medical team. I can’t recommend this app enough!

title: Unable to access the app
body: I  downloaded this app several years ago and then deleted it after failing to utilize it. I downloaded it again today but realized I had forgotten the password. The app states to contact you but fails to provide any info or link to do so. I tried several old passwords in an effort to login without success then deleted the app. I honestly don’t know how you have a five star rating when such a simple thing as resetting a password isn’t possible.
response: We are so sorry about that! We'd love to help you, can you write to us at support@mysugr.com and we can assist you in regaining access to your account, no problem!

title: i really like this app. It keeps me in check.
body: i really like this app. It keeps me in check with Daily Logs with Reminds, what more can you ask. With Monthly Payments comes out automatically don’t have to worry, did i pay this month with apple pay

title: Decent App - Good Design - Missing key functions!!
body: Overall, I like the design of this App. It’s easy to use and understand but disappointing that the format of reports is limited to Pro accounts. I also really wish this had a bolus calculator — both correction & food bolus! I have to leave the app to calculate that using my correction factor & bolus ratio and come back to note it down. Waste of time, IMO!

title: Great app
body: I love this app. Since I learnt my 16 months old child is type-1 diabetic, I have been using this app to keep track of his insulin and carb intake. Also have it connected to AccuCheck glucose meter and it just works.

title: Awful battery drain
body: Warning: even with Background App Refresh off, and Location set to Only While Using, this app is doing something that uses a hugely disproportionate amount of battery. Battery Usage (check on your own phone in settings) shows it’s using a disturbing 24% from “background activity,” far greater than any other app. Something is not right. Had no choice but to delete.
response: Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear about this. This doesn't sound like a normal problem with our app. Please contact our support team support@mysugr.com and they can figure out why this is happening. We'll get you back to being a Monster Tamer in no time!

title: MuSugr Experience
body: I like this app because it allows me to record my daily glucose numbers keeping me diligent in taking my sugar each day. The app is easy to download and use. While it may not be the best app available I highly recommend it to one and all.
response: Thanks for the positive review!!

title: Easy to use
body: This app is very straightforward and easy to use. I appreciate the intuitiveness and capabilities that allow you to put in blood sugar, carbohydrate count and insulin dosage quickly and without having to open separate windows-it’s all on one page.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We love having everything in one easy to manage place and we are glad you do too!

title: Never any complaints
body: Thank you to the devs. You are changing lives. The free aspect of the app is as good as the paid. I get to keep track of my readings and everything is so easy to navigate. I don’t do reviews but I had to do this for you guys. Thanks for being awesomeee!
response: We're so glad to hear you found something that works for you and our app has been so helpful.

title: Easy to use
body: I love how easy it is to use. I have tried several other apps, this is the best on by far. I recommend it to anyone who is looking for an easy convenient way to keep track of their sugar levels and their insulin.

title: Better management of diabetes
body: I love this app because it helps me to have a  discipline with kinds and amount of food that I eat to have a better blood sugar level. I can learn how my body works and have a control of my diabetes.  This is worth to try!

title: Great app
body: I use to use a different app until my doctor said this one might help me more. So I tried it and it works fabulous!!!! I would totally recommend this to anyone. The only thing is I wish I could use my Apple Watch to do stuff on the app too.

title: Making it happen
body: I can record my weight and every glucose reading and the type of reading... I couldn’t break 137... today I was 110. I’m pairing this with Nourishly and ihealth and I’m also down 1.6 lbs in my first week. No diet pills. Just making better choices. Do it.

title: Great App!
body: After trying a couple of other apps that limited how you track carbs or didn't include exercise, I tried mySugr and I really like it. It may be targeted to younger users, but I'm new at this and I appreciate the simplicity and encouragement, yet it has everything I need.
response: Thanks for the positive review! :)

title: Really love this using this app
body: It’s fun to use. And easy! Helps me keep track of my bs and carbs. I always recommend this app to fellow diabetics because it is the easiest app to use to keep track of my bs readings. I tried all the others and they were tedious. I liked this app the best.
response: Thank you for the great review!!

title: Amazing!
body: I cannot thank Scott & his team of developers for the continued expansion of this app.  It's so nice to have a simple layout packed with information to improve problems in managing type 1 diabetes.  My doctor was impressed and know asks to see my reports rather than my pumps!   Great job team. 💖💖
response: Awesome!! We appreciate the positive review :) Keep that pesky diabetes monster tamed!

title: Great app!
body: I’ve used several different apps for tracking my vitals, and this by far is my favorite for diabetes measurements. Most apps I quickly request additional features, but so far nothing that I can find needs to be improved in this app!
response: Thanks for the positive review! Feel free to send suggestions as we're always looking to improve :)

title: Pro version worth every penny
body: This is a great logbook app. It's easy to use, even fun. Pro version allows for easy export of reports, an invaluable time saver for record keeping and sharing with doctors. I've downloaded lots of other logbook apps, and this is the best by a long shot.
response: Thanks so much for the great review! We love how easy it is to share information with the doctor too :)

title: Changed my life
body: This app really has made it so much easier to keep track of all my meals and blood sugars. It has really helped me keep better control since it is all in one place. I also enjoy the a sense of humor from the emails- thank you!!
response: We love how easy it is to keep track of everything too!! Thanks for the great review and feedback...we try to have a sense of humor :)

title: Amazing App!
body: After being diagnosed, it’s never an easy thing. So, apps like a log book, strips, and amazing customer support and coaches — really hard to beat. This app has really helped me to take better control over something that is a constant battle.
response: Hi! Wow, thank you so much for the positive review and for sharing your story. We are so glad our app has been helpful for you so far and we hope it continues to help you in the future. Keep up the great work and we've got your back!

title: Fun, but I am struggling to link CGM
body: Such awesome

title: The Best Diabetic App I Have Found
body: I love this app. The Diabetic Monster makes humorous sounds, you can see a graph of your blood sugars and it gives you your A1C.

title: So Far so Good
body: I’ve been using that app for over a year and the only real issue that I have is that I have to continue to hear that device to my phone. I am checking to see if it is a issue with your software or y’all just not compatible enough with my particular iPhones.

title: It’s a great tool needs more improvement
body: The app is very helpful logging in my blood sugar, blood pressure and the notes. It is going to be very helpful if all those data can be transferred to a pdf file, all the notes that we put in not just the blood sugar so it is easier for me and my doctor to monitor.

title: Updates
body: I’ve used this app for years because it was the most reliable on the market. However, recent changes have made it a lot more frustrating. I would really appreciate a way to either view the graph on another page or get rid of it. It’s making my app a lot harder to use & is frustrating enough where I’ve started looking for another one.

title: Simple to use app for insulin dependent tracking
body: This is a very simple to use app that allows me to track my blood sugars, carb intake and insulin use. I only use the activity level tracking for unusually strenuous exercise or work. Easy to share tracked information with physician.
response: Thanks for the great review :)

title: Really helps in tracking!
body: My son was just diagnosed a month ago and, with all the information we’re supposed to be monitoring, this app is so helpful! Thank you for such an easy to use app. He really likes the little monster’s animation and moods, too.
response: Thank you so much for the great review!! We're so happy to hear that the app is helping you and your family and that your son is enjoying the monster :)

title: Helpful
body: I am happy to have found this app.  It helps me keep my blood sugar results in one place.  I have found it useful when I go to the doctor because I can now just hand her my phone and she can scroll thru the results.  Thank you.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear you have found this app useful for yourself and your doctor.

title: Easiest to use
body: I sampled several apps to track blood sugar. This was by far the easiest to use and seems very thorough. It’s easy to see the progression of blood sugar and it’s easy to report to your doctor. I’m just glad I could turn off the monster’s sound. Lol
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been helpful for you.

title: This app helps !
body: I have struggled trying to keep track of my blood sugar.  Having this app has definitely made a difference in keeping better track, so I appreciate being able to use it !

title: A week in and I’m hooked
body: I’ve been a faithful food and glucose logger for years, but this app makes it fun! Bonus, I’m already seeing positive change after a week! Looking forward to making my numbers even better.

title: #Besttoolever
body: This APP was among a recommended list of useful tools to control and monitor BG levels. It’s convenient, user friendly, and has many helpful features. Many tools of this kind contain a lot of useless dribble and psychobabble.... this does not. I highly recommended.

title: Easy to use
body: I’m new to tracking my blood (prediabetes) and this is incredibly simple to figure out and use. My only complaint is the food types are REALLY bare. Just because I may have had a higher carb meal doesn’t mean it was potato ...

title: Great app for newly diagnosed diabetics
body: I am a newly diagnosed diabetic and this app is excellent for tracking my blood sugar levels, color coding them green when the number is within a safe zone, yellow when the number is slightly elevated and red when the level is too high. Love this app.

title: GREAT APP
body: This app has helped me along my journey to becoming a podder!! just 2 more months of logging and i will be there! it has everything and anything you need to become better at managing diabetes (i have type 1)  only one downside ( i measure ketones using mg/dl but the app only has mmol

title: Wish I had found this sooner!
body: This app has made it so much easier to keep track of everything all in one place. Having my BG readings, meals, and exercise all together makes it much more likely that I’ll record them all.
response: Thanks so much for the positive review!

title: Almost perfect
body: Would be perfect, if I could see the screen better. My eyes aren’t all that bad, but many diabetics have vision problems. The muted colors and small print are the problem. Even the printed report is hard to read.
response: Thank you for the positive review and feedback!! That's a great idea as many diabetics do suffer from eye problems. I'm happy to pass your feedback on to our developers. Many Thanks :)

title: Fantastic
body: I’ve tried just about all of the other blood glucose apps and they don’t even come close to this one.  Easy to use.  All of your data can be entered easily.  The display is colorful and perfectly designed.  Try it!

title: Great but
body: Great app but I would like to see you scan the food from the barcode and have it inputed that way you’re paying $10 a month in what you get for $10 a month I haven’t figured out yet, it’s a good tracking tool but I don’t feel it’s worth the $10 a month. Would also be able to share data with clinicians

title: User friendly
body: I have been diabetic for 12 years now and using this app has helped me keep track of my blood sugars and lower my A1c for the first time.  Thanks for making it user friendly and fun to use.  Enjoy your round of “Diet Coke” you deserve it!

title: The best one
body: I downloaded multiple apps to try out... This is the best one. The fun noises and character makes this app fun for my daughter. I live how everything lines up on the screen & easy to enter. Praying that they come out with an Apple Watch version!!

title: Motivates me to take my tests & log in activities
body: The reactions of the diabetes monster motivates me to take my tests. By doing this, I am more aware of my sugar readings and able to take action when the readings are either too high or too low. Thank you, mySugr for this very useful app.

title: New Diabetic
body: Having found out a few month’s ago that I have type 2 Diabetes this app makes it so easy to keep track of my sugar levels. I am grateful for the team having all this info built in thank you!

title: Good App
body: The app is good and sound. Wish that some of the features that are tied to the upgrade were actually part of the free side. I am a disabled vet that gets his meds and supplies through the VA. Some of the other items that I wish I had access to was being able to send my info to my VA team .

title: Good app
body: I really like using this app. Had to find a replacement for the app I was using because my old app was no longer active. The only thing I have an issue with is being able to switch the weight from kg to pounds.

title: Saving my life!
body: This app has come in handy in more ways then you know, it has been instrumental in reminding me to check my sugars and to keep a log. I have been diabetic for years and never could keep track well now I can. Thanks
response: Wow! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so happy to hear our app has been so instrumental in your diabetes management. Keep up the good work!

title: Keeping up
body: The my sugar app helps me keep an accurate account of my sugar. I look at my phone and I am reminded to take my insulin, check my sugar and keep track. Something that rarely use to do until I started using the my sugar!  Excellent app!

title: Great App for Beginners!
body: I am newly (diagnosed) diabetic. This app really helped me track my days and nights. Worth it in my opinion. I have not purchased the full version but I plan to start a partial membership soon to get access to the challenges. That’s how I stay motivated!

title: Excellent Way to Track
body: I have referred this app to family and friends! Easy to use and great way to log your daily activities, food & medications. The report was great way to print and take to my doctor. They were impressed on this app!

title: Good app
body: Nice free app for tracking blood sugars. Worth trying. I turned off the sounds in settings as they tend to annoy me—even the happy ones since I would have to hear them every time i log and that’s 3 times a day for me. It won’t give you an estimated A1C unless you log 3 times a day for full week.

title: Excellent Tool!
body: Easy/simple way to track my glucose and Insulin injections. My Endo loves the reports that you can create!! For Apple iOS users, syncs immediately with Apple Health, so all of your information is in one place. Best App I’ve used since having to track.

title: My Suger
body: Love all the data information, easy use, great graphics, and I love the easy access. I always forget, my passwords. Love the app, thanks!

title: Love my monster
body: This app has been a big help for me!  I use it to track my daily carbs and my A1C.  Like any tool, it’s only useful if you use it correctly.  So entering your info is key.  My favorite part of the app is the monster!  I love his feedback!  His noises just crack me up.

title: Very Cool App!
body: I've been using this app since April of 2020 and it has been great!  I like the quirky little challenges that it offers.  Definitely keeps me on target and encourages me to keep up with good health!  I am getting ready to switch to Dexcom so I’m gonna miss it kinda

title: Best app ever!
body: I love this app because I can add info but without always having to put in blood sugar. Sometimes I just want to record information but not my blood sugar number every single time. And I can arrange stuff around on the app. It’s the best!

title: love this app
body: With this app I was able to get my sons A1C down to 6.5%. This app is fantastic, convenient & so easy to use. Lovely layout, design, cute icons, silly sound effects which make diabetes feel like not such a sad disease. It’s motivating to see the numbers on the chart. I love this app.
response: Thanks for the positive review! We love hearing that mySugr can help adults as well as kiddos :)

title: Does what I want it to do.
body: I keep track of sugar and BP.  Easy interface to enter numbers.  Shares with Apple health. Does everything I want it to.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review and feedback! That's a great suggestion and will be passed on to our developers...we're always looking to improve :)

title: Execellent For Those With Any Diabetes Case
body: I as diagnosed with type 1.5 diabetes. Late onset type 1 diabetes.. This app helped me to get the right dosages down, have a new form to bring to doctor to go over. Plus I like to see how close there average a1c calculation adds up to blood work.  GREAT APP AND I WOULD RECOMMEND!!!
response: Thank you for the excellent review and recommendations!! Being able to easily share information with the doctor makes therapy decisions so much easier :)

title: Great Tracker
body: I don’t use all the features but tracking my blood sugar has always been a problem in books. Now that I can do it in my phone it’s great and sad to see the roller coaster of blood sugars. “You can’t change what you don’t track” Eric Wong
response: Thanks for the positive review!! Tracking makes so much difference in seeing what can be changed and improved upon :)

title: Great app
body: I am new to diabetes and took a chance on this app. I haven’t tried others yet but this was a great start in helping my health. I never imagined ‘this would happen to me, but it did. I’m glad I stumbled upon this app, it is user friendly and I plan to learn more to use it to help my health. ‘‘This can be a five star app soon!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and for sharing your story. We are so happy you found us and that our app has been useful for you. Keep up the good work and we've got your back!

title: 2 years in
body: After 2 years we are still using this app to monitor our daughter. My ex and I can both see what our kid has eaten and how much insulin she has taken. It’s really good and I recommend it as a log book for all diabetics.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so happy to hear our app has been so useful for you and your family.

title: Keeps track of my readings
body: I just use it as a record of my daily readings. It works well for that. I don’t know about the other features. I keep the sound off. The monster sound is annoying.
response: Hi! We are glad to hear you have found a way to make the app work for you!

title: Excellent app
body: My Doctor was amazed when he first reviewed the reports. Log everything and I can see where to make adjustments. Without this app I would be lost. Only complaint is the deviation listed is not always accurate.

title: Nice App
body: My mentor is not one of the ones that can be synced via an app but this still is a very nice app for me to log my numbers into everyday. I can just open the app instead of going through all these hoops to get history from my monitor.

title: Life saver
body: I am newly diagnosed and was very overwhelmed at first. This app along with the accu check guide has essentially made the entire process simple, but in some ways fun. I know that’s weird to say. But for the first time since I was diagnosed, I feel in control. Thank you.
response: Thanks for the great review!! You are doing great taming those monsters!

title: Easy, convenient way to track Type 1
body: As a newly diagnosed type 1 diabetic, this has been a lot to adjust to. My Sugr makes keeping track of all my numbers so much easier. I couldn't imagine my day to day without it!
response: We're so glad mySugr is helping you manage! Thanks so much for the positive review :)

title: Love this app!
body: Makes it really easy to log my glucose info and more. I am finally in my target range and have been for three weeks, thanks to mySugr.  First time in years!  Try it, you will like it too, and I love the little monster too! Makes logging fun!
response: Thanks so much for the positive review! We love hearing that mySugr is helping :)

title: Easy to use.
body: I like this app because it’s easy to use and you can record as much or as little as you want. However, sometimes the “monster” is a little annoying! 😁

title: Very helpful for parents tracking a diabetic child
body: My wife and I are learning to care for a newly-diagnosed type one diabetic and this app has been a godsend. Very helpful in charting everything you need to know and definitely worth adding the annual fee.
response: Thanks for the great review!! We are happy to hear mySugr is helping you and your family :)

title: Good App, but more involved than I need.
body: All I wanted was a way to keep track of my morning blood sugars and maybe look at a few

title: Love this app!
body: My daughter was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes a little over a month ago. I love how the My Sugr app lets me see patterns in her blood sugars/insulin doses  easily as well as any notes I wrote . My daughter (6) loves the noises the monster makes when the bg numbers are transferred to the app!

title: Blood sugar
body: Keeps my daily levels close to me so I can show my doctor. I wish this site could average my daily levels for me because I only have an order to check mine daily. Otherwise love the site

title: Track everything in one app!
body: A convenient way of tracking everything a diabetic keeps track of, type one or two, with a UI that can keep a youngster’s interest in staying healthy.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been useful!

title: I love it. My endo, not so much
body: I love the MySugr app and use it religiously to input data about carbs, insulin, foods, activities, etc. I also loves how it feeds and takes data from the Health app. My gym’s app tracks my workouts, so that gets fed to MySugr. What I wish is if this team would talk more to endocrinologists. My endo really doesn’t like the MySugr report.

title: Keeps dropping tags and notes
body: I’ve contacted support twice to report that tags and notes are not showing up in the reports. This means I have to log my notes and tags twice to send to my doctor. Please get this cleaned up so that the app consistently documents everything and can report out on it. Having to track everything eaten and every glucose test is hard enough - losing my data is making it even harder.
response: Thank you for reporting this! It looks like we had an issue with this on an older version, but should have been resolved with the update. Can you please reach back out to our support team? We'd love to help!

title: Great!
body: MySugr is very helpful in looking at your BS and insulin data easily, I really love the calculator! All you have to do is put in your correction factors and carb to insulin ratios and it does the work for you! I love that at certain times if they day your ratios can be adjusted, that is a great feature. I only wish it was not $2.99 a month 😕
response: Thanks for the great review! We love to hear that mySugr is helping :)

title: Helps me track my progress and see patterns.
body: Back to using the app after a lapse.  It really helps me keep track of my BG and activity.  Even small improvements are encouraging.  It helped uncover a patter I’d suspected and was able to show my doctor.
response: We're so happy to hear that mySugr is helping! Thanks so much for the positive review :)

title: Great app!
body: I’ve tried out a few apps to track my numbers and this is by far the best. It’s very user friendly and it makes it easy to track both my blood glucose numbers and my carbs. Would recommend.
response: Thanks for the positive review!

title: Amazing app!
body: My child was just diagnosed last week with t1D.  This app has been a blessing with keeping logs of the carbs she eats along with her blood sugar levels and insulin dosage.  It also estimates your hba1c level too.  Definitely a must have for those that have diabetes.
response: A new diagnosis can be scary, but it sounds like you're taking all the right steps. Thank you so much for the awesome review and please feel free to reach out to our awesome customer support team support@mysugr.com and they should be able to help you with any problems you're having with the app :) Hang in there and remember there's support out there!!

title: Well organized
body: I love the tracking and organization of the app. The detail helps me keep track of what Volos was dosed for food verses what was dosed for corrections. I also like the section for my pills so I can keep track of everything all in one spot.

title: Get this App!
body: It really helps me monitor what I’m eating and the buttons to add are perfect. This way you can look back and say yes I did house work, or worked out, or drank and that gives me this change in BSL’s. Very precise thank you for making this App.

title: User Friendly!
body: I’ve been Type 1 for almost 20 years and this is the first blood sugar log or app that actually works for me. It takes no time to enter data, and it’s easy for me to see and analyze patterns. Well done!

title: Only lacking one major feature
body: I wish that you could set separate targets for fasting levels and post-meal levels. Otherwise it is very helpful to looks at the trends and log the details. Having a report in pdf is also a nice feature.

title: Great for my T1D 10yo!
body: We enjoy the antics of Mr Beastly, our monster, and the feedback he gives as we enter our stats. It makes it a little fun!

title: Great tracker
body: I used the free app for a couple of months then I purchased the mySugr pro worth every penny. This app has Everything I needed.I can track all my My activities ,food most importantly my blood sugar. I can send my doctor weekly reports if needed.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear you have been so happy with the Pro version of our app and that it has been meeting all of your needs :)

title: Pretty good
body: However, when I forget to immediately log my BG and have to scroll through the time and date, it takes a lot of time. It would seriously improve my opinion of the app if I could just type in that information.
response: Thanks for the positive review! There is a way to automatically transfer data from your BG meter to your phone. Here is a link to that information

title: Makes tracking less of a chore
body: Best app to keep track of the things that matter the most related to taming my diabetes monster.

title: Simple and easy
body: I like the simplicity of using this app. If you monitor your blood several times a day you do not want to have to jump through hoops to record it. This app makes it a very simple process. Wish I knew what the  points I am awarded when I make an entry mean??

title: Sweet rewards
body: I came across this app in a search for somewhere to log my blood glucose levels and keep track of my food.

title: Great App
body: I love this app it helps me manage my sugars just like a notebook but in my phone it helps me keep track of everything and it is very easy to use I’m thankful n great full for this app because it helps me take better care of myself

title: Amazing app
body: I love this app so much it really helps me to manage my diabetes and insulin intake really wish the report would include the meds you take since you can long them as well. Hopefully they will add that in the future

title: Great App!
body: This is a great way to track blood glucose levels. I am sure there are more features to use, but I only need it for keeping track of what I eat and my numbers after meals.  It is really easy and clear to use.

title: Simple and fun
body: I’m new to testing my blood sugar, and downloaded several apps. After a week, this is the only one I’ve kept up with! My kids remind me to test to hear the giggles. Thanks for making something so scary I to something fun.

title: Very easy to use
body: My husband has Type 2 diabetes, so I downloaded this app to hopefully lower his A1C.  Been using it for a couple of weeks, and it’s very simple.  Plus it reminds us to check his blood sugar daily, and it helps us see trends.

title: My sugar
body: I am loving this app it helps me keep track of my sugar from the first morning testing to the last testing of the night. It is no hassle don’t have to worry about making sure you keep track....

title: This app has changed my life
body: I live with T1D and wanted to have support as I worked with fast acting insulin. It’s been so easy to use. Seeing my data in real time. Having a coach to help me and unlimited test strips delivered to my door. I love how it syncs with Apple health and my ACCU-CHEK guide meter too...
response: Thanks so much for the great review! :)

title: T1 Love this app
body: I’m still thinking about signing up for the $40/month unlimited test strips. I check a lot and insurance covers a good amount.
response: Thank you for the great review!! we're working on connection to MyFitnessPal currently and it should be available soon :)

title: Easy to use
body: I like the app, easy to use. I do wish it would have an icon for working retail a store. I also wish it would explain some of the icons like change site. How do I enter that I have taken a short term insulin shot?
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review as well as the suggestions and questions. Please reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com and they will be more than happy to help you out!

title: Great app!
body: Lots of detail and many additions to use. The only thing I would say that would make it better would be if there was a widget to open a calculator when entering the correction units. I mean it’s a good app, I’m just saying if I had to add a piece of advice.

title: Good app
body: I have the free app now but  I well buy the app when I can. Does a great job tracking sugars and replaces the manual book for daily tracking. It also gives you your A2C after you have made enough entries.

title: Convenient device at hand
body: I like the convenience of being able to log my vital information in one place and being able to review my progress.

title: The best out there
body: The title says it all this is the best app for keeping track of your blood sugar results and it helps you keep control which is actually even more important. Easy to use and full of good info.

title: BEST APP EVER
body: I’ve tried for years to find a way to help me control and monitor my blood sugar. Everything I tried either didn’t work or I didn’t like, but I love this app! It has helped me lower my A1C! This app has changed my diabetes management and my life!

title: Fun and easy to use
body: Switched to this app after my other app failed. I find this easy to use and fun. Waiting on my new meter to use more features of this app. Works great when adding blood sugar results manually.

title: Great app but has minor glitches
body: This is a great app but I’ve seen a couple glitches I hope they fix. The A1C estimation does not always show, even though I have logged enough readings (3x per day for 7 days). Also, the app does not does not always auto-connect to my meter.

title: Great app!
body: Been using this app coming up on a month now and it’s really easy to use and very helpful in keeping track of my daily levels.
response: Thanks so much for the awesome review! We love hearing that mySugr is helping :)

title: Like It
body: Don’t take advantage of all the capabilities but like how easy it is to use and carry with me to doctor visits.  Reports could be little simpler as hard to read w all the detail provided.  Have tried other apps but sticking w this one.
response: Hi! Thank you for the positive review. We are glad to hear our app has been helpful for you. We definitely agree the reports can be a lot of information but we are glad to hear you are sticking with us.

title: This is fun as well as easy to us
body: I have not had so much fun tracking my stuff for my diabetes. It is fun but also so easy to use. Well organized and gives me the information I need quickly as well.

title: Best app EVER 😀
body: I’ve tried sooo many apps in the past and not one begins to compare to this one. I just have the basic version and it has everything I want and need. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would!

title: Simple to use
body: This tool can do as much or as little as you choose. Whether you just want to log your sugar reading last or everything you do the app does the job.

title: Highly Recommended
body: I have been using this app for a little over a week. It makes managing my diabetes’s so much easier. I love it and will continue to explore all of the apps features. Thank you.

title: Really helpful
body: I used to try to track my blood sugars by writing them down but I would always misplace the notebook and it was just messy and unorganized. This puts everything in one place nice and organized

title: Makes it fun
body: I think my sugar makes it a fun way to keep track of your numbers. It also works great because most of us keep our phones with us and it’s pretty simple to remember to use it each day. Great app!

title: Goal!
body: I have been able to set a path for success and take the necessary steps to get there. This app keeps me informed of where I am so I can stay on track. I find I’m more vigilant about doing the right things!  Thanks!

title: Very good
body: Is very easy to use and helps to have the information handy helps every time you visit the doctor office and it picks the information too from my Apple Watch for workout and from my OMRON for the blood pressure

title: Easy to use
body: It’s easy for me to chart my sugar levels with this app than keeping a notebook!  Although I don’t currently use all of the features, I do like the weekly/monthly averages it provides.  It helps to keep me on track.
response: Thanks so much for the positive review! Check out the other features when you get a chance. They can make logging more fun :)

title: Fun way to track your BS
body: I’ve been using the app for more than a week. I’m impressed so far. It has so many options when entering your BS. You can keep up with insulin injections, meals, and so much more. The challenges are fun and encourage me to check my BS.  LOVE IT!
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We love hearing that mySugr helps :)

title: Easy to record all your info
body: I love how user friendly this app is. The only app I've seen that I can easily record all my information. I also like the weekly reports. Good reminder to get back on track.
response: Thanks for the positive review!

title: Excellent
body: This has been an excellent and easy way to keep track of my readings.  It is a tool I can take into the Dr office to show my tracking and see where my difficulties are. I can also remember what I ate and exercise completed. Love this app.
response: Hi Ken. Part of what we love about our app is the easy transfer of data. Thanks for a the great review!

title: Easy to use
body: This is so easy to use and keep track of my levels and whether or not it was before a meal or after. I can even keep track of medicines and whether or not I took them!
response: Thanks for the great review! The app can be really helpful with accountability and we're so glad it's helping you :)

title: So Helpful for kids
body: This app is so wonderful for my kids! It’s fun and easy to use. I also love that you can send a PDF file (or just snap a pic of the logs on your phone) and send them to the Endocrinologist to review.
response: Hi! Thank you so much you so much for the positive review :) We are so happy to have made living with T1D just a little bit easier!

title: App have some bug
body: The app is nice the interface is great I paid for subscription but....... can’t find any button to connect my Accu-Chek guide. I think it is because of the bug of some sort with the iPhone 11 pro Mac can’t seems to find the top left button anywhere.

title: I love being able to keep track online
body: It is very easy to use this app. I can keep track of my blood sugars and what I eat. I can also enter how much I exercise. Helps me keep track of my progress.

title: Lifesaver!
body: I’ve been using the premium version of this app for several years now. The reports are comprehensive and the interface is intuitive. Gives me confidence when I use it faithfully.

title: Five stars if you would create a batch mode
body: I take a ton of meds in the morning and a handful at night. If you would create some sort of batch mode or group that would allow me to add all my meds at once, that would be great. Otherwise is a decent app

title: Best app for diabetics !!!!!
body: I have steroid induced diabetes so my sugar levels usually are everywhere with this app I don’t have to write anything in a book or try to keep track in my head this is a real life saver for me not to mention the unlimited test strips
response: Thanks so much for the great review! We're so happy to hear that mySugr is helping :)

title: Keeping track
body: My blood sugar levels have gone up all of a sudden.  By using this app I have been able to keep a close watch and fortunately the readings have been much better.  Thanks!!!
response: We're happy to hear that your numbers are getting better :) Thank you for the positive review!!

title: Made me feel in control of my sugar!
body: This app is great. Easy to use and record lots of information. I loved tracking my sugar over time and keeping track of all factors for easy-to-access progress!
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We love being able to track progress and have everything in one place :)

title: Best app ever !
body: I have tried several different blood sugar monitoring apps and this is by far the best! Easy to use and holds all the information I need to correct any problems I have! Would recommend for anyone

title: Great App
body: I love this app! It helps me with regulating my blood sugar.  It also is nice to take my phone and show my doctor my numbers.  The only thing I would ask them to add is a little icon for when you are dizzy and one for nausea.

title: New to the club
body: I enjoy the app with all the detail it supplies me and information of where I stand. Being a diabetic and having an app that helps show you how you’re doing really brings comfort to you.

title: Excelente app
body: This app has been very helpful to me managing my type Two  pre diabetic. After trying few more app, this one is the best so far. I have even printed out a report and was able to reviewed it with my Doctor.

title: So helpful!
body: I was diagnosed with Type 1 Diabetes about 7 or 8 years ago and this app has been a lifesaver. It has so many helpful and FREE features that make tracking my sugar so convenient. Definitely recommend

title: So far so good
body: I’ve been using the app for a week and it keeps me organized. I like the estimated A1c on a regular basis. And the ability to type in and track what I ate and how I was feeling when my sugar spikes or is too low.

title: Mostly just a notebook
body: This could have been so much better. It is fine unless you want to just test 1 or 2 times then it isn’t anything but a notebook. If you test 3 or 4 times after a few days it will tell you and estimated  A1C not very accurate. And don’t upgrade you get nothing for it nothing.

title: Invaluable tool
body: My wife and I use this to track all my sons meals, insulin, and blood sugar. As far as problems, there's an occasional syncing lag but I don't think that's the fault of the program. Love this app. Great support too when I needed them.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad our app has been helpful in managing your son's diabetes! We are glad to hear our support team has been helpful as well :)

title: Can I give it a zero
body: I can’t even get in to it. I installed it. Then it asked for my email to set up or log in so I did. And next page comes up with enter password. Of course I don’t have a password set because I’m a first time user. But there was nothing on the page to help me. I went back to the first page to look at that again and I’m just going around and around. This might be a good app but how the hell do I even get started???
response: Hi! We are so sorry to hear you are running into these issues. Please reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com and we will be more than happy to get you up and running with our app. Thank you for your initial interest and we hope you will stick around.

title: Use to be great
body: I loved when this first came out.  You could login online via pc and look at graphs and export them.  Now you can’t login on www, you can’t change password unless you know previous one AND if you try to find prices to subscribe you get 1 of 3 - $49 a month for things not needed.
response: Hi there! We have both a free basic mySugr app, an upgraded PRO version and a bundle service. Please contact us at support@mysugr.com if you want to know more about the different versions and how to upgrade. We would love to answer any questions you might have 💚

title: Love it
body: The only reason it’s not a 5 is that I think there are still some improvements, such as a running A1c estimate. It would also be nice to look back on past days and see what the estimated A1c was for that day. Otherwise, I love it and it’s helped me stay on top of testing.

title: Great app to keep myself accountable
body: App has been great so far. I’ve been able to monitor my glucose levels and the estimated A1C lets me see results. I can’t wait to have my follow up doctors appointment to see my number go down.

title: Awesome simple app!
body: I love this app because it’s straightforward and without all kinds of features that overwhelm or distract from the main goal, to track my sugar. And yet, it’s flexible enough to add other helpful data. Thank you!

title: MySugr
body: The app is good for logging and tracking. Increased functionality for interaction with food log as in applications such as MyFitnessPal with Glycemic index would be beneficial to help assist with identifying the foods that worked during given day/month/year. This would also help drive further research initiatives surrounding diets.

title: Easy and fast to use!
body: As someone who is still learning the ropes of being diabetic this has been such an easy app to use and makes sending in my sugars to my providers way easy!!

title: Super-helpful app
body: Makes it very easy to track blood glucose readings with the Accu-CHEK Guide glucometer. Good for tracking meds taken and daily activity performed. The export feature is helpful for sharing with others. And, the estimated A1C value is good for tracking progress.

title: Fun and helpful app
body: Thanks for helping me to keep my sugars under control. I haven’t purchased any of the in app upgrades yet but I will soon since it has quite a bit of info that I am not tracking yet

title: Great app
body: Five months in after my 10-year-old's diagnosis of T1D. MySugr is great. Docs at our clinic gave the reports a thumbs up and said they'd recommend it to their patients. Thank goodness for the technology that makes living with this disease just a little simpler!
response: Thanks so much for the positive review! We're so happy to hear that mySugr is helping :)

title: Connivence
body: I love the fact I can log every morning and as I eat to keep a log of my glucose levels, carbs, my diet, my A1a and they send me what I need needles, strips and test strips. I don’t have to stress about things they do it all and the meter keeps track
response: Thanks for the positive review!!  We're so happy to hear the the mySugr bundle is helping :)

title: Thanks
body: MySugar is a great tool to help me get my diabetes under control. I showed the app to my doctor and he was impressed. Thanks for the help. I stopped recording for awhile but I’m back on track now-Thank you for still being here for me.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are happy to hear our app has been a good tool for you and your doctor!

title: Helpful little gadget
body: I was very scared when I found out I needed to start tracking my blood sugar levels. This gave me motivation as well as helped me keep track of where I was each day.

title: Always in the know
body: I love this app.  It allows me to understand what raises and lowers my blood sugar.  It also gives me an option to bring the info to my doc.  It’s so much easier than the pencil and paper method!

title: Review
body: I find this app very useful to track my blood sugar. It’s so nice to have this data to review with my doctor. I am working for better control of my sugars. This app would be useful for any diabetic. I like the projected A1C feature.

title: Very convenient
body: Better than writing it down.  Still in the learning process.  Looking towards adding more accurate info and this helps me to keep consistent with maintaining manageable blood sugar.

title: Easy to use
body: I really like the AP. I only wish it had a feature to look up the carbs. Right now I have to switch to another AP to input the meal and find out the carbs.

title: I love my sugar “monstar”
body: It keeps you on your toes. Keeps you responsible for your actions. It is fun just love this app so much!! Plus doctors love it when you give them a detailed printout it is so much easier than reading from the bs meter my doctor says!!!
response: Thanks for the positive review and we're so glad to hear that mySugr is helping!

title: Steve
body: If your searching for a way to conveniently chart your progress in controlling your blood sugar mySugr app will fulfill.
response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy to hear mySugr is making your life a little bit easier!

title: Love the Point System
body: The point system of reinforcement motivates me to take my glucose level when I don't feel like doing it. I also like the Estimated HbA1c feature. I wish the Pro version weren't so expensive.
response: Thanks for the positive review :)

title: Great Tool
body: This place s a great tool for diabetics for tracking their blood sugar levels. I new to having diabetes & I’m looking this tool. I take it with me to show my Dr..  He was also impressed when he saw how much information it showed.
response: Thanks for the great review! The ease of access to information is an awesome feature :)

title: Collects data you then can’t see
body: Carefully input meds, meter readings, insulin dose, exercise, meals...but it only let’s me see a daily log of meter readings (heck the METER does that) and icons for meals.  No tracking that I did (or didn’t) take meds, and exercise appeared first thing in the AM on days I didn’t exercise yet—and couldn’t edit that.  Nice idea, but not fully functional and I’m not taking the time to enter data unless the tracking is more robust and can multi-track.
response: Hi! We are so sorry you had a bad experience! We'd love to work with you on this, as you should be able to track your medications, as well as edit records. Please contact us at support@mysugr.com! We'd love to chat!

title: New Diabetic
body: Was just diagnosed, and was a little overwhelmed by all the options of meters and test strips and how to track... Accu-Chek Guide has a very easy app, convenient access to results and I can get test strips at many locations, not just one store.
response: A new diagnosis can be totally overwhelming!! We're so happy to hear that the mySugr app is helping you keep track and tame that pesky diabetes monster :) Thanks for the great review!!

title: Great app.
body: Very easy to use, straightforward. You can put as much or as little detail in as you want, and easily share your collected data with your care provider. I think this is a fantastic app.

title: Very good app
body: I very much like this app.  By easily tracking my sugars, when I am taking my insulin and the amounts and the types of foods with this app, I have been able to better control, lower numbers and a lower A1c.

title: Nice features
body: This app is so amazing, it allows you tracking everything you need to get better control about your blood sugar and have a wonderful health experience eating healthy.

title: Great!
body: Been using it for a few years. A great app to track your diabetes, insulin and pills.  Fun, organized well, intuitive.  I never leave reviews but this app has worked so well for me that I felt I need to write a review this time.

title: Amazing app!!
body: This app has made things so easy to keep track of all my daughters numbers!! I was writing everything out, but am so great full to the mySugr team for creating such an easy to use app :) Thank you!!!

title: Great tracker
body: I love the ability to track so many things and keep notes in one place. I always have my phone on me so no need to worry about leaving my tracking at home!

title: Terrific tool!
body: As a T1d, this puts all of the info I give it into a weekly report with stats, an ongoing A1c plus a logbook with many categories  such as bolus, corrections, food, emotional state, etc.  For me the only thing missing is a category for insulin-on-board. It is a very good app!
response: Thank you so much for the positive review!! That's an awesome suggestion and we love hearing from our users. We're always trying to improve and your idea will be passed on to our developers :)

title: New to testing
body: As a newb, I wanted an app to help me keep track of my blood sugar levels. This is one of two apps I downloaded and I like the color coding of highs and lows and making the glucose monster giggle, but the Glucose Buddy app has a better way to track your foods.  Maybe you could add that bit to the MySugr app.  It’s a little tedious to have to alternate.
response: Thank you for the positive review and feedback! We love hearing from our users as they have the most relevant suggestions :) We're making improvements all the time and this will definitely be passed on to our developers.

title: Easy to use and understand
body: This app is easy to use and provides great features and information. I take the information and send to my doctor to help in my care.

title: A1C
body: The 4 stars is to ask the inclusion of obtaining the A1C when you are taking only 2 readings per day. The program request 3 readings per day for 7 days.
response: Hi! Thank you for the review. Unfortunately, we cannot change the number of readings needed to produce an estimated A1C at this time. We hope you continue to enjoy using the app!

title: Great for diabetics!
body: I would recommend this app for any diabetic, no matter the type. I especially love the report feature, which allows me to print a report for my doctor.

title: Recap of first review
body: This app is very easy to use and I’m-grateful for the ability to send my results to my Dr.  without having to  send 14 pages of hand written notes. 👍🏻😁Especially because my Dr. is located in MS d I’m staying with my Dad-up in MI. This allows him to see and monitor my progress in my diabetic journey. A
response: Hello! Thank you so much for your review and your feedback. We are definitely interested in what you have to say and we appreciate your opinion. Do you have specific reasons why our app has not been helpful for you? Please let us know and we are happy to talk/make adjustments as much as we can. Thank you!

title: Good for tracking
body: I like it for being able to put my numbers in to track but it always seems to put me in “green” when some of my numbers are definitely not green?? Maybe I’m doing something wrong?

title: Really nice
body: The app is very organized, and helpful. It has a lot of option to chose from and accurate as well. I love the app, letting me keep track of what have so far. Highly recommended ;)

title: Gestational Diabetes
body: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and this have been such an easy app to navigate and keep track of all of my numbers, times and how I feel to report back to my doctors weekly!!! Thank you!

title: Development idea
body: I really like the app. I do manual entry of my blood sugars because I have 2 identical meters so I can leave one at work. Not sure if the app could allow automatic entry from 2 different meters but might be a development idea.

title: TD1
body: As a busy parent of 3 this app is sooo helpful. Filling out my daughters insulin logs every day is time consuming. And the fact that I can enter so much information and be able to email to myself or to her doctor is the best thing ever!!! I love this app!!
response: Thanks so much for the awesome review! We love hearing that mySugr is helping parents with T1D kiddos. It sounds like you have a great management system going and we're so happy to hear that mySugr can help :)

title: Love it !
body: I love the app! But there Is one thing I wish existed, a Calculator of some sort. Where The user could input Carb to insulin ratio And correction dosage, along with other variables. In my dream world if I could have it where you can put in blood sugar and carb dose and have it give you a recommended insulin dose. It’s a big dream. 🤷🏻‍♀️
response: Thanks for the positive review!! We're working on releasing our bolus calculator in the US...hang in there, it should be soon :)

title: Just about perfect! Using w/ PREdiabetes
body: If I could designate my pre-diabetic state, and if I could see my ketone numbers alongside my glucose numbers — then this would be perfect.
response: Hello! Thank you so much for the positive review and the great suggestions! We will definitely take these into consideration as we are constantly looking for new ways to improve our app and make it the best it can be.

title: Best tool for tracking my information so far
body: I appreciate being able to track everything easily on my phone. The variety of input to easily document my data has been very helpful!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad to hear you have found our app helpful.

title: Love it!!!!
body: My daughter has type 1 diabetes and I love that we can all keep tabs on her as a family!!! The reports it creates makes it super easy to figure out trends and what we could be doing better!!!

title: Great app
body: I didn’t really know what to expect with this app after diagnosis last year. I have continued to use it and play around with the settings and I have learned to love it.  Thanks for all the updates.

title: This has all become so much easier
body: Love the app and the trending!  Little excuse on my part anymore which is better for my health overall to know what’s going on with my daily diabetes fight!  Thanks!

title: Mrs
body: I need to log morning and night blood sugar each day   I would like to log pulse each day also this way I wouldn’t have to take my log book with me for the dr.  Also I read instructions but don’t understand how to get A1C.  Otherwise good program.

title: So Far, So Good
body: I like the ease of use regarding this app. What don’t understand us how it averages my readings. This morning when opened the app there were no average readings shown everything was grayed out. Ease of use is still a plus.

title: Works perfect
body: Works for what I need it to do for a easy no hassle app. If you want paperless this is the app for you. It was so easy when I went to the doctor I just gave her my phone to look at. I have just the free app.

title: RN
body: I really appreciate being able to scroll back over the previous days/weeks of results. Plus the colors are a super quick reminder/encouragement!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad to hear our app has been helpful and encouraging for you in the management of your diabetes!

title: Long time user
body: I’ve used this app for a number of years. I love it! Easy to use and customize. My doctor likes the info it provides, also. Highly recommend
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and the recommendations! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying our app and that it is helpful for you and your doctor.

title: Excellent sugar tracker with ability to import from meter
body: I really like that this app can import numbers from my monitor via Bluetooth. I have to use a separate app to look up food and calculate carbs and then transfer into mySugr. It would be great to have this capability included.

title: So helpful
body: I’m a competitive person so the fact that there’s a point system is rad, it’s honestly kinda cute, and overall the most helpful app I’ve found to help keep me on track with my t1d!

title: A great way to track your levels
body: This app is a great tool for tracking your levels and get an idea what you avg blood sugar is. Also what foods can cause a spike that you should stay away from

title: JW
body: I love being able to automatically track my blood sugar levels. This app also allowed me to give a print out to my provider just by emailing the report to them.

title: Outstanding and efficient
body: mySugr allows me to track my necessary data in a concise, intuitive and paperless format. I especially appreciate the easy-to-see trending chart. Oh, and did I mention paperless! Good for me and the environment. Win-win.

title: Great!
body: Love being able to record my numbers since I am not on meds and using diet as a way to control my blood sugar. Having some idea of my A1C also helps me stay on track.

title: Love this app!
body: I have been using this app for a couple weeks now and love it! I am using the free version and it really helps me keep track of my glucose levels better than just my meter.

title: Love this app
body: I really love this app and the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is really wish you didn’t have to pay for the added features.  I feel like this could be a great place to educate diabetics and help them manage their disease.

title: Excellent
body: Very easy to organize readings, meals, and units. Able to edit date and time of entries in case you forget to do it in the moment. Data is very easy to read. Can export readings and email to endo in seconds.
response: Thank you for the positive review! We're so glad to hear your enjoying the app :)

title: supurb app
body: great app i am new to this diabetic life, so being able to track my progress is very important to me. i do find a bit restricted though, to utilize some of the functions that i hoped would be part of the basic plan. you do have to upgrade. i totally understand. all in all this app ofers a lot of information and allows for more once you do upgrade. i am very happy with app, works perfectly for my needs in this stage of my life. thank you guys 9/10 score!!!!
response: Thank you so much for the great review!! We're so happy to hear that mySugr can help newly diagnosed diabetics get a handle on their management :)

title: Totally love this app
body: I have tried others and they were too complicated or not enough info. This one is great. Very user friendly, and shows me tracking so I can see how I am trending .
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad you have found our app helpful and useful for tracking and finding trends :)

title: Keeping me on track!
body: I’ve only been using this for over a week, but I feel like it gives me a level of control that I haven’t had before. I really like using it.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) Welcome to mySugr, we are so glad you are happy with us.

title: Great App
body: I just discovered this yesterday and I have been a diabetic for about 23 years. I love it! Easy to use. Just pair your meter with your smart phone, check your blood sugar and it will import it for you.

title: Great App
body: I track my sugar every morning.  It tracks my blood pressure and my weight on a daily basis as well. It makes it so much easier to go back and look over time of my successes and my failures.

title: Great tracker!
body: I connect my glucometer via Bluetooth so keeping track of my blood glucose is super easy.  I recently started tracking carbs as well, which is helping me stay controlled.  Love the report.  I take that to my doctor.

title: Favorite app!
body: I love this app! I love the visual representation of how my blood sugars are staying in range. It’s one thing to know what it is every time I check and another to see the graph of where my blood levels have been!

title: Review
body: I love this app. It helps me keep track of my blood sugar. Before I didn’t keep track because I wouldn’t remember to write it down. With this app I not only keep track but I can see how it fluctuates.

title: New type 1
body: I have a diagnosed teenage son. This is very simple to use which I find invaluable during this trying time.  I especially like the color coded numbers...makes it simple to visualize trends.

title: Cool App
body: This app is easy to use and fun. I'm an adult but I love the "glucose monster". I wish there were some more options but I guess that's why they want you to pay for them. I would recommend it to anyone.
response: Thanks for the positive review! The Pro version is only $2.99 a month, less than a cup of coffee, and can offer even more options and data for managing your diabetes :)

title: Awesome app
body: It’s amazing it tells you what your estimated a1c, it takes information about your diabetes, it tells you how you did on your finger pricks, and it’s a little fun to log it and make your account!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad we have been able to make your experience with diabetes a little better and even fun sometimes!

title: Works for me!
body: I’m really pleased with mySugr! This app (particularly the free version,) has been terrifically helpful to me. I’m tracking my blood sugar better, logging my carbs and beginning to understand how my body reacts with my diet and lifestyle. Thanks team!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so happy to hear our app has been helpful for you. Sounds like you are working really hard and remember we've got your back!

title: Loving this app so far
body: With my new lifestyle, this app has been one of my favorite parts. It is quick and easy to use. I really like the animations.

title: An answer to prayer
body: I was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and felt so overwhelmed. This app has helped me so much with staying on track and I love the challenges. Thank you for this app and helping me see that I CAN do this

title: My Sugr
body: We are just learning how to manage Type 1 Diabetes and the My Sugr app helps to keep things organized so we can see trends  and  daily data.  It is also helpful to have to be able to share with Medical Team.

title: Fantastic partner in understanding my body
