body: Great application... appreciate the tracking format of the horizontal flow. The easily recognized target bands. Also appreciate its connection with supporting apps... apple health, etc. this is my central monitoring tool. Thank you for your efforts.

title: Life saver
body: Unfortunately I am new to being a diabetic. And this app helped me tremendously on monitoring my food and my blood sugar. In about three weeks I’ve gotten my blood sugar under control. Thank you very much!

title: Just what was looking for
body: I'm giving it 4 stars because it does pretty much everything I was looking for in a tracking app. It would be 5 stars I didn't need to pay for additional features.

title: My Sugar
body: I’ve resisted this app for a long time because I thought it was too difficult to use. Surprise, I like it and the funny emoji. I’m still working on the food input part. Getting better.

title: Got the knowledge
body: I thought I was doing okay with my sugars, but this app gave me a real look at how I was doing.   I am better able to control my sugars now and see when I need to be diligent.  I approve this app

title: Needs a little more
body: A few additions would be nice, account for gluten free, a field to account for how long after a meal the test is performed, how long in a fasted state, and some other food options, granola, etc. Overall it’s quick and easy to input blood sugar numbers. The tracking graph is nice as well.

title: Really helping
body: So far this is really helping me manage my diabetes. Data is the key to better management and this app has helped me capture, organize and review that data.

title: Critic- not criticism.
body: Intuitive but some help would ( could)  be useful.   More also about cal A1C.

title: My sugar has really helped me
body: Before I started using my sugar I was on 4 shots a day and taking 2000mg of Metformin and 2400 mg of Gabapentin. Now, I am off of all my shots and take only 1000mg of Metformin  and 1000 mg of Gabapentin a day. This site really made me aware of my eating habits.

title: Nice little app for diabetics
body: This is a handy app to help chart your information to better track your blood sugar and A1C. Has lots of different things you can input to document and show your Dr.

title: Easy, motivating!
body: I’m new to monitoring my blood glucose, trying to prevent diabetes. Using MySugr has been surprisingly fun and the various points and sound effects and animations when I enter carbs or BG readings actually help keep me interested in monitoring.

title: Easy to use
body: Super easy to use. Helps to give a sense of sugar levels over time. A real tool for battling diabetes! The ability to use Bluetooth to input information from the meter is great!

title: Love the app
body: Tracking my blood sugar levels is kinda fun!  Love the sounds and the emojis, but also like that I can give A little more info then just tracking my #’s. I can put in what I ate and what I was doing. Thanks!

title: Blood Sugars tracking
body: Easy to use, would like it even more if the App would connect with Fitbit to track weights, diet and carbs.  Then we would have a more complete picture

title: Great app! Makes organization easy!
body: Using to track my daughters Type 1. We love the simple interface and it makes tracking super easy. Highly recommend!
response: Thanks so much for the great review! We love hearing that mySugr helps :)

title: What a great tool
body: When my son got type 1 there were so few things i could do to help. Keeping track of his levels on this app gave me one little way to help. Thank you.
response: Thanks for the awesome review!! It can be hard to be the care taker of a kiddo living with diabetes and were so glad we could offer some help :)

title: Easy to use tracker
body: I’ve been recently diagnosed and this app make it easy to track and provide my doctor the information he needs each visit
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and we are so glad you have found us. We are so happy to hear our app has been helpful in giving your doctor the information he needs each visit :)

title: Great features
body: The only thing that would make this easier is if I could actually log my food from a database.  Currently I have to log it elsewhere and then transfer that info over.  Other than that it’s awesome!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and great feedback. We are constantly working on new integrations and features for our app and we will definitely keep this idea in mind.

title: Incredibly helpful
body: This has made tracking my health and carbs easy. The app links apple health as well as Bluetooth enabled blood sugar monitoring, blood pressure, and weight scale. It was easy to setup. In addition, the optional coach was been helpful and informative.

title: Almost perfect
body: It’s an awesome tool to document meals (with the help of Apple Health and MyFitnessPal), activity, and sugars so my doc can really see what my deal is. I only wish the location part worked better.

title: Great app to track your sugar and related data
body: MySugr has been great at helping my analyze  my blood sugar patterns and track everything including meals and schedule sugar checks. The reporting is great to provide to your doctor.

title: Very helpful app!
body: Since I’ve gotten serious with tracking my daily numbers, this app has been great in helping me to see my trends. I can give my Dr. an accurate log each visit.

title: Just right!
body: I just need to track sugar but this gives many more options too! Maybe I'll try out the rest little by little. Thanks!

title: Great device!
body: Some problems keeping a steady connection, but it works GREAT. Issue may be on my end, but even when connection doesn’t work, I can still input manually. Makes tracking soooo much easier!

title: Nice App
body: Decided on this app after a little research  It's nice and quite helpful for tracking sugars. The free version does everything that I need it to do. I have recommended it to several others.
response: Thank you for the positive review!

title: I love the little monster
body: I’ve loved getting to incorporate this app into my daily life! It’s reassuring to watch my trends as they relate to me being “really serious this time” about taking control of my health.

title: Serves its purpose!
body: It has a lot of features I’m not even using as I just needed a basic tracker. If I was wanting to go more in depth, this would be an even better app! Def recommend.

title: This app is really helpful
body: Once I learned how to move about it, it had become a very useful tool that I am lost with out when I can’t use it... I wish it used more information from other apps such as free style and carb manager...

title: This is great
body: Best app I have found to track blood sugar and exercise combined. I love the little sounds each time I put in some data. It may seem funny but it keeps me coming back.

title: Bakemono is my best friend!
body: Bakemono is the name of my “Diabetes Monster.” This app really helps me manage my blood sugars better when I don’t have any sensors left and I don’t have the money to get more. 10/10 do recommend! 😁

title: Wonderful App
body: The Pro version is definitely worth it. All the info to help recognize patterns in the life of a diabetic. We love the send reports feature, to  send numbers to my daughter’s doctor. Works like a charm!

title: Under control
body: Sugars have been better controlled since using the app, definitely makes me aware of how things are reacting with me and it’s an easy way to see how I’m trending

title: Very Pleased
body: I’ve been using the app for a few years & every time I want to monitor something new the app makes it work so easily. Great details even with no cost option!! 😊
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are glad to hear you have been so happy with our app!

title: Great tracking app
body: Helps you be always on top of your blood sugar levels, and also estimates your A1C which motivates you to always manage your intake vs your insulin injections ( for me) or your diabetes medication.

title: Great app for tracking my numbers
body: This app has been very helpful for me while tracking my blood glucose numbers. I wish the free version had a place to put notations in. I like the idea of being able to track foods that gave me high readings.
response: Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that! We do have a notes section, but it may be hidden. Please contact our support team at support@mysugr.com for help getting that set up.

title: Neat App
body: I really like this app so far and will keep using it for a while to see how things work out! I wish it had reminders for changing sites and sensors then it would be perfect!
response: Thanks so much for the positive feedback! I will forward your suggestions to our developers as we're always looking to improve :)

title: Easy to use!
body: I have gestational diabetes and my dietitian was the one who recommended using this app! I’ve been using it since day 1 and it has helped me track my levels and meals very easily!
response: Thank you for the positive review!! We're happy to hear that mySugr could help you through pregnancy with gestational diabetes :)

title: Very Beneficial
body: My GP asked me to check my blood glucose at least three times a day for two weeks and report my results at my next appointment.  mySugr has made this assignment ridiculously easy!
response: We love how easy the app is to use too :) Thanks for the great review!!

title: Old Coot86
body: Easy to use
response: Thanks for the positive review! I'm sorry to hear your having trouble with the wireless connection. Feel free to reach out to our awesome customer support team support@mysugr.com and they'll get you back to being a monster tamer in no time :)

title: Great app!
body: I love this app! It has been a big help in logging my blood sugar level, as I would always loose log books/papers etc. It also hasn’t loads of handy stats like your daily avg. etc
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been so helpful for you.

title: Great app
body: I love the user-interface so simple and easy to use. The goals and challenges keep me checking my glucose constantly and my blood sugars have improved since using it! Thanks for a great app ☝🏻💉
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear your blood sugars have improved since using the app, great work!

title: Practical
body: My doctor wants my numbers every time I see her. I don’t have to take my meter in ever. I have all of my numbers with me all the time and everywhere I go. This is a time saver and a life saver.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We are glad you love it.

title: MySugr app
body: The application assist in every faucet. It's informs you when the blood sugar is low to give the advice needed to get the patient back on track. I will recommend to family and friends.

title: Great app!
body: Am Type Il for 10 years and this is quite accurate on A1C but wish it would track it if you only test twice a day instead of three. Also, I wish I could load app onto my Apple Watch 3 and Kindle Fire.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and the great suggestions. We will definitely keep these ideas in mind as we are constantly working on improving our app and making it the best it can be.

title: Simple and fun
body: So nice to have on hand when I need to report numbers to my diabetes managager. I can give details about each individual reading. Oh and I love the little sugar monster’s responses to my numbers. So cute!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to have provided a helpful method for getting your data into the hands of those who need it! We definitely agree the monster is cute!

title: Fun app
body: This app makes tracking my sugar fun. Also love the monster! Thanks for the coupon for the free Accu-Chek Guide monitoring system!! Love it imports my test result to your app on my phone!!

title: Good app
body: I don’t really understand it, but then having having diabetes since 2004 and I still don’t understand anything about it... what makes me think I understand this app

title: Easy to use!
body: This app is simple and easy to use. So far only one disappointing issue is that it doesn’t support AgaMatrix, so I have to punch in my numbers. I still like it though.

title: Great app!
body: So far I’m loving this app! I’ve only been using it for about a week but it is easy to log blood sugars, food and activities. Glad that I’m able to write in things as well!

title: Great App!
body: I love how easy it is to use this app to track my blood sugar! Even though my meter doesn’t communicate with the app directly, it’s super easy to use and has a pretty interface.

title: Excellent app!
body: Have been using mySugr for a couple of weeks and truly enjoying the easy and intuitive interface and features.

title: Works great when you use it
body: The only thing I struggle with is remembering to enter all of my information. Other than that it works great and I love how my BS number are automatically entered into the app.

title: Great App
body: So far I have been using it every day. I sometimes don’t have the right way to describe my day with the pictures that are provided. But I like the app and it is easy to use.

title: Just trying
body: I have to basic Versionand am being to log sugar regularly.  I log food in my fitness pal and exercise in record. Let's see how it goes, but liking it so far

title: Love This App
body: I’m considered a Type 1 brittle diabetic. I can have huge swings with the smallest change. This app allows me to document small changes and record the outcome. Enabling my doctor and I to successfully control my sugars.
response: Hi kate1091, thanks so much for the positive review! We're so glad to hear that mySugr is helping :)

title: WOWSER!
body: If it communicated with my 2 year old son's CGM and insulin pump it would be perfect.  Otherwise, it is an excellent, full functionality log for my son's diabetes info.  It helps to keep the insanity of tracking a 2 year old's diabetes sane.
response: Thanks for the great review! We're currently working on more data integration with pumps and CGM's and they should be available fairly soon :)

title: It's great for checking glucose levels
body: I have been using this for a couple of weeks now. I like the way it works and the fact that I can include other health variables in one app.
response: Thanks for the positive review! We love how many variables can be tracked in the app too :)

title: Great way to track sugar levels!!
body: Been using it over a month great way to keep track of my sugar levels on a daily basis and then when i go see Doctor for check up I can show my entries. I do recommend this app.
response: Thank you for the positive review and recommendations!!

title: Easy to use
body: Your app is so easy to use and navigate. Love the I can quickly enter my information without alot of difficulty.  Thank you for your service.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad our app has been helpful for you and that you have found it easy to navigate!

title: Easy to use
body: I had stopped testing my blood sugar.

title: Trying to my A1C
body: I’ve been using your app for some time now trying to get my A-1 C value and it keeps telling me that I haven’t logged in now we’re in order to get this value however I’ve been logging every single day for weeks.

title: Handy method
body: I love being able to utilize the My Sugar app along with my AccuCheck device. It is easy to track my progress, and send my Dr. the easy to export, reports every few weeks.

title: Almost perfect
body: This app is super easy to use. I love that my readings automatically show up in the app. I do wish it had a weight chart. Besides that, this is the best app for diabetics I’ve found!

title: Diabetic? You need this.
body: I love this app. It has made tracking my blood sugars fun! I am better and more consistent. The instant gratification of entering a blood sugar into the program is satisfying. 10/10 recommend.

title: Take Control
body: I really like this app - if used regularly it makes you think about your choices and motivates you to take control of your diabetes!

title: Love it
body: I never keep a sugar log but this makes it easy and super easy for my dr to understand since I’m

title: Good app
body: I think it takes too many taps to log info.  I would like one log, all info in it a couple times a day.  I only have Rx for testing 2x a day, but to get the A1C estimate I need 3x a day.  Not sure why that is?  Would love to see that changed.

title: Easy to use
body: I’ve tried keeping track of my blood sugar for years and doing a lousy job of it. This app makes it a lot easier for me. Truly, five stars.

title: Great App
body: Help me stay on track, also grabs my vitals via Bluetooth from my iPhone so that I can see my trending health improve, I can also send periodic reports to help track my health over time

title: Best Diabetes Management App
body: I’ve check out a few diabetes management app and this is the best by far. I use this to track the foods I eat and my sugar levels since I am working with a dietician. She loves it as well!

title: Wow excellent app to track and motivate you to take an active part in your wellness.
body: My sugars were out of control in just a few day journaling has brought my sugars down to 113 awesome app. Give it a try.

title: So far I like  it
body: I really like that you can record everything. I wish it was connected to cgms that way it would up latest reading instead of having to put it in.

title: Great app
body: I love this app because it’s easy to use and all of my data is in one spot.  I can see trends with my blood sugar.  I definitely would recommend this app to others.

title: Handy
body: The app is a handy device to measure my daily routines that I can’t access from my meter without a USB. The booklet helps, but I am not able to record BP like here.  It’s a complete snapshot of my daily health numbers.

title: Great App, well designed
body: This is a wonderful for someone who does not have software to download their Bloodsugars from their pump/meter. Easy to use and the reports are very helpful. Keep up the good work and thank you!

title: My Sugar
body: Love this app. It is way too expensive. But our child needs it to get through his diabetic needs. Thank goodness for the challenges. Would get five stars if it were a reasonable price, or could win access to reports more.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! I'm sorry the cost is a bit out of reach for you right now. I wish we could offer it at a lower cost point, but at this time, the $39.99 per month is as low as we can offer at this time.

title: Good, could be great
body: Some of the descriptors need to be updated, or have additional options. Also, many options aren’t available unless you pay. It’s always about money and the sick people have to pay just to track their own test results.
response: Great to hear from you. I'm sorry the cost is a bit out of reach for you right now. I wish we could offer it at a lower cost point, but at this time, the $2.99 per month is as low as we can offer at this time.

title: Great app!
body: I’m a newly diagnosed Type 2 diabetic and I absolutely love this app.  The only thing I’ve found stressful with it is adding the various medications I take.  But even then I would definitely recommend.
response: Thanks for the positive review and feedback! The idea of having more medications in the app is a great idea and will be passed on to our developers. We're always looking to improve the app :)

title: Fantastic app
body: This app has made it so easy to keep track of my daughter’s information and share it between my husband and I. It’s made the transition into taking care of t1d so much simpler!

title: Very useful, haven’t found anything comparable.
body: I love, love, love this app. I am able to keep track of my glucose levels, as well as how much insulin I’m taken for food, correction, or long acting. I haven’t found an app that can compare to how useful this app is.

title: Pretty happy with it
body: I wanted something simple to just record my sugar readings. This does that and more. I don’t use all the features, but it’s nice to know they are there if I choose to.

title: Love this app
body: My Sugar helps me keep track of my blood sugar daily and I can easily find the last reading.   Probably should explore and use more of the app but haven’t yet.

title: 4 stars would be 5 see below
body: I would absolutely give this a 5 star rating if there were a combination to track your food with this app. Maybe somehow if nutritionix and mySugr had a baby, it would be perfect.

title: Very easy app to use
body: I like this app because it is so easy to use. I can enter my test results in seconds and print them out for my doctor when needed.

title: Just getting started
body: This has been a great tool as I’m just getting started with tracking. I appreciate that I can fill out as much or as little as I choose.

title: Pretty Useful
body: I genuinely have nothing bad to say. You can track everything from before and after meals, and corrections. Everything I was looking for.

title: Times to check for a1c
body: I like being able to see what my blood sugar is or has been. I just don’t care for the fact that you can’t check your a1c unless you test 3 times a day for a week.

title: I love My Sugr
body: I’ve been using this app for a few weeks and i love it. It helps me stay on track and motivated with my blood sugars. It’s easy to use and understand. I like that it gives an estimated A1c.

title: LOVE THIS APP
body: Keeps track of my sugar and every detail about sugar highs and lows! It’s really ingenious how they came up with all the main details of keeping track and cute at the same time!! Bravo!! Keep up the good work!!

title: Love this app!
body: Easy to use and keeps you motivated to keep tracking! I also got the bundle and the coaching has been awesome. Didn’t realize how much I needed the extra support.

title: Best Blood Sugar App!!!!
body: I’ve tried A LOT of apps but this one is silly, fun on a serious subject.  I highly recommend this app.  Even the free version is great but the upgraded version is the best I’ve ever used!  My doctor loves it as well!

title: Organized!
body: When I was diagnosed a month ago I was writing my sugars down and often forgetting to make notes or carb count. Now I’m organized and focused and my numbers are reflecting it!

title: Great app to stay focused
body: Using this daily to help me track my status and to stay focused on doing those things keep my blood glucose levels in a healthy range. Try it.

title: MySugr is Great
body: I can’t say it enough mySugr keeps me on track. It keeps me motivated to know how my body is doing in the next few hours. Without I forget but with it I don’t. It’s just that simple.

title: Update crashes
body: This has been a great app until the last update now it crashes every time you open it up and input data. It takes two to three times before you get all your data in. Please fix it. Used to be 5stars
response: Thank you for your concern!! We’re sorry you’re having trouble with the app crashing! There should be an easy solution to this :)

title: Love this app
body: I love this app it has helped me keep track of my sugar without the hassle of finding my booker and a pen all the time. Plus it is easier for me for when I show my doctor.
response: We love hearing this! Thanks so much for the positive review :)

title: I think this is a great app!!!
body: This is the best blood sugar track app ever. It is very user friendly and easy to understand and use. This is a tool that I would recommend to anyone.
response: Thanks Jerry for the great review!! We're so happy to hear that you'd recommend mySugr to a friend...Thanks :)

title: Great App
body: Im pre-diabetic and need to learn how different foods affects my BG level.  This helped me track them all and can use it to show my doctor.  Only downside, I wish it paired with my meter instead of having to get theirs.
response: Thank you for the positive review and feedback!! We are working on more data connections now and they should be available soon :)

title: Easy Log
body: This app makes it so much easier to keep a log of my diabetic readings along with additional information to help manage my diabetes and to inform my doctor.
response: We love how much information can be tracked in the app too :) Thank you for the positive review!!

title: Excellent log!
body: This log enables one to accurately monitor a range of diabetic measures. It is helpful to lower carb use and to sustain a heart healthy diabetic diet with exercise.  The averages on measures are useful for tracking. My physician likes his copy of my log and is impressed with this app.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive and detailed review! We are so glad to hear our app has been useful for you and your physician.

title: Rush64
body: App is very easy to use and contains so much useful information. The options that are available to help me make tracking my blood sugar a lot easier. Thanks.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been useful for you and helped you with tracking your blood sugars.

title: A T1 must have.
body: Lots of apps out there for T1 diabetics, and I’ve tried several. MySugr is fantastic - from tracking trends to adding food and insulin doses, it keeps you aware of where you are in your busy life.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been useful for you!

title: MySugr
body: This software makes it very easy to track meals, sugar, and general health.  The interface is very intuitive.  I showed this to my physician, who is recommending it to his patients.
response: Thanks for the great review!! :)

title: Nice app
body: The only thing I'm not liking is finding the information to put in the entries! I want to fill out as much as I can but somethings I just don't know! I can't find the Bolus calculator, so the menu system could be better. I love how it

title: Better than the rest!
body: Really easy and very accurate! I started with True Metrix... the readings were not consistent and were 30 to 35 off of my lab test results.  My A1C is spot on with the AccuChek system.  My sugr is great!

title: Easy to use, helps me stay on track
body: I love that this app has so many options when entering your blood sugar. It helps me manage my sugars while I work out!

title: Awesome Blood Sugar App
body: This app is so user friendly and a very good tool for me to use to see trends in my sugars as well as being able to keep track of foods and how they are affecting my sugars throughout the day.

title: Cullen Givens’ Mommy
body: With Cullen only being 4 it’s so nice to have the Levels sent right to my phone and able to keep a log of different things in different ways.

title: Nice app
body: Like the app. I was hoping you could scan the food to get the nutrition info added. I am using another app for that then adding myself. Overall it is helping keep track of my glucose level and daily carb intake.

title: No sound after update
body: I miss the giggles after the input but it will not work since I updated. I have sound selected in settings.

title: I like it so far
body: I haven’t been using this app long but like what I see. I need to get to know it better and look forward to seeing what all I can do in this app.

title: Very useful
body: I've been using this app for  a month and so far it does a terrific job of keeping my numbers and keeping me motivated. I also like that it syncs with my health app! Thank you!

title: Very good free sugar tracking app
body: I have gestational diabetes so I had to start tracking my glucose levels pretty regularly. This app has a lot of features even on the non-premium version.

title: Good app
body: I like this app. It does quite a bit. The only thing I’m not pleased with is the subscription based model.  If I want the increased functionality let me buy the software. I don’t want to spend money on this for the foreseeable future.

title: Program review:
body: Very good program, and it is a lot more convenient than the paper books that kept disappearing on me. Bob Williams
response: Six stars!! Thanks so much for the awesome review, we really appreciate it!!

body: I like this app a lot. Anytime I get a new phone it is one of the first things I download! It helps me keep up with everything. This app somewhat motivates me to keep check in my blood sugars because the style and that cute little robot!!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has helped motivate you and keep track of everything diabetes related.

title: It’s very useful
body: This whole blood glucose testing is new to me. But this makes everything easy and quick to keep records for my doctor. Thanks!

title: Intriguing concept
body: The positive feedback from the monster is encouraging, and my wife finds the noises amusing. Giving me a place to log everything helps keep me on track. So far so good.

title: Makes managing diabetes fun
body: Lots of features and zero issues so far. I only wish the type could be set to a slightly larger size—blurry vision is real, y’all.

title: Best, most inclusive app
body: Love the customization options in this app. It is helping me to be in control of my insulin resistance. Thank you so much for all you guys put into the app! And a shout out to my coach who is so patient and wise.

title: I love this app
body: This is a great app!!I would recommend 100%! I have lived with diabetes for almost 5 years. It has been VERY difficult! ( I consider myself a diabadass)  haha any way this has helped me so much!

title: Better than I expected
body: I’m new to pre-diabetes. While my Registered Dietician said I could just jot my blood sugars down, I really wanted to find an app. I’m sure something existed and this is it!

title: Helped
body: Helped to really track my sugar thanks for opening module for free for a while. Need to invest in new meter to auto update input. Still not sure on a lot of features but

title: Great app!
body: Been using mySugr for several years now. Real easy to navigate and make notations as to what caused a change in your glucose level.

title: Fun App
body: It make a little game out of tracking your food and blood sugar. I have not always been good at keeping track of these things but this app is helping me to remember.
response: We're so glad the app is helping you to remember to test, we think it makes things a whole lot easier :) Thank you for the positive review!!

title: Health apps
body: Trying out many and this is good so far. Easy to use, and reinforcing, except I hate to have to connect to my computer to import readings from apps. Might be a me issue?
response: Thank you for the awesome review!! There should be a way to connect to your phone without needing the computer. support.mysugr.com/hc/en-us/categories/202576347-data-import take a look at our support page and there may be an answer there. If you're still having problems please reach out to our awesome customer support team support@mysugr.com and they should be able to help you in no time :)

title: Records sugar levels well
body: Rates sugar levels as good, average and poor. Provides graph to connect readings. Only using the free version. Would pay for the full version if I was not getting sugar strips from insurance.
response: Thank you for the positive review!! The free version is awesome too :)

title: Loving it!
body: I have been using mySugr for a week now and it has helped me keep track of my glucose reading and I have noticed my numbers are dropping bc I am more aware. Thanks for the great app.

title: Nice !!!!
body: Love I can record all my Blood Sugar and other data, also love how it calculates my A1c though it can be inaccurate but not to much. Love this app and would recommend it to others.

title: Helps me stay in track and motivated!
body: This app is actually fun!  I enjoy the little animations and I feel motivated to record my data. It helps me remember to do that. Thank you!

title: Very Helpful
body: Just started using this app and it has been a great way to monitor my sugars. I test more often which helps my decision about what and when to eat.

title: Love it!!
body: This app has helped me keep track of my blood sugars and trends. I work swing shifts, so sometimes it’s hard to see trends. This app has already shown me what happens before my “trouble times”. LOVE IT!! Thank you!!!!

title: Keeps me on track.
body: This app has helped me to get back on track with checking my sugars daily. I appreciate the encouragement the little monster gives me.

title: New update is not as good
body: I don’t like how it reminds us to enter carbs when bolusing. 1 I don’t want to enter carbs at all 2 sometimes we bolus to correct. Just an extra tap every time I enter data which is annoying

title: Super simple and convenient!
body: Highly recommend this app to keep track of your glucose levels. Very user friendly.

title: Nice, but where’s the Support for Medtronic Pumps
body: I use the app daily, but I wish I could wirelessly input my blood glucose results and bolts info.
response: Can you write to us at support@mysugr.com, we'd love to chat with you and see how we can help!

title: Best blood glucose meter-integrated app
body: I’ve used many blood glucose apps over the years, both stand-alone as well as meter-integrated.  This one is the best app I’ve ever used...of EITHER variety.

title: Fun app!
body: It’s like getting stickers as a child when you do well! I like the free app but wish I could get more without having to pay for the extra stuff. It works for what it is and that’s fine with me!

title: Great app
body: Easy to use and it keeps me honest. I don’t take any diabetes medication so I’m keeping it in check with low carbs and walking 2 miles a day. My blood sugar readings have been phenomenal!

title: Excellent, flexible app
body: Makes keeping track easy.

title: Great app
body: This helps me keep track of my blood sugar plus if I’ve done any exercise or taken all my medication. I would like to subscribe but it’s too expensive for me.

title: Keeps track for me
body: I write down my blood sugar every time a take and on this ap I can keep it, instead of carrying around a little calendar.

title: Overall good program
body: Syncs well with my accucheck and fairly user friendly. Wish they had an integrated counting carbs feature that could count the carbs of food choices that you put in.

title: Nice but need to fix bugs
body: I am holding back on 5 stars because there is still a bug that prevents your nutritional information syncing correctly, if at all, so you have to do it manually.

title: Motivating and effective!
body: This app helps record nearly all aspects to control BG, and it’s cute! The little monster makes it a bit more fun to log and keep up with it.
response: We're so happy to hear that you're enjoying the app and having fun with it :) Thanks for the awesome review!!

title: Amazing
body: This app seemed to be a pest at first but really helped me remember to track my sugars consistently when I using my glucose meter. The estimated A1C is really interesting as well, it is nearly exactly my A1C when I did lab testing.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are glad to hear our app ended up helping you.

title: Great tool for diabetes management
body: I love how simple it is to put your information in and track your daily intake of food and insulin.  Would recommend to all.

title: Grateful
body: Grateful for the app. I recently became an insulin diabetic and need all the help I can get.  Your app is amazing and I can’t thank you all enough. I’ve told my friends and family all about it. ❤️

title: Best one out there
body: I have tried different apps. I would say this is the best for me. I like the A1C feature. Shares data with my phone app so it gives me a complete map of my health.

title: Great, straightforward app!
body: This app is super easy to use and understand.

title: Gd
body: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and this has been a life saver to keep track of my bs. Super easy to use and I just give my phone to the ob to look at each appt. She really liked it too bc she could quickly id trends based on the colors

title: Very helpful
body: So far I like this app immensely. I am however having to enter information manually as my iPhone SE will no longer pair with my accu-chek guide meter. Keep up the good work guys, you’re helping a lot.

title: EXCELLENT...
body: Even the basic subscription is very helpful.  I would go Premium, but the $49/MONTH is so much higher than I paid a couple of years ago, so I will go basic only.

title: Beat the stress use this app today
body: Newly diagnosed after a near death experience. This app is helping me recover and manage my new life. I can’t say enough good things about it. It’s a must have!!

title: Awesome app!!
body: Very easy and supple to use. Nothing fancy just tracking blood sugars but there are a lot of other perks if you choose to use them and to push forward!!
response: Thanks so much for the great review! There are some challenges in the app if you want to check them out :)

title: Great app
body: This has become the most important app on my phone.  Not only tracks my blood glucose but everything that effects it as well.
response: Thanks so much for the positive review! We love to hear that mySugr is helping :)

title: My Dr loves the reports it gives
body: Made me look like a star at my last check up. It makes it easy to track all my results, what I ate, dosages, etc., all on one page.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We love hearing that monster tamers have better experiences at their doctor visits thanks to mySugr :)

title: MySugr is the best!
body: This app has become an integral part of my diabetes care. It helps me manage my blood sugars AND it has a sense of humor! Now if only I could find that in an endocrinologist...but really, I absolutely love this app.
response: Too funny! Thanks for the positive review and we're glad to hear you appreciate the humor :)

title: Suki
body: I love this app. It’s easy to maintain and it helps me with controlling my blood sugars. I love the little guy that keeps me in-the-know 😊.
response: Thanks for the great review! The monster can make tracking a little more fun :)

title: Excellent app.
body: Easier to set goals & track everything with this app. So many extras! Notes. Pics. Food types. I believe even Blood pressure tracking.

title: Great app for tracking diabetes!
body: Great overall, especially the a1c estimator. Would be 5 stars if we could enter nutritional info to track exact nutrients by meal or snack for holistic tracking via barcode and food database. Thanks and keep up the great work!

title: Luv luv
body: Love the  manageability part of the app plus the feature to consult someone if I need to. I would rate five stars if the PDF format files were free but you can’t have everything LOL I cute lil sounds when you enter your blood sugar levels lol

title: Thanks
body: This system allows me to record so easily. The encouraging laugh is a plus. More education is always welcomed and not in a scary manner. Encourage us to always do well. Thank you.

title: Nice little app to track levels and what affects
body: I tried three other apps before landing with this one.  It’s easy to use, the reports are nice and easy to export for my dr.

title: Great to keep track of everything
body: Love this app. I’m an adult and I don’t care about the kid aspects of it. The tracking and ability to email my stuff to my doc is gold.

title: Solid app
body: Love this app! Helps me keep track and to add my exercise goals. I know my blood sugar levels are good with exercise- learning each day to use the app better. Thank you!
response: Thank you for your great feedback ☺️💚

title: Decent app, would be better if features worked
body: The app is ok overall, but I’m having an issue with the reading of A1C. App says I have enough data recorded but doesn’t display the A1C. Support is also non-responsive. Fix these, and I’ll give a higher rating.

title: Good app to help track BGL
body: I have the basic no paid subscription.  It is helpful with tracking my blood glucose level throughout the day. Also helps with medicine tracking and activity level.

title: Simply Awesome
body: My son recently was diagnosed and this app allows him to input his numbers and my wife and I can view it by simply logging in on our devices. Really reduces the worry monster.

title: Great App!!
body: I have been using mySugr for about one month now and love it!  It makes it easy for me to notate by blood sugars, insulin and carb intake and see patterns.  It also allows me to see how different foods affect my blood sugars.

title: mySugar kudos to you!!!
body: Very good job of being creative and making me want to keep track of what I eat. I like that we can name our little monster. I think it’s a smart app.😃😊

title: Great App
body: The app keeps me motivated to continue on my path to reduce my blood sugar without medication. I Love the little jolly icon that makes me happy when I meet my goal. Also, love the projected A1c option.
response: Hi! Thanks for the great review. We also love the little dancing monsters :)

title: Easy peasy
body: Allows me to quickly amd easily track my sugar and best of all ad free. Instead, the developers limited the abilities while still keeping it useful. Thanks for such a wonderul app

title: Fantastic App
body: I really like using this app to help control my blood sugar. I can track everything including if I am fasting or if it’s after eating or a bunch of other variables.

title: Awesome app!
body: This holds me accountable and helps remind me to stay ahead of the diabetes with my diet, exercise, and medication. It’s also a blessing to have help available. Thank y’all because I truly believe mySugr was created with love.
response: Thanks so much for the positive review!! It was definitely created with love :)

title: Easy to use!
body: Easy to use and track many items related to my blood sugar. Makes follow ups with the doctor and staff much easier!
response: We love how much information can be easily shared with the doctor and helping decision making :) Thanks for the positive review!!

title: Best Sugar Diary!
body: I am very pleased with this app. Not only does it motivate me to continue to check my sugars twice daily like my doctor asked, but, it keeps all of my info in one place. Thank you!
response: Thank you for the awesome review!! It's so much better to be in the digital logging era, no more paper books to lug around :)

title: Glucose Monitoring Made Easy
body: App is a well thought out tool in monitoring and managing daily glucose levels.  Engaging and detailed input levels has made me better at managing my diabetes.  Thank you!
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We are so happy our app has helped you in fighting your diabetes monster.

title: Excellent App
body: Excellent app, easy to use. Keeps great track of my numbers and progress. I just wished there was a straight out purchase for the app instead of a monthly fee.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so happy to hear our app has been helpful for you. When you go to upgrade within your app there should be an option to pay $27.99 for a yearly subscription. If you are not seeing this or having any trouble please reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com and we will be more than happy to help you get started.

title: Monster sounds
body: I know it sounds weird, but the cute sounds the monster makes when you record an entry makes me want to keep entering. This helps me stay mindful and make better choices.
response: Haha! We do not think it is weird! We think it is great! Thank you for the positive review and keep up the great work, we've got your back!

title: Very simple
body: I really enjoy using mySugr. It makes it so easy to keep track of my numbers. I was recently diagnosed and didn’t know what I was doing. This app has helped immensely!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been helpful for you!

title: Shrinkparts
body: Great app! At 54 I was recently diagnosed with Type 2 (10.0 A1C) and this app has helped me get control of my blood sugar. In just three months my doctor has taken me off my meds. I’m now at 6.0 A1C!

title: MySugar app
body: Great app! Much better than having to write down with pen & paper. Let’s you see what’s going on with the graphs also! I highly recommend to any diabetic!

title: Convenient integrated tracking
body: Good tracking of manually entered glucose & blood pressure taken from Apple Health app .  Would be more convenient if glucose level auto transferred via blue tooth.

title: Easy and fun to use!
body: I've used many blood glucose trackers on the iPhone. This is by far the best one I've ever used. It's easy to use, has a slick user interface, and it's even fun!

title: Good program
body: No problems using this program. I have been using it for quite a while now.

title: Help me out a lot
body: This log is an easy tool. Since my diabetic journey began I have tried a few different apps and have found this one to the best.

title: Important app Is there any place to log your calories
body: It’s been a great app to use, helps me keep up my test before meal and my carb intake.

title: Easy Tracking
body: Perfect for keeping track of sugar levels. Easy to use. Easy to read. Always convenient.

title: Free is free
body: I am enjoying the free version.  I basically only use it as a daily record for my meter readings. I found the app late into my diagnosis so I already have other elements in place for many of the pro features.

title: Very helpful
body: This app gives me the motivation to remember to due my sugars and carbs and a place to store my health data safely and know where I keep it. Really helping me manage my diabetes and combat my obesity.

title: This is easier than the one the doctor sends off
body: Up and down. Grand Canyon approach is easier than across the page. This,for me is also way less scary but I don’t understand the Yuma and yucks. But they are cute!

title: Thank Y’all So Much‼️
body: I am so impressed with the results I am getting due to how easy it is to log in my information‼️Thank You so much‼️My Drs are very impressed with my results so far‼️
response: Thank you for the great review!! :)

title: Review
body: This app would be great if I could keep it connected to my accu chek guide. It’s an everyday frustration. Doesn’t keep track of my steps, won’t register my blood sugars. I have to keep a paper log. Connecting to help means signing up for unwanted supplies. Since I’m on medicare, I don’t want to order supplies through the app. Disappointing performance.

title: Nice BUT...
body: Multi meters an issue. The program is great EXCEPT handling readings from multiple meters. Needs to automatically accept readings from multiple meters without having to deactivate and manually reactivate
response: Thank you so much for the positive review!!  Thank you for your feedback as well. Our users always have the best ideas. We've gotten a few requests to pair multiple meter and are working on it now ;)

title: Staying on top of things.
body: Easy to read. Easy to edit when my clumsy fingers hit the wrong key. Keeps me motivated. Newly diagnosed so helps me stay on the right track.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad to hear that our app has been helpful for you in motivating you and keeping you on track with your diabetes!

title: Great app!
body: This app has helped me a lot more than anything else I’ve tried to keep track of my BGs. The chart is beyond helpful and that it’s helping me remember all my steps around each meal/snack is more than I could do on my own.
response: We're so happy to hear that the app is helping :) Thanks for the great review!!

title: Way too expensive.
body: $2.99 per month is way to expensive just for me to record more about my blood glucose levels, carb intake, etc. Diabetes is expensive enough as it is with insulin, pumps, CGMs, test strips, etc. I love some of the features this app offers, I just wish I could have more of them without paying $2.99 a month.
response: Hi! Thank you for the review and we are sorry to hear the $2.99 is out of reach for you at this time. We definitely hear you about the cost of diabetes being too much for many people. Unfortunately, we are not able to offer the Pro version of our app for free at this time but we hope you will keep using the free version!

title: Huge Adjunct!
body: My Sugr interacts with many of my other apps to make BCG’s, activities and food input so easy it is ridiculous! So glad to have been bumped off my original app to find My Sugr.

title: Good App
body: I wish there was a food log that saves your last meal since diabetics eat usually the same thing to keep sugars leveled. But it’s helpful. I use it for the sake of nutritionist & clinical pharmacist.

title: mySugr newbie
body: Just starting on tracking my blood glucose and testing different food items and recording it in mySugr. I am very hopeful. The app is very easy to use so far. More later!

title: Works well with apple health
body: Been using this app for two weeks. Easy to use and so far has worked well with my other apps.

title: Fun and functional app
body: I love the detail you can track in this app. I’ve been using it for years and it’s simple to navigate and the monster makes it fun!

title: Convenient
body: So far after a few weeks the app works very well. I store my meals and my readings. Graphing makes it easy to follow my progress. I can follow my eating patterns also.

title: Neat tracking app, needs work on quality.
body: I frequently need to re-enter information due to crashes (iPhone X on unreliable network). Also, stop attributing locations automatically. It keeps picking the lacrosse store three blocks away.
response: Hi, we are really sorry about that! Please send a message to support@mysugr.com, then we can have  a look at it!

title: Great tracking app
body: View easy to use and customizable to meet your tracking needs. Also a fun character to react to your inputs. Definitely a great tool!
response: We think so too! Making it more fun to track your data is the idea :) We appreciate the positive feedback.

title: Top notch diabetes management tool.
body: Very useful tool to help manage diabetes with a user friendly interface. It has helped me regain control and a better understanding of my blood sugars.
response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's pretty cool to be able to see all your information :)

title: Awesome
body: It is easy to keep track of the sugar levels.
response: Thanks for the great review! We love how much information can be tracked in the app too, makes decision making a whole lot easier :)

title: Love it!
body: This is a great way to keep track of my blood sugar. I like how it’s easy to use and you can add information for more efficient tracking.

title: Super app
body: I’ve used it for a bit over a week, found out that I can configure it for me, and what I want to record, its versatile and syncs with my iPhone health app too.

title: Nice
body: App has a lot of options to customize your input, not only blood sugar, but also activity food and even blood pressure results.  I was impressed!

title: A big Thank You
body: I’d like to say thank you for helping me keep track of my Sugar levels. This app is saving my life. I’m able to keep track so that I can show the Dr.

title: Nice program
body: I would recommend this tool to diabetics. It is easy to understand and work with.

title: Great App
body: I’m enjoying getting to know the app.  My one wish was that it had more standard activity tags such as waking up, before /after all three meals and snack.   Otherwise, it’s very user friendly!

title: Great app
body: Excellent way of keeping track of my daily BS readings. No paper log sheets to keep up with. When my doctor asked me for a log of my daily readings, I just handed her my phone. Easy peasy.
response: We love how easy it is to share information too :) Thanks for the positive review!!

title: This Is The App To Use!!
body: Not only is this app very detailed, it’s a lot of fun to use. Very interactive, and are able to log a ton of info to keep precise logs of meds, numbers, and overall health!
response: Thanks for the awesome review!!

title: Great App
body: Very easy to use. Part of my daily routine. I don't keep a log book now just use the App. I send quarterly reports to my Dr. via email a week before each visit.
response: Thanks so much for the great review and feedback!! Those of us working here at the company and living with diabetes don't miss the paper logs either...what a pain :) It sounds like you're taking great care of yourself and very proactive about health management, keep taming that pesky diabetes monster!!

title: New update even worse
body: Rarely imports you info to the phone app. Sometimes it will if you turn everything off and on a number of times. Sometimes not. The estimated A1C was one of its best features but without the data you can’t get that. It’s a shame too because it was pretty accurate.
response: Thank you for your feedback, Marylin! We apologize that your experience was not as positive as we would like for it to be. It appears that our support team did not receive your initial request that was sent before Monday, or the copies that was sent after. Please be sure they are sent to support@mysugr.com (no "a" in "sugr") or just simply attach a screenshot of the initial cancellation request or mention the ticket number that was recorded with it to our team's on-going conversation with you. Thanks!

title: Excellent!!
body: This is an excellent app to use for your blood sugar and blood pressure.  I find it easy to use and you  can sync it with your other health apps, at least I can.

title: Amazing!
body: I absolutely love this app for tracking my diabetes. Makes everything so much easier for me. I have my blood sugars and what I ate all in one place and it makes it fun!

title: Best App!
body: Love using this app to keep track of my blood sugars.  It’s simple and fun but gives you and the doctor a lot of useful information to help control glucose levels.

title: Great App
body: Works great and tracks more information than anything else I've tried. Automatically syncs with Apple Fitness tracker (which is a big plus)
response: Thanks for the awesome review!!

title: My Opinion
body: I truly enjoy using this app. I wish I could use the full app, but I am not fortunate to be able to pay the membership fee.

title: Great app
body: Love the app. Allows me to track and see trends to help better manage my blood sugars. Easy to integrate with my meter but allow manual entries while my meter is sync’d OT another device temporarily

title: MySugr
body: I’m a new member and I have found the app is really easy to use! There is something I would like to see is more choices on the meal choices!

title: Easy to use.
body: Haven’t figured out how to change the weight from kg to lbs, and I wish I could export an Excel data sheet. Other than that, works great for what it is. :)

title: Easy to use
body: This app is very easy to use and helps me out a lot instead of writing down my numbers I just enter them into here!!!!

title: Wife/Grandmother
body: I like this app but wish It had a section to select the carbs. I rarely go look them up. It does make me more aware of my blood sugar. I find myself watching what I eat and testing more regularly.

title: Neat app. Full featured.
body: I like that I can add details around when I test my sugar level. It helps me remember what was going on so I can properly map my levels and feelings.

title: Perfect App. For Everyday!
body: Fantastic application for tracking all aspects of my daily routine! From insulin dosages, meals/carbs, physical activity, and more! The display is great for keeping track of your progress! 5 stars!

title: What a great app
body: I love the ease of using this app... wish there were more “icons” but I use the notes a lot!! Makes my blood diary easier to keep track!!

title: Easy to use
body: I’ve tried different apps for tracking my blood sugar. I have found this app by far the most beneficial for me.

title: Good/easy Tracker complete
body: This app is intuitively put together to easily get around in it. I’m using it only to track BS and BP and log in my foods in the NOTES option. Possibly may upgrade. Love the Singing Emoji!

title: Dario
body: I use the Dario Meter with unlimited strips and it imports well to your app. I like MyNetDiary for its detailed tracking though and it all doesn’t not carry over.   It just isn’t listed among all the types. I like the A1C Estimate and as many times I test a day, it is nice to see it was within .1 of my recent test.

title: Excellent app!
body: Great application with everything a diabetic needs to track and more!  The "tame your monster" game is fun and motivating and keeps you at it!  Will be upgrading to the pro version!
response: Thanks for the great review!

title: New to app

Just remember that you don't have to use them all, just what works for you :) If you have more in depth questions please feel free to reach out to our awesome customer support team support@mysugr.com and they should be able to answer any other questions you may have.

body: Love the app. This app has help me track my sugar better. Love that I can take pictures of my food. It makes my visit with my doctor even better

The app freezes constantly when adding new entries and I have to manually kill and restart it each time. Please optimize this to avoid the lockups or provide the option to revert to the old UI.

But when I open mySugr app the data isn’t there. I searched for help but found nothing. This seems to have been a hige waist of time.
response: We're so sorry to hear this! Please write to us at support@mysugr.com so we can help troubleshoot this issue with you.

body: We just celebrated our 1st year of T1d dx. This app has helped us so much keep track of everything. It would be cool if this link up with his dexcom app.

title: Great app
body: Just discovered this app a couple of weeks ago. It really been a great help to me in keeping track of my glucose level.

title: Great but...
body: For a subscription price I’d like to see this app do more. An integrated food library would be nice as well as the ability to predict highs and lows based on historical readings as the Onedrop app does. Overall, it’s solid.

title: Really good app!
body: I love this app for automatically tracking my BG readings!  That part is extremely easy.  The cons are that it doesn’t always sync right away and the “extras” are challenging to figure out.

title: Great app
body: This is great.  Not too simple, not too complicated..... tracks everything that you need to keep track of.

title: Helpful
body: I have finally found an app that clicked and actually helps keep my sugar in check.

title: Review
body: I only use the app to track my sugar readings and it does great for that. I do really enjoy the little guy when I click save.

title: Glad I found this app!
body: Easy to use, all the information I need to monitor my glucose.  Small fee for reports, but worth it.

title: Great app!
body: Was recently diagnosed type 1 diabetic and I could not ask for a better app to help me monitor and keep my sugar levels in control! Excellent!

title: God bless running Hba1c estimates
body: I used to snack binge at night when I only saw the effects every few months with at the doctor’s office with blood work. Immediate Hba1c estimates help me resist bingeing.

title: Makes Managing Type 1 Easier
body: I love the MySugr app and the AccuCheck Guide. Makes managing everything with Type 1 a whole lot easier! From all of us Diabadass’ THANK YOU!
response: Thanks so much for the positive review!!

title: Fun with all the Numbers
body: This is giving me a chance to keep all the things I try to keep in one place.
response: Thank you for the great review! The convenience of having everything you need to track in one place makes decision making so much easier :)

title: mySugr
body: I love this app so much because I have a hard time tracking my blood sugar numbers and this is a fun and efficient way to do that!
response: Thank you for the great review!! We love how efficient the app is too :)

title: CL type 2
body: I upgraded to the bundle, the feedback I get from the app when I test really helps me stay on track and has helped me lower my a1c. CL t2d
response: The free version works great! Thank you so much for the positive review!! If you ever consider upgrading to the Pro version you would have more tracking options as well as exported PDF reports to share with your doctor :)

title: Makes me laugh!
body: Who knew anything related to this crappy disease could make me giggle or smile just because. Thanks for making this part fun. 🥳
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad to have brought some joy to this crappy disease!

title: Great tool
body: Easy to use, encourages me to monitor more closely, and keeps me from cheating (much). Definitely contributing to better control - highly recommended.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review! We are so happy to hear our app has been helpful for you!

title: Program works like a champ
body: The program works very good. I upgraded to pro to print results. My doctor was pleased with the print out.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear both you and your doctor have been happy with the Pro version of our app.

title: Nice app
body: I like the way it keeps track of many different things that I can report to my primary care physician.

title: Great app
body: The app is really working well for me. Easy to use, I like how it automatically pulls the data from my monitor. The only this I wish it would do is allow copy/paste for meals. 👍🏻

title: Great app
body: App is great for diabetes management but wish more elements of the features were free.  Everyone is out for a buck! But can do basic management and up keep.
response: Thank you so much for your feedback Wina! We really appreciate it.

title: Catch the Monster!
body: Loving it.  The reports are ideal for discussing my progress with my doctor and tracking any missteps and learning what works to control my diabetes.

title: ACU Check Guide
body: Good device, however, after only a couple of months the Bluetooth connection just stopped working...really liked that feature...wish it worked!
response: We're so sorry to hear this! Please write to us at support@mysugr.com so we can help troubleshoot this issue with you.

title: Great App
body: With this app I am able to keep my glucose level in check. My actual A1C was 6.3 while the app said it was 6.2; this app is very accurate.

title: App hangs after enter Pin
body: I deleted the app, deleted paired Accu-Chek guide device and tried multiple times to pair for this app. It finds the device and then hangs after enter pin. No keyboard comes up to enter pin in my iPhone, to enter the displayed pin from the ACCU-CHEK guide device. I am now just using this with my Accu-Chek App. Things would be simpler if the ACCU-CHEK App could allow mysugr to read the data.

title: Thank you!!!
body: This app helps to see where I’m at with blood sugar levels and average them out. Simple and easy to use!

title: Highly recommended
body: Totally loving this app.  Ensure to take 3 readings everyday so at the end of 7 days you get an accurate data
response: Thanks for the positive review!! :)

title: Great app
body: Like having my own diabetes educator around whenever I want them. The pay app has a plan with unlimited strips! Try it out.

title: Even I can use this!
body: So easy to use! The only reason I didn’t give this app 5 stars is because there is no way to look up how many carbs are in foods.

title: Good tracker
body: This is a good app to keep track of your blood sugar. I wish that it could estimate the A1c without 3 samples a day.  I don’t want to stick myself that much. I like that it can give me an average by the week.

title: Does what I need it to do.
body: Simple interface to track all is feel like tracking.

title: Diabetes is hard work!
body: This ap is extremely helpful to track daily
response: Thanks for the great review!!

title: I was recently diagnosed with diabetes and I find this app helpful.
body: This app has been helpful and keeping my focus where it needs to be.
response: We're so happy to hear that you're enjoying the app and it's helping you manage living with diabetes :) There is a lot to keep track of and hopefully, mySugr is making this easier. Keep taming that pesky diabetes monster!!

title: Well done
body: I love this app. I wish the scanner worked w my lifescan meter. And I wish it had an add on for carb counting. But it is great tracking & motivator. I love the quiz too. Very informative.
response: Thank you for the positive review and feedback!! We love hearing from our users as they have the best ideas :) I will be sure to pass your ideas on to the appropriate people as those are awesome ideas!!

title: Great app
body: Love this app. Motivates me to test more and shows relationships between food and blood sugar. Could use a save function for notes so u don't have to type them in every time
response: Thank you so much for the positive review. We are glad you are happy with the app. Saving the notes is definitely a good idea and we always appreciate any input. Thank you! If you have any questions feel free to reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com at any time!

title: Easy to use
body: Its easy to use and the app automatically puts all the data into a easy to read graph.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad our app has been useful for you!

title: Best app for diabetes
body: Once u log your sugars and it tells you your a1c it’s pretty accurate because my a1c from mySugr and my a1c from my endo appointment was about the same
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and great feedback. We are so happy to hear our app has been helpful for you.

title: New user
body: Thus far I like this program. It’s a convenient way to keep track of my glucose level!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear you are happy with our app so far.

title: Straight forward and estimates A1C for free!
body: All I really wanted was something to track my glucose and A1C and everywhere else makes you pay for the A1C estimations.

title: Does what it needs to do
body: Functional tracker. Does what it claims to do. I’m using this one plus the Apple health tracker app. Not sure which one I like best at this point.

title: GE8599
body: Newly diagnosed Type II diabetic. Found this app and it is really useful and easy to use. Tracking my numbers has really kept me motivated.

title: Easy to use
body: I’m new to all this stuff and this app makes things much easier

title: Mysugr
body: Awesome app! I’ve been diagnosed as pre-diabetic & I’ve been using this app for a week now and I really like how it helps me track my sugar levels.

title: Review
body: This program is extensive and easy to use. It can be used by all ages. I like that about it.

title: Great app!
body: Very easy to use has many features to help track blood sugars and keep track managing our daughters diabetes!

title: Great tracking
body: This app is great for tracking blood sugar and medications and easy to vary with you to doctor visits to show them your numbers

title: Fun Sounds
body: It doesn’t have a food list you can select from to add your carb macros but it also isn’t complicated if you just want a snapshot of your sugar levels.

title: Awesome
body: This app has an amazing, simple interface. It’s super fun to use and having a built-in a1c estimator is really convenient. Hats off to the developers of this excellent app.

title: Great app
body: I have been using this for years to keep track of my sugar I haven’t utilized all the features but it’s a great tool

title: Love
body: I love the sounds and response after adding my blood sugar!  Much better than other apps!  That helps my awareness of my numbers!  LOVE!

title: Wish
body: Wish a1c was easier to get with daily readings
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. Thanks!

title: Great app!
body: I have tried lots of apps for monitoring blood sugar but this is the first one that has all the features I was looking for.  And... it is kinda fun too.
response: Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are so glad you have found our app useful and even fun!

title: Only one problem
body: When I record my blood pressure I like to also include my heart rate and this app doesn’t accommodate that everything else about it is really nice!
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) We are constantly working on improving and adding more to our app and we will definitely keep this idea in mind as we move forward. Thanks!

title: Blood Sugar Alley
body: Diabetic (Type 2) since 1994 and finally found this great app to log in my readings and still feel like kid. It does the job and keeps me informed.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review and we are so glad you have found our app helpful.

title: Easier than paper logging
body: Very convenient and simple reports weekly & monthly.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review. We are so glad to hear our app has been helpful for you.

title: Happy
body: Happy it’s you helping me you’ve been with me for a long time now you’ve encouraged me I way of paying you back!
response: Hi Debbie, thank you so much for the positive review. We really appreciate it!

title: MySuger
body: This is an excellent app for diabetics, easy to use and very helpful in tracking glucose levels. A great tool for the individual that is serious about controlling diabetes.

title: Loving the app
body: I have been using the app for about 2 weeks so far and love it's functionality! Keep up the great work.

title: Best App ever
body: This is an app to help keep you honest about your diabetic diet.  I love the reports.  This gives your caregiver the most information to make an informed adjustments.

title: Useful tool
body: I really like this app. It’s easy to use. Checking the reports actually make sense. I like the fact that it can estimate my A1C as well.

title: Helps me stay on target!
body: Data entry is very easy, reports help me to share my progress with my provider. I am staying on target using this app!
response: Hi! That's great to hear. Thanks for sharing your experience!

title: Excellent

body: I got get to write my sugars down some times and this app is on my phone so it is easy to get to when I remember.

response: Thanks so much for the positive review!!

title: Nice app

response: Thank you for the positive review!! the bundle is just $39.99 a month and has unlimited test strips...yes UNLIMITED! As well as a personal diabetes coach to help you through the times in between doctor visits :)

title: Amazing!

title: Helpful
body: Easy to use and helpful to keep track of my ups and downs. I e only used the free version but find it’s all I need for now.

body: I love your app. It works well for me. I live in the US and do not need insulin supplies because they are paid for by Medicare. It allows to include notes and other tid bits.

response: Thank you for the positive review and thank you for your concern!! We’re sorry you’re having trouble with pairing your meter!

response: Thank you for your feedback! I'm so sorry the app didn't meet your expectations. Please feel free to write us at support@mysugr.com and share your feedback with our teams! We'd love to find out where the app falls short for you.

title: Excellent app

We are glad you are so happy with the app and even considering upgrading :) The PDF and Excel reports available with the Pro version are great to have for yourself and also to easily share your data with care providers! Other great features of the Pro version are blood glucose reminders, multi-device syncing and more detailed tags! Just to name a few :) Please let us know if you have any questions and we hope you continue enjoying the app!

title: Nice stable app
body: Nice stable app for recording sugars and medications and viewing trends. The “slaying the monster” approach is used as a lighthearted incentive (and you can turn off the audio when you tire of it). The free version is definitely useful. The subscription version might be nice if you have a meter that syncs data with mySugr covered by your health plan (mine doesn’t). There are some extra features available in the subscription version (e.g., photos of meals and extra event categories/rationale), which also enable you to “earn” more points to slay the monster.  My largest negative/frustration is the way it defines the minimum number of results for calculating HA1c estimates. My insurance only pays for 3 finger sticks a day (for type II), so even if I have months of data recorded, mySugr will often state it has insufficient data. Most people will visit a doctor during the day, so there will always be a partial day of data (for me that is less than 3 sticks). It does not make sense that it will provide me an estimate of HA1c at 11:59pm, but won’t at 12:01am (2 minutes later), although it has the same amount of data. Based on responses to help tickets, this is currently considered a “feature” rather than a bug. Technically, this would appear to be an easy fix [e.g., using 24 hr periods (rather than “days”) or calculating using the previous full day]. I’m guessing that changing the calculation might require a recertification cost, since it is certified as a medical device, so maybe we will see an improvement in later?

title: Best Diabetes Management App EVER.
body: Never, in all the years since I've had type 1 diabetes, have I had a better time taking care of myself than with this app.

title: WOW and Double Wow!
body: I've been a diabetic almost 20 years and have been on an insulin pump for almost 10 years. I have to admit that my record-keeping had become rather lax. Some of my blood sugars are transmitted to my pump but since I use multiple meters, many values were not in my pump. I thought I was remembering to manually enter values into my pump, but when I compared  values in the pump to all my meters, I wasn't even getting half of them. I knew I would not keep up with a manual log and had tried a couple of other diabetes trackers but found them cumbersome.

title: HIGHLY Recommend THIS APP!
body: This app is the best app on my phone. Considering the circumstances it's also the most used app. I haven't found a more well rounded, fully integrated, user friendly app for tracking blood glucose levels than the MySugr app. I have my Mom, Dad, Sister, and two Aunts now using it, and my favorite thing about it is that they are keeping better track of their numbers and living healthier lives because this app makes it easy for them to do so. My fav feature is the timer, but I really would like to see it extended out to 6 hours. I am on a 4 hour testing/insulin schedule and usually set it for 3 hours and then reset it for 1 hour. So I'd really like to see more time on the timer. Also...with the mood icons, I'd like you to add one for nausea and/or vomiting. Nausea/vomiting can have a significant impact on blood glucose levels. Other than that, the app is great. Keep up the good work, and I can't wait to see what you have to make the app bigger and better down the road!

title: By far the Best!!!
body: I've tried everything and all have been quite inadequate in their functionality and display. From buggy software to confusing readouts that separate one single time entry into 3 separate lines making unneeded clutter mySugr solves all with grace & fun! It even was the 1st app to make me stop using my own created app with Numbers. A lot of time went into this and I find myself just looking through all the features & info because it's fun doing so with this motivational reward based app emulating the fitness apps with points and reward notifications. No matter how we get we never outgrow the desire to receive a 'Gold Star' like accolade. I find myself subconsciously trying harder and thinking through my choices throughout the day. The only gripe: I wish I could at least reorder my logbook tabs without having to pay the extra $20 since that's the only added feature I want. Great work mates!

title: Amazing app!
body: I installed MySugr the day I was diagnosed with diabetes. I started with a blood sugar level of 280 mg/dL in the morning and 350 mg/dL one hour after a meal. After a constant monitoring and logging with this app, walking 5 km per day outside (I use the Health app to keep track for now) and a reorganization of my eating habits, I am down to 89 mg/dL in the morning and 133 mg/dL one hour after a meal, 8 days after the initial diagnosis. I am giving this app a 5 star rating, although I am missing a few features. I hope they will be integrated in the future: I would love to have a more extended integration with the Health app, as there is valuable data in there (i.e. how many steps I walked and when I walked). I would also love to see integrations with third party apps. For example, I use MyPlate to keep track of my food and fluid intake and it syncs carbs, fat, etc with the Health app. It would be great if MySugr would a) sync those nutritional values from the Health app and b) import what I ate from the MyPlate app as a comment into MySugr and c) import my burnt carbs, so that I could show this data to my diabetologist in the report. There is now a lot of data out there and I hope MySugr will make the best out of it. Just seeing what you do and how it affects you can have a very positive impact on your life style. This could be useful and helpful for so many people!

title: Life Changer for a new Diabetic
body: I was recently diagnosed with T2 diabetes and I wanted to be proactive in my treatment. After doing a lot of homework and trying out really clunky and frankly boring apps, I found mySugr. I cannot say enough about it. It has changed my life. It’s easy to use and fun. My whole family smiles when they hear the Diabetes Monster laughing or squealing. I show their intro video on their website to so many of my family and diabetic friends. Why does diabetes have to be so boring and like an awful curse? This app helps me stay on track and the monster helps me motivated. I would love to see them add a carb dictionary/encyclopedia to the app because as someone who is new to this it’s hard to know or remember how much things count for. That would be tremendously helpful. Also, perhaps some more food category choices under the food boxes and also under the action items at the bottom (lunch, dinner, work, etc).
