I find this to be a lame feature as I am sure most of the users are not adolescent. It truly serves no purpose and it does not render the user anything.

title: Best diabetes app ever
body: As I a diabetic for over 10 years I have had trouble keeping up with managing it and remembering to do the things i need to do. This app helps me stay organized. It helps me to remember to test my sugars and to log my food. Then when it comes time for my endocrinologist or nutritionist appointments, I can give them an easy to read .csv file so they can make more informed decisions to help me manage my diabetes.

title: It's like a game
body: The input and interface is fun and easy and I like how it displays my progress. I've used it for a few days now and think it's one of the apps that I'll keep around. Looking forward to impressing my doctor with my improvement and showing him the log. Wish it would sync with myfitnesspal but hopefully soon.

title: Easy to use
body: We love using this app to help track what our daughter eats and how much insulin she gets. We have the Pro version so we're able to print out her log and bring it to her doctor appointments.

title: Best app I have gat!!!
body: I love the new features.  Thank you for everything on this app. Makes checking BS more fun & keeps my grandkids after me just to see how the monster reacts to BS reading.  Love the new features for pump users.  Thank you for everything you are doing for diabetics. My A1C is the lowest it has ever been thank you for helping me get it to a 6.8. I'm doing better w/my BS. I feel better than I have ever felt. Thank you.

title: BEST DIABETES APP EVER!!
body: I have had diabetes for twenty years now. I've tried many methods of journaling bg, exercise, and carb intake. This is the best app I've come across to help me with that. It makes it fun and simple to "beat the monster." I feel more in control as I am able to see my results from the week and see where I need to make adjustments. Thank you mysugr team for making it that much easier to manage my diabetes! Keep being awesome!!!

title: This app helps me stay on track!
body: Since I started using this app (which has been about 6 months or more), my blood sugar has been so much better. This has been the best app so far to help me stay accountable. I really like the reports! I can download and print my last 3 months to give to my doctor. I upgraded to pro and am very pleased. It syncs to the new Apple Health app, too. Highly recommend this app!!

title: Love this app
body: I do not usually take the time to write app reviews, but after trying this app for only 2 days, I'm loving it! I've tried the other free app with the most positive reviews and it pales in comparison!  Sure I could think of additional features that could be added, but in comparison to everything else I tried, this actually motivates me to track my glucose and it's super easy to use!

title: My reflection...congratulation your Apps now is working  very well on IPhone  with all features..
body: Your app crash in my Iphone 5  2 or 3 time a day and have to download it again. But I d'ont lose the Data.        Now I go to pro and I pay 19.9. $ still the same problem,What can I do Thx..same cause to crash when you try to send report by SmS .or any features other the mail in IPhone 5/6..

title: 2nd Review
body: After two weeks using this app,my blood sugars have dropped considerably. Easy to use. I was never able to track all that we have to report to doctor and I'm proud to say that I am "writing" down my meds, food, exercise, mood and anything that might affect my numbers. Again, thank you for putting in so much thought into this app. Oh, and I'm using My Fitness Pal with this for the carb counts.

title: Brilliant Diabetes App
body: I looked around for several and tried a few before settling on this one. It has everything I would need to track and more. The user interface is incredibly accessible to anyone.

title: Amazing!
body: My endo is always getting on me to log my sugars, log my insulin intake. This app is so easy to use! You can add your sugars, the time, insulin info, and add comments if you had to decease insulin for any reason. It is specific for any type of diabetes. The only thing I wish it had, would be if it had a location where you can add your insulin to carb ratios, that could be in the pro version though.

user_name: We don't need no stinking nickname
title: An app that works and fun to use too!
body: I have several apps for helping me track my BG levels.  This one by far is the best by far. Having a silly monster make faces or sympathetic noises when levels go haywire, helps make having to deal with T1D that much better.

title: User Friendly important tool!
body: I've been using this app for only a week, but it's been very helpful. I like being able to take a picture of my meal and looking up the carbs later depending on where and when I have a meal. Visually it is colorful and playful. I've paid for the full year and investing I'm my health is very worth it! As I continue to log, I know the reports will be very helpful. Thank you My Sugr!

title: Good app for tracking sugar levels!
body: I found this app and just use it to track my sugar readings. It keeps them all in a handy place. I was wondering about the A1c calculation and was in the hospital and was having my blood checked 4 times a day. The A1c showed an estimated 7.1 and I get a call from a nurse that said my A1c was 7.8, in the ballpark.

title: Best multi-device app out there!!!
body: Tried them all, but couldn't find a quick app that tracked the key things we wanted for our T1D daughter. This is so easy and helpful we finally stopped logging on paper. The real power for us is it supports multiple devices, so when I'm at work I can see how she's doing for the day. And the staff . . . Simply Amazing. Kudos to Fredrik for making us feel so welcomed. Vielen Dank!

title: Old  Lady
body: I have been a type 2 diabetic for about 24 years and I have always had a hard time controlling my blood sugar and doing activities  but this app helps me see what I need to do to control my diet and everything else that is needed to take care of myself. I am 63 years old and I need to loose about 100  pounds I feel that I will be able to loose the weight thanks to this app.

title: I LOVE this app!
body: I've been looking for an app to log my sugars. Sure, I could upload them via my meter and pump but it's been proven that better control is achieved through actual documentation of one's blood glucose levels and being able to see patterns. I've tried other apps and while they work, they're not as fun as this one. I'm so glad I downloaded this. It helps me stay on track!

title: Inspirational for T1 Diabetic
body: I was recently diagnosed with T1 diabetes as a 25 year old IT consultant who was obsessed with technology. As you other diabetics know, the technology out there, as well as the information, is appalling and shameful to the healthcare industry. The highest rated app for diabetics is s@&t but was our only resource until now. Thank you for providing an app that is easy and inspiring to someone who hates checking their sugars and had no app to motivate!

title: Great app
body: I Love this app, much easier than keeping a paper log and easier to see your trends.. I was over whelmed at first with all the possibilities with this app but you only have to use what you want to, but the more you put in it the more info you can track and see what your doing and how your body responds to different things!! I recommend this app for anyone with diabetes..

title: I'm a bad T1D about handwritten paper logging
body: So mySugr is pretty ideal for me. I'm also a Dexcom G5 user and you can get your reading through the Apple Health app. mySugr will then use Apple Health as a source and add your result from your Dexcom, so that's nice, but still need to manually enter BS if not integrated with the one meter they off access (Really, guys?! Please add more meter brands. Really wish it had an integrated carb count database of foods, but certainly not a deal breaker. To me, worth a yearly fee because I loathe paper logs.

title: Love it
body: This is a nice little blood glucose monitor with some cute features. It's a fun and innovative way to track blood glucose. You can export logs to CSV, which is good enough for me because I only want to print for my doctor, not share electronically. You'll have to pony up $28 for the ability to export your history in PDF or Excel format.  I already have enough diabetes related expenses, so I'll stick with the default CSV format.

title: Perfection! This app is amazing!
body: This app has helped me and my doctor so much in preparing to get on an insulin pump. I paid for the full year up front and it's the best app investment I've made. The only thing I would like to see is a way to look up carbs in common foods and restaurants stop I don't have to use two different apps.

title: Love the fun in this app
body: I use this app for my 9 year old son.  He loves the noises the glucose monster makes....it brings joy into an otherwise difficult task.  Easy to use, love using it to track numbers, patterns, etc.  My husband and I have it synced up on our phones so we can look at the numbers instead of constantly asking each other what his number was.  Two thumbs up!

title: Love it!
body: This app has made my pregnant, type-one-diabetic, accounting heart happy. I have tried many things to keep track of my blood sugar/insulin doses, but they were all inconvenient or bulky and a pain. Now I can always have my log with me, and easily see trends to make adjustments to my doses, which is so important during pregnancy. Love the graph and the monster. I will use this even after I give birth!

title: Amazing!
body: I searched (once again) for a blood sugar app after having a lot of them. I didn't understand the "fun" reviews on this one but I thought I would try it. This app is sooo much easier to use, it looks nice and the monster... Wow.. He's so cute and i look forward to his responses. It's like having my own personal cheerleader. I look forward to his cheers (and boos) with my progress updates. Good job! ✨🌟💫🌟✨

title: BEST app for managing diabetes
body: After my 8-yr old was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes two years ago, I started searching for apps to help with logging and analyzing. Every app I tried was either way too complicated or didn't do what I needed it to do. mySugr Companion is by far the best app out there!  It's powerful and logs everything I want to track but is still easy and fun to use. My daughter loves it and so do I!!

title: Awesome diabetes app!!
body: I've only used this app maybe a week or so, and it's already helped me a bunch getting me into a routine of sugar checking and taking insulin like I should be. It turns it into fun rather than a boring chore to manage diabetes. I am type 1 btw. I am considering getting Pro because the app has helped me so much. Thanks to the apps team I know this has helped me and I think it will help many more.

title: Really enjoy this app
body: This app has been so helpful. It has helped me get my type 1 diabetes under more control. It makes me want to check my blood sugars more, take my insulins and seizure medication. It's also helping me eat better feel better and feel in more control while still allowing me to feel like everyone else. Few glitches but they are improving :)

title: Excellent
body: Have been using this app for quite awhile now and really like it!  It's easy to use and my doctor likes how easy it is to read my sugar readings at my appointments - she can just quickly scroll down them know rather than fight through those old sugar reading books. I like the new app upgrade too where I can keep track of stuff more easily!

title: Extremely clever!
body: So, I love the professional and intelligently put together interface. The diabetes monster is a really nice motivational touch to what would have been an otherwise monotonous exercise, and my 7yr old daughter loves to hear the giggle. Those things are great and the app would have been deserving of high marks if that were all. But the fact is the app is really a tremendous help to diabetics. Six stars!

title: Fun, helpful, motivating
body: I am a T1D of 47 years. I am also a RN, CDE who has made log books for my patients to try to keep them on track in a fun way, but that was before smart phones.

title: It made managing my diabetes easy and reliable
body: I love this app. I've been diabetic since 2005, and I've always been somewhat relapse on glucose monitoring. And this app made it all easier to me. My exams are better, my average glucose is way better and I feel great.

title: Main Feature Broken
body: The app is advertised by both Aviva and MySugr as being able to import readings wirelessly. Only reason I downloaded it. Unfortunately, this app only recognizes one device. They've been saying support for Aviva is coming soon. I suspect issue is government related and not fault of Aviva or MySugr. Can't give higher rating without trying the features for which I got the products.

title: Has improved
body: I tried this app a while back and didn't like it. I like it now. I don't really miss that you can't note whether a test is before or after a meal. After all when the A1C is run it doesn't make a difference then. The only negative I have is that even though it works with Myfitnesspal it does not pull all the data in that is available. It also does not take all the data from the IOS Health either.

title: Absolutely love this app
body: I have had diabetes over 22 years now and the one thing I have hated doing is logging everything.  It was never fun.  With this app, I have fun logging everything I do.  The diabetes monster makes me want to log.  It is so easy to use and have never forgotten to log because of it!  Try it out! You'll like it.  I agree with those who have already posted!

title: Incredibly handy app!
body: This app has been a HUGE help for my husband and I to keep track of my 5 yr old daughter's diabetes. I love that it graphs her BG readings. It's so easy that she can do it herself!  Since she's newly diagnosed it's been a big help in identifying trends in foods, exercise and times of day. I love that it syncs itself to both phones so both of us can make/view entries no matter where we are. I can't wait to show her dr!

title: Great so far!
body: This is the first diabetic app I've used and it's great.  I like the challenges, the ease of tagging and input.  It even can accommodate my Omnipod usage.  I upgraded to pro when they had a sale.  It will be fun trying out the features, like printing out or saving all my info in a form my doctor will like.  The UI of this app is very nice, easy and intuitive to use. Thanks for making a great product!

title: Fantastic app for Type 1s!
body: Finally!  A diabetes app that is really useful for Type 1 diabetics.  Most apps I've found are tailored more to Type 2s.  Also, if it's possible to make diabetes management fun, this app definitely does that!  Quite amusing, and clever, while still being very useful.  It also seems like the creators really care and understand which I love.  Definitely recommend mySugar!!!! :)

title: Revolutionary
body: I have been diagnosed for several years and was getting complacent about testing and watching what I ate. This has really helped me get back on track by making it fun and educational.  It's making me think about what and when I eat/exercise. The little monster is just so funny!  I laugh now when I record everything instead of heaving a sigh of frustration.

title: Handy app for tracking B/S
body: This app is very useful as it allows you to track the rise and fall of your B/S, allowing you to enter readings, insulin, pills, carb intake and other notations.

title: Best logging app
body: I had been stuck at 7-8 a1c for years and within a few months this app helped me get within my target rage of below 7! The visualization really helped me tweak my insulin to the right levels. Thank you!

title: Wonderful!!
body: Thank you thank you thank you for this app. It's colorful design makes it a fun app to use. And taming the Diabetes Monster makes me want to keep coming back and stay on top of my diabetes. I'm 30 and have been diabetic for almost 13 years and nothing has encouraged me as much as MySugr! I've been using this app for over 3 years and I'm doing so much better because of it.

title: Simple to use, easy to understand
body: Adorable!  I really like this app. You are trying to tame the monster, which is diabetes. Each activity in the app earns you points which helps you tame the monster (and benefits your health too!). The interface is wonderful and sometimes I "tickle" my monster just for fun. It has allowed me to see at a glance where I stand. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent full/featured app to track blood sugar readings
body: This is a easy to use app to record your glucose meter readings.  Which then allows you to see at a glance what's going on and where you have been. Second only to the meter itself you need a log to help manage your diabetes. MySugr is excellent at doing that.  And its robust features allow you to get as detailed as you want.

title: Love it
body: This app is the only tool that has kept me motivated to track my blood sugars and meals for longer that a couple of days.  It would be perfection if I could also track how much protein I eat.  I use the notes function for now. I email'd this as a suggestion and rec'd a prompt and warm reply that they would bring it up in a mtg. My 4th grader likes to play with my diabetes monster as do I.

title: Amazing app!
body: This app has really helped me so much with managing my diabetes. Before, I was really struggling with keeping on track with my blood sugars and staying on top of them. Now that I have this app, I not only get helpful points, comments, rewards, and goals for myself, but I can see a timeline of my bloodsugars throughout the day and manage them that much easier. Definitely impressed!(:

title: Best of the bunch
body: I probably tried 10 different apps the week following our daughter's diagnosis if T1DB. This is the only one I found that would reliably sync and output reports that are clear and easily emailed to our doctor right from the device. We are syncing this app with three iPhones and three iPads and it works great. Worth the annual subscription price--look no further. *****

title: Life Changing App!
body: I love this app. I have tried to use other apps before but they were too tiresome to put the information in or they could only track some things. This app is the best, it tracks everything I need and it makes it both fun and easy. I have been waiting quite some time for an app like this. Thank you so much for making this app.

title: Really great app!!
body: I love the app, has all my data right at my finger tips,  the animated cartoon character is cute, and makes crazy little noises when you input data. Provides documentation I can take to my doctors office when I go, provides food history, and medication history.  Basically just very well thought out app with a good sense of humor.  I give it two thumbs up.  👍🏻👍🏻

title: Awesome app!!!
body: I have had type 1 diabetes for 15 years, but have always struggled to manage it well. I've only had this app a little while, but it has been incredibly useful in motivating me to test and take insulin, and I'm pretty sure I'm going to have a much lower a1c at my next doctors appointment. Love the fun design and variety of features this app offers - I highly recommend it!!

title: So great!
body: I have been pretty discouraged in my diabetes care over the last couple of years and then heard a Tedtalk by one of the founders of MySugr, making me realize that I wasn't alone in the burnout. This app has been extremely helpful in just the short time I've had it, encouraging you to log every little thing you do in order to have the best control. Love this!!

title: Family and Kid Friendly
body: This app works well for our family with a newly diagnosed Type 1 12 year old. All three of us can see on our phones his logbook and any of us can log at anytime. Print out is great for Doctor appts. Only wish it had a carb counter attached that added up the carbs and figured out the ratio!   Then it would be 10 stars!  Thank you for such a great app.

title: Makes life easier
body: So much easier to keep track of everything! My bg, my food, my activities and when I'm feeling weird. It's hard enough to remember to test regularly, but write down the results and everything else that's going on? This app makes it much simpler. I will be getting the paid version soon because it's worth it!

title: Life changing App
body: I have been a type 1 diabetic for 14 years. I have always had problems maintaining my blood sugar at good levels. Since using this app, along with a carb counting companion app, I have maintained a good blood sugar, and have drastically lowered my A1C to 6.1!!! Only suggestion would be a food diary with a carb counter, and water intake that will link with the Apple health app. Recommend to any and all diabetics.

title: 3 month review
body: Began using MySugr three months ago. Am finding it helpful to keep logging my entries and the analysis reports are excellent.  Would like a separate category to log A1c for tracking. Putting it in the notes area for now. Have had several communications with their costumer service. Very responsive and open to suggestions. Highly recommend this app.

title: Seriously wonderful app with whimsical touch
body: I've tried them all. This is without question the best by a longshot. Easy to use. Flexible. Thoughtful. Great and easy reports that my doc loves. Haven't really needed support for anything serious. However used support a couple of times. Response was accurate, fast, helpful and so friendly I felt like I was working with family.

title: Definitely worth it
body: I started using the free version of this to keep track of my BGs. I upgraded the app & it's definitely worth using.

title: Highly Recommended
body: I've been T1 diabetic for almost 10 years and this is the best thing that's happened to my care. I loved when Apple Health had blood sugar tracking, but it didn't really do much beyond that. This is a total solution to diabetes management that motivates and helpfully shames a bit. I've enjoyed using it and I've already started checking more often.

title: Best Diabetes App - Hands Down!
body: I love this app! I love it's ease-of-use, functionality and simplicity. I love the option to upgrade to pro to get analytics for you when your doctor, how awesome is that?! This has truly helped me understand my highs and lows and what foods cause them and the amount of insulin I need to take in relation to that info. This has helped me manage my diabetes more than anything else!

This is the first diabetes app that I have been consistent with. I love that everything is laid out on one page, and the graph that allows you to see how controlled your numbers are. I have been able to track my blood sugars much better. With that being said I don't like that some of the features you have to have a premium account for, (like the moods at the bottom). Overall recommend it!

title: App is ok
body: The app offers quite a few features.  I really dislike the camera feature. It is hard to get the camera to focus. I also wish the camera feature did more than just remind you what you have eaten. It would be nice if you can take a pic or a scan feature so it can automatically enter the carbs ect.  Keep in mind I bought the pro. I feel it takes to long to log something. But over all it is a pretty good log book.

title: Want the previous version back
body: I updated this after some issues came up and since updating, all it does is crash. The features I used in the previous version are no longer free in this one, and I'm not sure if the calculator is pro or not, but it's nowhere to be found. Customer support was on top of things when I communicated with them before I updated, and I haven't heard a thing since about any of the technical issues since. Too bad, I liked the app before. Back to pen and paper for me I think.

title: Easy to use - great results
body: Started using mySugr 3 weeks - switching from Sugar Sense app.

title: Easy to work
body: Very easy to keep track of my sugars. Have been using for 2 weeks so far. Before that I was writing them down in a log book. Much prefer this. My doctor will be able to look at today at my check up easier since I can include my food here as well. Love the challenges as well. Gives me incentives to do well.

title: Best detailed diabetes app I've found!
body: I've used simpler apps in the past, but they left me having to explain myself a lot at the doctor on days where readings weren't ideal. This app has all of the necessary options to get a full picture of what's happening. I love the monster, too. Diabetes is the worst, and having something fun as you track data is fun. Thank you!

title: Great App for T1D
body: Very easy to use. Great customer service! Love that we can track my six-year old-daughter's T1D seamlessly on various phones and tablets. I wish there were more child specific tags/features directly within the app. Otherwise, well worth the $20. We named our monster Sugar Booger, and both my four-year-old and six-year-old think he's adorable!! Thank you!

title: Best diabetes app
body: Very easy to make daily entries and fun.    Really thoughtful design however I don't like that it averages all my glucose readings together.  I take the time to enter meals, I hoped it would put my readings In context and treat 1 hr post meal differently than 2 hr.   I would like to see averages for fasting, before meals, and 1 and 2 hrs after meals.  Also please let me rearrange icons so I can move fasting to the first page.

title: Love
body: I have been a diabetic for 30 years and have struggled with finding an easy way to log my sugars and insulin. I really love this app! I wish I had a way to put in different pump bolus rates though such as square wave or dual bolus. I haven't found an app that is as good as this one, and has that capability.

title: Fun way to keep track
body: I love how you can upgrade to the pro version by doing what you're supposed to be doing by tracking.  And the new upgrade allows you to track meds which helps me remember to log how much I'm taking compared to writing it down in my food diary.  Great app for helping us diabetics stay on track!  Keep up the great upgrades!

title: Great App
body: I have been a stubborn diabetic for 12 years. After low blood sugar caused me to be in a very near fatal car accident, I decided that I need to take this disease much more seriously. This app has really made that so easy got me! It tracks everything I need to keep me on the right track, and keep my doctors happy! I'm lucky to be here, and lucky to have this app now as a huge help!

title: Great app, great support
body: Not only can I easily keep track of my diabetes information, the tech support team is very helpful if I run into issues. They get back to me quickly, answer my questions, and accept suggestions all while being very kind and understanding. I recommend this app, and I recommend the Pro version upgrade as well.

title: God for myomere - young, old, new or seasoned with diabetes.
body: I have been diagnosed as pre-diabetic. I want to stay off medication.  This app, which gives you an A1c estimation is great. When I started, my A1c was 5.6. With this app, some serious diet changes and many finger stick later, my estimated A1c is 5.0. That is not to say the app is accurate, but I wanted that goal and the app is really helping me obtain it.

title: AMAZING!!!
body: This app is awesome!  Once I purchased the full app the logging possibilities clearly eliminated several other apps. You can not only log your blood sugar but you can take pictures of your meals, log how many carbs, your blood pressure, exercises, and much more!  So far I'm loving this app! Now if only they can make this app compatible with the apple health app that would be stellar!

title: A little confusing
body: I think I like this app, but I'm still trying to figure it all out, like how to put in that you took some insulin based on your insulin:carb ratio but didn't check before you ate (my insurance only pays for 4 test strips a day).

title: Amazing App
body: This app is beautiful and easy to use. When I installed it I had trouble with reminders not working and contacted support. They were responsive and helped me resolve the issue in less than 24 hours.

title: Love this app!
body: I'm a type one diabetic with an insulin pump and I find this app to be super helpful when it comes to logging my blood sugar. I like the chart it gives with the blood sugar, carb intake and insulin received. I also like the feature of the diabetes monster as well as the challenges you can use to challenge yourself. All around great app for diabetics of any type!

title: Best Tracker Yet
body: This is one of the easiest diabetic tracking apps I’ve tried. Entry is quick. I can make the vital entries quickly, then go back and add extra information later as needed. Along with the Health Kit integration (so I can use other apps for workout and diet tracking) and cvs export (for my spreadsheet habit) it’s made my data tracking and analysis easier than ever.

title: This app
body: This app is great it's an easy way for me to figure out what's going on along with help my doctor find problems. My only problem with this app is you have to be pro to actually send these to your doctor which I don't think is very fair. Over all I loved it,I love the monster face that you press and it makes different faces and sounds.

title: Excellent and fun app formanaging your diabetes!
body: As a 24-year-old it was extremely hard for me to find the motivation to keep track of my blood sugars and actively try to manage them. As much as I knew my life depended on it, I just couldn't. This app makes it fun and I actually look forward to my next blood sugar check and logging of foods and insulin take.

title: Starting to get better
body: This app didn't do much for me when I first started using it a few months ago. I'm starting to like it better since there are new options and a new look. Hope it just keeps on getting better.

title: Great up one thing it needs
body: I love this app it makes doing everything in terms of logging easy and fun by having daily points for making entries and challenges to add goals and excitement to your daily diabetic life ! The only thing it needs is on daily activities it needs a just woke up icon , for that spike or drop that some diabetics get:)

title: AMAZING
body: I'm 15 and writing down logs everyday is freaking annoying and I'm always forgetting to write down my blood sugar. So once I found this I was super excited. My endocrinologist gets really mad when I don't have blood logs for her to look at for any patterns, so she recommended an app since us teenagers always have our phones. I love it, and I am never going back!

title: Love the ease of using it!
body: I love how simple this app is to use! And I looked at a few apps before trying this one and I love that it includes gestational as a type of diabetes. Many diabetes apps don't do that. I'm glad to only need this app temporarily, but it was worth upgrading to the pro version to be able to print my logs out! I highly recommend using this app.

title: Really helpful while keeping it fun
body: Having been diagnosed very recently, I needed something that would help me track my carbs and blood sugar quickly and easily. Not only does this app do that, it makes it fun to update throughout the day. The ability to receive emailed reports and print outs to review and share with my doctor are fantastic.

title: Love it!
body: Inputting the information is so fun. I love the standard deviation of my blood sugar. The app makes trends so easy to identify. I like that I can include as much detail as I want but at the same time, I can see the big picture from broader analysis. A definite for those trying to get a better handle on their glucose control! Best app I've seen! I'm shocked more people don't know about it!

title: FUN
body: It's been said before, but this app makes logging FUN. Not only that, but the words of encouragement from the Diabetes Monster make me smile and motivate me -- and I'm a 36 year old woman! And the cake is that the design is elegant and intuitive and the reports help me see patterns I never could see with other logbooks.  My A1C is 6.5 because of this app, and I will convince every Type 1 I know to use it. MERCI!

title: Great motivation
body: I've always had a hard time staying motivated to test my sugar as often as my endocrinologist would like; but since I downloaded this app, I've been testing 6 or more times a day. One of the first challenges I did was to gain the pro features and I have continued to challenge myself to get 50 points everyday.

title: Incredibly helpful and surprisingly fun!
body: After only a week of using this app my bloodsugars have improved drastically! Very easy to use and the playful and aesthetically pleasing layout takes a lot of the drudgery out of diabetes management. I wish we had had something like this when I was a kid-- highly recommend for diabetics of all ages!

title: Doesn't hurt
body: This app has been wonderful for the simple reason that it has encouraged me to check my blood sugar more often and because of the simple, fun design I have enjoyed gaining points to get the Logbook challenges and the Pro for free! If you're a type 1 or 2 diabetic I couldn't recommend the app more, it really has only helped

title: To My Doctor
body: I've been using this consistently and it has been. Motivator to losing weight. I've lost 8lbs in the last two weeks because in working on getting my numbers down.

title: Easy and Fun!
body: I love this app. I have been diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes very recently. I'll share with you a secret, I'm only 11. the doctors told me about this app and that it would help me. the little monster helps me keep on track with my planning and data tracking. Thank you for making such a wonderful app that can help diabetics around the world! <3

title: Love this App
body: I was just diagnosed with diabetes 2 and it's been very overwhelming.  When I first looked at this app it seemed overwhelming too, but it really isn't once you take the first step and if you make a mistake you can start over.  I knew what I was doing in the app in no time at all.  I'm so glad I don't have to put this all down on paper!

title: Very good
body: I love this app for tracking my diabetic log. I would love to see them integrate a food log similar to MyFitnessPal that synced macros though, and for some reason it won't let me widen my view by turning my phone sideways. Since my access is all on a phone, I can't see all of my daily data without scrolling. It's a minor inconvenience, but it would be nice to be able to utilize that function.

title: Great for my needs
body: I am pre-diabetic and was just looking for a simple way to track my numbers. It was the cute sugar monster that caught my attention, but the app is fast, easy and encouraging. It helps me to remember to what needs to be done.

title: mySugr Companion well worth a try
body: This app has been making waves elsewhere and is finally available here.

title: It helps and it's fun!
body: I have been diligently logging everything diabetes on MySugr for well over a week now and I have learned about patters associated with certain foods, to allow me to bolus more accurately for them. In the process I have been able to accomplish tighter control. This app makes this process fun! I highly recommend it to anyone with diabetes!!

title: Easy peasy!
body: I've been diagnosed with gestational diabetes and will hopefully only need this app for a few months at most. I have to say that it has been extremely user friendly, especially considering I am totally new to this whole diabetes thing. I've recommended it to several friends already and my doctor loved it too!

title: Awesome!
body: My daughter, who is seven, absolutely LOVES using this app to keep track of her sugars and insulin! It helps make an often tedious and sometimes painful process a lot more tolerable, and even fun! She loves making the "diabetes monster" happy and can't wait to log her info in at each meal. Thank you so much to the app developers, we are so glad to have found this app!!!!

title: Diabetes Newbee
body: I absolutely love this glucose app.  I use it primarily to track my sugar levels throughout the day.  Having the ability to see my progress keeps me motivated to lower my glucose levels.  The auxiliary features the app provides like points for meals seemed cumbersome so I abandoned using the other features.  The app is GREAT for how I use it, and yea least I forget the cool sounds you get when imputing your sugar readings.  Tooooo cute.

title: Make Apple Watch support!
body: This is a great tool for us diabetics! I love the ease & simplicity of this app!

title: Great App!!!
body: This makes keeping track much easier. I feel confident that my doctor will appreciate this app more than me since it not only logs sugars but meal information also so that he can know why my sugar is where it is.

title: Excellent for children
body: My eight year old has T1D and loves this app. It has changed a frustrating process where I did most of the work to an enjoyable time for him. He loves taming his monster and I love the application to controlling your health. I only give it for stars because I wish I could pay as for pro version without coaching. I'm interested in the other features but not coaching or an ongoing cost.

title: Helps me keep track and so user friendly!
body: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes one week ago. Suddenly I have to check my blood sugar 4x/day and write down everything I eat. This app has made this so easy to do, and it is friendly and cute!  I showed it to my OB and he was able to quickly navigate it and find patterns. Thanks!

title: Really accessible
body: As somebody who personally hates logging my blood sugars, this app keeps it simple and has some nice features like a point system, and as my title suggests, it's easily accessible and can be customized to the user's satisfaction. It's super convenient, and has helped me log more consistently than I ever have in the 11 years I have had diabetes.

title: User of the app
body: I have used this app for a few weeks now and it is a better style than others u have used.  The fun factor it give makes you want to take your blood sugar where as in the past it was a pain for me.  I would recommend this app to anyone afflicted with diabetes. It kinda makes it as fun as it can be.

title: Love it!
body: I've been struggling to keep my Type 2 diabetes under control for awhile. This little app has helped me do that in just 4 weeks. I no longer go up or down but have a straight line everyday! The app makes it fun! My doctor is pleased and I can't wait to see my next A1c. I highly recommend this app to any diabetic! Love taming my monster!

title: Easy to use
body: I really like this app - but, it took me a little while to figure out exactly what everything meant and how to best use it.  I guess that this is more geared toward kids, we (somewhat!) older people need more explicit instructions. But, after I'd figured it out, I've really found it helpful, and I will definitely keep using this.

title: Just what I need
body: Having data is critical to managing my diabetes. The gamification of collecting that data is very well balanced. Enough to motivate me with being so much that it feels silly. I bought the app to get the extra features. I especially like having photos of meals that were difficult for me to carb-count. I later review them with my dietician.

title: Best diabetes management app out there!
body: Type 1 for 19 years. I've tried em all and this one is by far the best. It has helped me take better care of my diabetes by making a game out of setting goals and paying more attention to it. I've been taming my monster more and more often every week since I started. 😜 Download it, you'll thank me.

title: Handy but no buy option.
body: I like what options are available in the free option but can't give it more than 3 stars because reporting options are limited in free option. I would but this app if you could but they require a subscription rather than a one time option which I am not interested in. Make it buy able not subscription and I would try the pro version and maybe rate higher.

title: Good update, but there is still some missing.
body: I love the fresh new design of the new logbook app. I have had this app since November and I love it! The app is still a little unstable, but I know you guys will get that fixed. I have noticed that the analysis section of the app is not present and that was a feature that I used a lot. If you could bring it back, that would be great. Keep up the good work!

title: Great App!
body: I use this app to track my husbands sugar levels. It's easy to use and understand. I love that it works across devices. I installed the app on his phone and once I logged in on his, all the info I had on mine instantly showed up on his. It was great! I was expecting to have to manually type in weeks worth of info. Great feature!

title: They got greedy, time to look for a new app
body: I just updated to the newest version only to find that most of the tags I used before for my BGs are now only available in "pro" (not free) version. That's a really shabby and unfair thing to do to users, and it's not like the App Store let's you back grade to a better old version of it to compensate for this stupidity. If they're going to get greedy like this, I think it's time to start looking for a different logbook app.

title: Easy App!
body: Great, simple app to track my sugar levels.  Opens fast, intuitive.  If it could find a way to make the needle less painful, I'd be over the moon!  And live the easy badges to apply - before, after meal, bedtime.  Icons for hypo and hyper could be a little clearer, and one for "hunger"/ satiation level 1-10 would be helpful to understand flow of sugar levels.

title: Finally, worth logging!
body: I have always dreaded logging, but now it's fun! I love that its at my fingertips since I'm glued to my phone! The activities and challenges give me a personal goal and keeps me on task. This app is very user friendly, and I'm excited to be able to see my reports without having to power up my laptop. Love it!

title: As Important A Management Tool As My Metformin
body: This app is excellent.  Everything you could possibly want (well...almost) in a diabetes management app.

title: Thank you
body: From the bottom of my diabetic heart, thank you. This app is great! I am very brittle and have food allergies on top of the type1, and this tool makes dealing with food and bgs easier. I take it to my endo appointments to help me remember things I need to discuss with her. The app for kids that goes along with this would have been great when I was a newly diagnosed kid. Overall, nice job.

title: Best App for Diabetes Management
body: I've used different apps in the past but have always had issues with them crashing or being more time consuming to use. This app allows you to enter everything at once, the breakdown helps me see how frequently I'm in my target range and keeps me motivated in reducing my a1c!

title: It helps!
body: Let's face it...there is nothing fun about the doctor surprising you with the D word.  I hate the finger sticks and having to eat small meals closer together.  Remembering the protocol is still new to me.  This app does make a not fun lifestyle change a little less, well, not fun.  Even for a middle-aged busy lady, it does keep a humorous slant on accountability...and in my book, that is pretty good!

title: Recent update has let me down
body: I really liked this app before the recent update. Some of the features are Pro Features now and not everyone can afford to go Pro. I really don't like that the Go Pro Challenge can only be won once. I found it very motivational and wish it could be done once a month at least. All in all, it's a great app and I do like it but the update made some things better and some other things not.

title: Great diabetes logbook app!
body: I love this app! I have been using it for a couple weeks now and it really has everything I need to help me track and manage my T1D in a fun way! It is awesome that there is an app for diabetes that isn't so "medical" and boring looking. I love that I get weekly reports. The challenges are a cool way to keep me interested. In short, this app goes above and beyond.

title: Great App
body: Enjoying the monster. Makes entering all this stuff a bit more fun. I want to keep my monster happy!

title: Best diabetic logbook app!
body: I've been a type 1 diabetic for 15 years now. This is by far the best logbook app out there. Not only is it very easy to use it is also very helpful. Would recommend to any diabetic  type 1 or 2. It helps you see where and when high and low blood sugars occur so you can correct them and find that perfect A1C. A+

title: Really good app
body: Only thing keeping this app from five stars is the rate at which you earn points. My doctors orders are to check my blood sugar once daily  and as needed so my insurance only covers a certain amount of supplies, however to earn points with this app you need to enter blood sugars at least three times a day so my points are very few 😒 but I really like this app despite that.

title: Fun BG tracker
body: This is a fun app to keep track of bloodsugars, carbs, insulin, and other things affecting and affected by diabetes. I've been using the app for a couple weeks now and I'm pretty sure that's the longest I've ever tracked anything diabetes related in my 25 years of dealing with the disease. The monster is fun and the app makes tracking fun--something a pen and log just don't do. ;) thanks guys!

title: Great tool for any T1!
body: I used to write everything down in a log book that I had to carry around. This app makes me carry one less thing with me! The monster taming is a cute addition as well. This app is easy to use and very effective. I recommend this to any diabetic wanting to keep better track of themselves!!

title: Fun & Effective
body: PRO:

title: Adorable and Amazing!
body: This app is so adorable. I'm a fifteen y/o type one diabetic and I needed a logbook to put my blood glucose readings down. This app is perfect because its cute, keeps a graph, you can enter your bg, bolus, and personalize it. Recently, with this app, i have been taking note of my numbers and insulin doses and I feel more comfortable with my management. I highly recommend.

title: Fantastic app!
body: This app did a wonderful job in helping me keep track of my levels and become a very healthy diabetic. Not only a good way to track my levels, but it's done in a fun and easy way. Couldn't ask for a better app! My A1C actually went from 7.6 to 6.6, just by using it, because it was such a helpful tracker!

title: Everything Type 1 Diabetics Parent Need
body: As the Mom of a little 4 year old Type 1 Diabetic...the free app has everything I need. Our daycare provider has the app and the login info to seamlessly keep track of all her info. Would recommend wholeheartedly! We are purchasing the upgrade to help with timing and downloading all her stuff.

title: Pretty good
body: The only features I don't like are the lack of edit functions. For time of blood sugar/meal you can't record earlier blood sugars and mark the correct time. So when I think to log all my blood sugars at the end of the day, it looks like I ate breakfast, lunch, and dinner at 11:37pm. It also doesn't let you edit an entry so you have to know your whole meal in advance of logging it.

title: Best App I've Found!!
body: I've tried a variety of diabetes apps & this one is the best by far! Aside from tracking your stats& offering teaching tools, it's just plain fun! I like the challenges & it's easy to use. It encourages you to take control of your health & makes it fun to do it. I think that's key when it comes to dealing with this condition.

title: MySugr is the Best
body: Excellent, well engineered application.  Ahead of its time in customer service!  I'm sure that many diabetes applications available are good , but there is no equal to the MySugr Logbook.  I should know, I'm a programmer!  Reports, graphs, averages, standard deviation .  It's all there and easy to use.  You Bluetooth data in, use Importer to load data or easily do it manually.

title: Great way to track trends
body: Tracking my glucose levels and the things that influence it have never been easier. I love that this app imports my results from my testing app (via the Health app) and provides me several different views  for trends to help me understand what foods, activities and even moods are influencing my glucose levels. Great app and easy to use.

title: Really good diabetes management software
body: I use multiple machines and this is the one place I can keep, track, and report on my diabetes management.  The only thing this application doesn't do is allow me to input my oral medication, which I think is super important for tracking of what is going on inside my body during the day.  This would be a super add-on for those of us who have type-2 and are using oral and non-insulin based pen medication.

title: Great app for Type One Diabeties
body: This is a great app for logging and printing out info for doctors. It allows you to take pictures of everything you eat. I love the little monster , too cute. I just wish that the app had a tutorial when I first bought it, overall it is a great app and really makes logging easier.

title: Love this app!
body: My teenaged daughter loves to tame her sugar monster and I love that she logs everything. It's easy, quick and as much fun as a diabetes tracking app can be. Would love to see a report that breaks down bg by meal but it's easy to download to excel to do our own. Also love that we can both login to the same account from our own devices.

title: Love love this app
body: I can't say enough about this app. I love it. It has rejuvenated my spirits when it comes to "managing" my diabetes. The highlights for me are the pics, and related data and seeing the impact on my BG. It's fun- the challenges are a great idea and the sounds and format are a delight. It is so clear that the developer knows what it's like to have diabetes. Thank you!

title: Great app and tool
body: Makes keeping track of my blood glucose easier and the monster aspect makes it like a game so it's enjoyable to log my carbs and blood glucose levels. My coworkers also get a kick out of the noises the monster makes when you add a new entry and so they are supportive in the tracking my glucose levels and logging my carb intake.

title: The Real Deal
body: I've tried other blood glucose tracking tools and they were very boring.  This tool is one of the best. I highly recommend it for anyone that is serious about tracking blood glucose levels. I love the follow up emails and the animation used in the app keep up the good work hope you get a million+ users.

title: I love this app, and would have given it a five BUT...
body: It needs a place to record weight.  I cannot afford to pay for the "pro version" - after all having a chronic disease like this is expensive.  Nor do I care to have any of the other features.  But it would be very helpful to keep weight loss on the same app and not using a different one just for that.

title: Best Blood Sugar App
body: Have been using this app for a while an really love that it not only keeps track of food an my sugar readings but it also gives an estimate A1C ...... and I love the different personalities of the monster would def recommend this app for anybody who has diabetes an wants to keep better track of your readings and food

title: Wonderful!
body: I don't like having diabetes and couldn't stand logging in the book twice a day. This app is so cute and, more importantly, user friendly. I'm now down to once a day monitoring and I look forward to that little guys, "giggle" and "lol".

title: Good self-motivation, but rather simple design
body: It's useful as to tracking blood sugar, food intake, exercise, etc. and patterns can emerge.
response: Thanks for your feedback! What do you mean with "Don't have a way of turning off the log in requirement that's been added either." maybe you can explain it in more detail in an email to support@mysugr.com. Then our team can take care of it :)

title: Awesome!!!
body: This app is a must have for all diabetics! It's a lot easier and more straight forward than other diabetic apps for recording blood sugar. The challenges section makes it a fun and competitive personal goal to get better blood sugar readings. Also, the support from the app creators is extremely fast and responsive. Get this app!!!!

title: Very efficient and organised
body: I was always having trouble carrying a logging notebook with me to record the readings. When I found this app it made my life much easier. I could also add far more details than before which help my Diabetes doctor know what exactly needs to be adjusted to improve the trends. Thank you!

title: So helpful!
body: My son was diagnosed with t1D 10 days ago and I started using this on day 6. I love being able to track patterns and keep details of foods and activities. I can also send a report (with the pro version) to the PA who is helping us with his numbers. And my son loves the monster (I do too). What a great, useful, easy to use app!

title: Sophisticatedly fun
body: Never use to log my readings, but I decided to give this a chance and it's a lot more fun and easier to read than hand written numbers in a journal-like log book, because everyone has their cell phones it is conveniently accessible and more my speed with today's technology

title: I've ignored logbooks and apps until this
body: Something about it encourages me to log/journa when I check. Also I seem to be checking a lot more since using your app. I honestly don't like the monthly payment or else I would have bought your premium app already.

title: Only Diabetes app that helps u & never makes me feel ashamed😊
body: I have no complaints. I like the visual, game-like feel of this app (so much less intimidating).  Easy to use w/valuable lessons. I haven't been motivated by any other diabetes app, but this is really helpful & I'm finally encouraged  to tackle what I've been avoiding. I highly recommend this app.

title: Try it!
body: Type 1 diabetic for five years & never achieved good control of my A1c, but I'm very optimistic because of this app.  It has a slight learning curve, but ultimately very easy to use.  I love the ability to document what you eat with photos & the graphs are awesome.  I've tried Glucose Buddy & a couple of other apps, but nothing else compares to mySugr.  Awesome product!

title: Exactly What I Need
body: My 10yo was just diagnosed type 1 a few weeks ago and it's been quite the adjustment to say the least but this app is wonderful! I can see everything I need on one screen! I am still trying to figure it all out so I'm sure there are wonderful features that I'm missing. Great app!!

title: Excellent App
body: We are new to diabetes and and were happy to find this app to help along the way. Numbers and info are super easy to add. Notes and photo sections are very helpful for keeping track of details. And the yum-yum monster makes food fun, not a big pain in the @!&-carb. Might be nice to add food lookup and save feature. Thanks and blessings to all.

title: Pretty great
body: I love this app.  That it's so visual and the sounds are so cute makes tracking the various parts of my diabetes a little less clinical.

title: Best of all the diabetes apps!
body: I have tried several other logs, and this is the absolute best!  If I have to keep a log having it so easy and fun helps me to keep on doing my logging ... and I can see trends that need to be corrected.  Thanks so much!

title: Well thought out design
body: Very nice and clean design. It's both functional and pretty.  The report complete the app.  My favorite feature is being able to take pictures of my meals, it helps me think more about what is going on my plate and makes recording a meal while out with friends not so cumbersome.

title: Awesome app!
body: This app made tracking my gestational diabetes not only tolerable, but actually a little bit fun!

title: Great visual organization to track diabetes
body: I like the visual organization of everything with the badges and chart with matching colors arranged chronologically. Makes tracking things easy and something I look forward to! Would suggest to allow option for oral medications though. I just use the insulin option as a substitute but that's a way this could be improved.

title: Best app out there!!!!!
body: I hate logging and it is my doctors biggest complaint about me.  I've tried manually writing logs and lots of phone apps, but this is the only one that has worked for me.  It's easy, fun, love the challenges, and I'm actually logging everything.  My doctor is thrilled!!!!  Thank you and keep up the great work!!!!

title: So Helpful!!!
body: I Love this app. My son, 11 yrs. old was diagnosed with T1D on April 30, 2015. I found this app right away and have been using it to help both myself and his Endocrinologist keep track of his levels and also his meals. My son loves the sounds the monster has when eating. We get a good laugh! This is an excellent tool and is so easy to use!!!

title: This really helps me.
body: I'm 15, and I'm really grateful for this app. With me being a teenager all my friends eat all this candy and stuff and I used to go carb-overload with my sugars staying the the 300s to 4s. With this app in striving to keep my A1C down (after it was 9.4) and I'm keeping my blood sugars in the green. Thank you for helping me and keeping me healthy.

title: MySugr app
body: I love this app!!!! It is helping me keep track and I can print out MySugr logbook so my doctor can see what my blood sugars are doing and better help me. I know I can write them down and show him but I alway for get my book and I always have my phone. There is an option to print or email the info to your doctor.

title: Love this app!
body: I'm a new type 2, and a nurse that does a lot of diabetic education. Preaching it is a cinch compared to living with it. This app gives me the accountability I need along with some fun!  Just went Pro ($20 is too much? Really?? How many strips do you get for that??!) and Pro really opened my eyes to my trends!! If it made my meals for me I'd give it ten stars!!

title: Sound effects keep me motivated
body: It's amazing how the sound effects from the monster Kees me motivated. I went out of range and the monster ate my points and made a sound I don't want to hear again. I strive for my points although I have no idea what they are applied to (started using the app last week).

title: Love it!
body: By far the best tracking app I have tried! A few tweaks, and it would be perfect, but love it already. (I have searched for months to find an app that would let me enter data the way I record it (and focus really on glucose, carb total, and insulin). This is the best app yet! And I love the at-a-glance data snapshots. Super color interface.)

title: Love this app!!
body: I love, love this app!  I've struggled with my diabetes for over 20 years. This app makes it so easy to keep track of everything in one place. The only change I would suggest is to add a spot for water intake, and a page or tab to keep sliding scale records for easy reference. Other than that, a very big 2 thumbs up!!

title: I can beat DM!
body: Great app! Makes the mundane everyday "have to do this so I don't feel lousy" fun! I finally feel like I am in control. After 16 yrs, I was feeling like it would never end. It still won't, but now I don't mind so much!  Also the reports are very useful. Can't wait to see how my A1c responds. Only app I ever paid for (so far) or reviewed).

title: Absolutely fantastic!
body: This little thing has been invaluable in helping me regain control of my T1D. The layout is bright and active, the logging simple and almost game-like, and the option to tag my records to notice trends in my blood sugars and dieting has lead to some fantastic insight about what I'm getting right and wrong. Buy this app!

title: Just great
body: I have had t1d for 11 years now and when I was told about this app i didn't think it would help that much but over the past couple months I have been able to see the ups and downs of my blood glucose and have been able to monitor it better bc of this. Great app!!!!

title: Seriously the best. Thinking of upgrading at some point.
body: This is the best diabetes tracking app I have ever used, seriously. I can see trends, track what works and doesn't work for foods, and see how exercise changes my insulin usage.  I'm one who never pays for upgraded or pro versions, but I will be upgrading at some point!

title: Mostly happy, a couple of quibbles
body: Nice app, nice graphing, easy to use. My two quibbles are that you can only track carbs, not calories or fats (the later being especially important as too much fat in the diet can also interfere with insulin absorption), and Aldo that there doesn't seem to be a way to turn the 'steps' field off. Otherwise, a nice app that I will continue to use.

title: Best diabetes logging app!!
body: This is the best diabetes logging app I've ever tried! (I've tried a lot)

title: Love this app
body: I really enjoy logging my glucose numbers in this app.  My favorite part is listening to the monster reply to my result :). I love the fact that it works with the apple Health app and transfers my numbers automatically.  Thanks for making a great easy to use app and motivating me to get my type 2 diabetes under control.

title: Best tracker app
body: This app is by far the best app I have used. I have gone through many apps to keep track of all things diabetes. Not only is this app efficient it is also fun and I love the colors! If you need an awesome method to track all things diabetes then this app is what you are looking for! Download it! You won't regret it.

title: I'm a fan!
body: I've downloaded almost every diabetes related app available, in an attempt to record blood sugar & track diabetes records. This is the most comprehensive & FUN app I've found. The export data feature is great, my endo loves the print out and email features. I can send updates with the touch of a button.

title: Great app
body: Love the different features. Only thing I wish for is reports in black and white (color ink is expensive) and an untimed way to log exercise that showed up in the daily total. A1c estimates have been accurate for us after using a few months. Love the notes section too.

title: Makes me want to do well
body: I'm sure there are things that could be improved but this is the first app to actually make me want to check my sugar. I love the interaction with the monster. I'm competitive in nature and this challenges me to keep working toward a goal. Thank you for having this out there.

title: Awesome sauce!!!!
body: Absolutely love this app. The estimated a1c the graphs the ease of use and defeating the monster makes this app the best for tracking your blood sugar levels. It also works with the health app which I recently started using and I love how it all syncs together. Highly recommend this app for anyone who wants to track their blood sugar levels.

title: Eye opening
body: This app really forced me to keep track of carbs. Very easy to use & the standard deviation of low and high blood glucose levels helped me focus on managing the hypo/hyper numbers I was experiencing. It illustrates way more info than my Accu-Chek Connect but it would be great to have the meter linked to the app so I don't have to input bg twice.

title: Very easy to use!
body: I was recently diagnosed with type two diabetes in this app is a great way to log numbers track your progress the only thing I would prove. Make it one time payment and then pay for updates. other than monthly service, it's a fantastic app.

title: Already seeing a difference
body: This app in just a week or so had already improved my levels, motivated me to keep better track of everything, and keep my A1C where it should be. Big thanks to this team and app for such an easy way to manage all this.

title: Helpful for parents of new type 1
body: This app has been so helpful. Really like syncing it across multiple devices.

title: MySugr
body: We have found the app to be very helpful to share numbers between my daughter and I. I can watch what her blood sugars all day while she's away and feel confident that she is ok. Thanks for putting the time and energy into this app, to make it easy to use and constantly delivering updates.

title: Perfect Blood Sugar Tracking App
body: This app is a must have if you want to track your blood sugar. Great features like pics of the meals you eat and tags for before meal, after meal, etc. The app even calculates your A1C ratio. This app helps you identify and recall the foods you eat and how they impact your blood sugar. Great all around app!! Highly recommended!!

title: So far so good!
body: First time in 40 years I've really been good about keeping a log book. It's so much easier on the phone and the app is very user friendly. It's great to be able to plug in blood sugar, food/carbs and activity all in the same location and easy to see the report of the results.

title: Easy and fun
body: This basic app is well designed, performs as promised, and can make you smile. Geared toward young type 1 diabetics, older type 2s can also enjoy the simple, colorful design. Reports are designed to give a true overview of your activity, sugars and carbs-- not just a list of dates and numbers. Definitely recommended.

title: Love this app
body: This is the best app! As a parent of a non compliant T1 teenager I can see if she's logged and I absolutely love that she can post pictures of her meter so I know she's telling the truth. Totally worth the money!! I've already shared this app with hospital staff at my daughters last DKA stay two weeks ago. My favorite app for keeping up on diabetes logging!

title: Great app for tracking
body: The sound effects are a bit munchkin-like, but that' sabot the only negative here. Just started on a Type 2 regimen and keeping a log is easy and, yes, fun. The ability to quick-enter recurring foods would be nice, but that's about the only major addition I'd ask for at this point.

title: SO HELPFUL!
body: I have tried several ways to keep track of my sugars and health, but nothing has been so helpful as this. Everything, down to small details, that I would want to log is available in this app. I am so thankful and can see how I am already taking better care of myself.

title: I actually use it.
body: This is fun to use. It makes me enjoy entering my info-it gives me visual info to see how I'm doing. I can print off PDFs to give to my doctor. I just click buttons!!  It's awesome. I love it and it is helping me get my type 1 dm in check. Awesome app. Just wish I could have my info linked in from my pump and meter.

title: A big help for the new diabetic
body: I was beginning to feel really overwhelmed with my diagnosis.  When I went online to read about it, I discovered this app and it has made a huge difference for me.  I wish that it had a medication option for all of us type 2's.

title: Awesome.
body: As a new diabetic this has really helped keep my blood sugar where it needs to be. It's amazing to be able to see how much insulin I have used in different situations and be able to look back. It had also been extremely helpful calculating my ISF. Highly recommend this app.

title: Love the App
body: This app pretty much covers everything you need to enter about your glucose. The only things I do wish is that it had better history views besides sending PDFs and I also wish it was a one time app price vs a yearly subscription rate. Nothing against this company personally I am getting really sick of everything being yearly subscriptions.

title: Great little app!
body: I am not a tech savvy person, I'm a 60 yr old woman with a blood sugar issue, but I can honestly say that this app is very easy to use and serves the purpose I need it for.  I just use the basic app at the moment but may upgrade to premium down the road after I master where I'm at now.

title: Best diabetes app!
body: I've used many apps for tracking my diabetes and this is by far the easiest and most complete I've found. I use a pump and CGM and I get more info from this app than I do all my other tech. You will not be disappointed! Would love to see the app customized for the iPad but can still use on iPad.

title: Old Timer
body: I'm enjoying using this app. It's very appealing and colorful and has most of the necessary items. I would suggest that they add a section where various carb/ bolus ratios, basal rates and correction rates can be included automatically each time data is entered. It's cumbersome to have to write these important things in the notes after each BS test. Besides that...it's great!!

title: Awesome app!
body: I was just diagnosed t2d several weeks ago. I tried various apps. This one instantly became my favorite. I love the option of taking pictures, the icons  and the graphs. I also love the option to export and print a report for my doctor and personal records. The challenges it presents to its users are also fun.

title: Great Help
body: We have tried out every other app to help with logging my 12 yr old daughters facts & this is by far the easiest! It makes it easier to call in her numbers each week. Just wish you had a better meal log that you could break down the carbs in.

title: Easy & fun!
body: I LOVE this app!!! It's extremely helpful and fun to use. (When I remember to use it) I get very busy and usually taking care of my diabetes on the run. Lol.

title: Like the app a lot
body: Still learning it. A training video would be helpful, as well as the ability to have more than one glucose range (I have a higher range for bedtime).

title: My sugr rocks!!!
body: Really helped me keep track of my sugar without being complicated. Love the fact I can keep track of diet & exercise and how I feel and when I took my medication. Makes it simple to review and show your doctor how you're doing. Highly recommended this app for all diabetics.

title: REALLY Helpful for a newbie to Type 1
body: Having your 13 year old diagnosed with type 1 is pretty upsetting for him and us.  This app somehow lightens the burden...the fun noises the monster makes to the supportive emails and a feeling that someone is actually on the other end who has been there and cares is pretty amazing. Thank-you!

title: Really enjoying this app
body: I really enjoy the mysugr app. it's helped me to get on track with keeping track of my diabetes and my blood sugars. I feel like it does a great job of helping me to see what I need to do. I just wish it had tracking for some of the more generic Monitors like the CVS and Walgreens store type

title: Monster Mania
body: Easy to use and get instant feedback after entries.  Has really helped me watch for trends.  The pictures make is quick an easy to log meals and moods.  I wish you could access photos from phone for meals. I have recommended the app to several friends.  If you have to track numbers it might as well be fun!

title: Great diabetes app
body: We've been using it to get us adjusted to diabetes. My daughter was diagnosed 3 weeks ago and this has been super useful. My daughter can enter her info while at school and my husband and I can both see it on our phones at home/work. Great reports to look back over for patterns

title: Love it!!!
body: I've been a type 1 diabetic for 20 yrs. This app is very helpful but I do have to say that I don't like the updated changes that have been made. When I first got the app is was a little easier to use because it wasn't so complicated. All in all though a very god app (it's just my preference to have it be a little less complicated)

title: Just what I was looking for!
body: I was looking for a good app to help track my diabetes a little bit more than just writing my numbers in a logbook. This  app helps me track patterns, habits, add notes, and have fun all at the same time. Going pro for $2.99 a month saves me from spending $3.00 on fast food.

title: Ads!
body: This app is exactly what I want but the ads annoy me, that's the one thing I would pay to get rid of permanently, I don't want any of the other premium features except the ability to get rid of ads, I don't want an app that uses data each time I open it up, it's just so annoying seeing an ad on something like this to me.

title: Fantastic tool!
body: Love this app! After 53 years of drifting in and out of good control, I have finally found the visual that I needed. So easy to do. My phone and my glucometer are always with me so it is a no brainer. Love the a1c estimate shown. I love challenging myself with games and this has become a fun game for me. The support for this app is also great.

title: Excellent App
body: I absolutely love this app. I decided to get serious about my sugar in January! I already had this app but didn't utilize it to its fullest potential. Now I use it every day like clockwork and can keep track of my numbers. It's easy, fast and I love the tracking and graphs! Thanks you did a great job on it.

title: Amazing
body: This app does everything I need for keeping track of my diabetes. It estimates my a1c, I can track my sugars, carbs, insulin, and even whether or not I'm feeling hypo/hyper. The game-like feel to data entry keeps me motivated. Only thing missing is the ability to give glucose data to Apple's Health app. I just subscribed to Pro!

title: Great to get your blood sugar under control
body: I've been using this over a month now and it's helped me narrow down foods that cause me to have a spike in blood sugar. The estimated A1C is great and I like that you can enter a lot of information that helps you track. I love it so much, I bought the yearly subscription.

title: Great Resource.
body: This is the best tracking app I found. You can put so much information and if you choose, or you can just track blood sugars. It takes off the pressure to remember why you are high, low, etc. when you're with your doctor looking at data.

title: Love it
body: This really is the best BG diary that I've come across by far. It is well organized and easy to use. I caught right on when I first downloaded it one week ago. It beats writing everything down on paper and trying to keep track of it. I'd definitely recommend this app.

title: Absolutely amazing!
body: I would recommend this app to any diabetic. The app makes it extremely easy to keep track of my sugars and see any trends and I can look back and easily see what i ate that day or how I was feeling. If it weren't for this app, I probably wouldn't track my sugars. Thank you for this app!

title: great app ! upgraded to pro
body: very intuitive & easy to use ! but most of all it takes the one thing I hate doing as a diabetic & turns it into fun !

title: Great App!
body: I am new to type 2 diabetes and the amount of info I should document was overwhelming.  I knew there must be an app to help me out and there is, this one.  Thanks for making a user friendly app that compiles all of my data.  Well worth the $28 annual fee for the expanded version.  Keep up the good work!

title: It's really easy to use and very helpful
body: I just got diagnosed with type 1 diabetes and I am a 22years old. Having this app is very convenient due to the fact that I always have my phone. I don't have to carry a book with all my logs. It's very handy and my doctor also likes it.

title: My most used app!
body: Having this app has really helped me keep my blood sugar under control after getting my diagnosis. It has possibly the best interface of the various logbooks I've found in the App Store. The graphing and Pro reporting features really push this app above the rest.

title: Liked it so much I opted for Pro the first day
body: Been looking for an App to help me tAckle a majority of all the diabetes issues (diet, meds, mood, pump, CGM, injections, irregularities, etc) and I think this App does it well. A good software update would be a general comments section per entry (I just end up putting them in the Meal text box)

title: Very Useful app
body: A couple of bugs and crashes when importing historical data when using the companion scanner app.

title: Very Comprehensive App
body: I started using this app just over a month ago when I had to begin taking insulin for my Type 2 diabetes. As far as I can tell, this app has everything a person could want for logging blood sugar readings, insulin or pills, meal descriptions, exercise, and much more.

title: So useful!
body: This app has helped tremendously to get my blood glucose under control. It makes a tiresome chore a little bit more interesting. When you see numbers in green; you feel so good about yourself. It is easy to share with my physician as well. I recommend it highly.

title: Love it!
body: As a sixteen year old type 1 diabetic I always had a hard time keeping a log and writing it all down and not losing it. But now since it's on my PHONE it helps me keep up with it consistently and the cute little monster motivates me to keep testing more often! So cute!

title: Makes it almost fun!
body: This app looks more like a game than a diabetes app! I love the challenges. They help me get started and keep going. Diabetes has alway been a struggle but with this app I feel like I can control it even better! And I can tell the mysugr employees really care about each of their customers.

title: Great for tracking
body: I've used multiple apps for tracking my blood sugar, food, exercise, etc. this is the best one that I have found. It's easy to use, has a great reporting feature and lots of useful ways to track info. I would highly recommend it!

title: changes arent changes for the better
body: I used to like this app alot.  I could quickly understand what my longer term averages were.  after the latest update, it seems like I can only tell only see a 7 day average.  maybe i am missing something?  or maybe longer averages are in the premium version only?  any the ui is better but that analysis menu is missed.

title: More than I need but very good
body: I really just wanted an app that would log my blood sugar levels, and this allows me to do that. And that's pretty much what I do with it. But it offers a whole bunch of other options as well. The one thing I would ask from this app is that it would link with other apps like my fitness pal.

title: The best diabetes app ever!!!
body: I usually don't do reviews, but in my personal opinion: "I love this app and while I haven't own ideas on how it could be better I love the fact that is makes logging fun and easy. Keeps you up on your P's & Q'a and helps keep the monsters at bay when it comes to diabetes.

title: Phenomenal App!!!!!
