body: As a diabetic myself, I wish I had this back in the day!!! Now with my 2 1/2 year old daughter just being diagnosed & multiple people helping manage her, this is essentially perfect!!!  I never write reviews, but had to give these people kudos for a job more than well done!!

title: Lifesaver
body: My diabetes has gotten out of control recently and I have been having a difficult time regaining control.  MySugr has become my lifesaver...the app is easy to use!  Not only is it easy to plug in my daily numbers but the activities involved at the time that impact the hypo/hyper results.  THANKS!!!!

title: Very Useful Diabetes App
body: I've been using this app for about three years and it has been working very well for me. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to keep up with their food intake, their mess, their exercise program, or anything else related to their condition.

title: Easy to use
body: Keeps track of everything you input and allows you to see the scale of it via time line. This way you can see if your levels are staying more even or all over the place. And it's kind of cute so a bit of entertainment.

title: I left, came back
body: This is the only app that has helped me manage my glucose. I actually cancelled it when I got a Bluetooth-enabled meter, but that meter's app wasn't as robust. I wish MySgr's exercise/nutrition options were more robust (more integrations, plz?), but that won't stop me from using the app indefinitely.

title: Love :)
body: I love this app and it really does help me with controlling my type on diabetes. My only concern is the fact that when I first got the app I immediately upgraded to Pro. I don't feel like I needed to do that, at least for my needs. All in all I love the app and the ease of recording my sugars while using it.

title: Been a great tool for my Gestational Diabetes!
body: Was diagnosed not too long ago and it has been a great way for me to keep track of everything I eat and my levels. Would recommend this app to anyone who need to keep a log and who likes little challenges to make it fun.

title: Best app for diabetes
body: This is the best app for diabetes that there is. I've been looking for an app to help me manage my diabetes that makes it easy to keep track of everything and this is it. Very easy to use. Great customer service too! HbA1c went from 11.7 to 8.6 in less than 2 months!!

title: Excellent App
body: So happy I found this app to keep track of my blood glucose! I am newly diagnosed as Type 2 and my doctor wanted me to keep a daily log. This app is super easy to use and the graphics are fun. Thanks for doing such a great job! The diabetes monster sound effects add a touch of whimsy to a serious condition.

title: A fun way to manage diabetes
body: ...well, as "fun" as you could get it. The little monster motivates me to keep on track. The interface is really easy & simple to use. The app just works well. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a streamlined way to log blood sugars, carb intake, food, and/or activity.

title: Easy to use. And handy
body: Very easy to use. The only negative would be that it only shows averages. I would like to be able to go back and see specific readings from previous days. (At least I haven't been able to figure out how to find them if there is a way). But I really do like this ap

title: Great easy app
body: Great, easy to use app. Simple and has everything you need to log, without being slow. The animations and interface are charming rather than annoying. This is on the non-pro version too! (Only been using for 2 weeks.)

title: Amazing app!
body: I highly recommend this app to both veterans and newbies to the world of diabetes. It does an amazing job of analyzing data and encouraging you to collect that data. Diabetes can be a very difficult disease to manage but this app gives you the tools to help like no other app can.

title: Great app for logging BG on the go!
body: I love that I can see a trend quickly and I can log detailed info. It way easier than logging in a book. I always have my phone with me. I just wish we didn't have to pay for all the pro features. But still my fav logging app.

title: Huge help!!!
body: This is the most comprehensive app that we have found for managing our son's T1D. It has been so helpful! The ability to track everything, so that we can find trends, helps us keep him within the target range more often. Thank you!

title: Beautiful
body: Seriously -- thank you! I have an aesthetic mind, so I've always been attracted to beautiful things. This app is creative and slickly designed. I've been keeping a logbook better than ever before thanks to the creative motivation. I used to get depressed logging my data in ugly, bland programs.

title: Excellent!!
body: I've looked for an app that could do all the many things  that diabetics need and they have all fallen short...except for this one!!!!! Best app for type 1s I've ever found and great for those with and without a pump! Thanks guys for helping me maintain my numbers and keep track of a busy diabetic!!

title: Finally
body: I want to thank whoever created this. This is the best app ever. So easy to understand and use. A fun and easy way to keep up with all the information that is really needed to keep your sugars under control. For the first time in 6 years, I feel totally in control

title: Love it
body: This ap is the best.  I like technology.  2 weeks ago found out my type 2 diabetes was out of control with a 10.4.  In 2 weeks with diet and exercise my numbers are below 200.  This ap lets me log and see my progress!!  Have free right now but thinking of upgrading

title: Love this!
body: So I'm 16 and keeping track of my bgs can be hard but this app actually makes it kinda fun. I love the little challenges and the points you can get for logging what you eat and how many carbs. It's just a cute little app lol not much to say but to try it out ☺️ I'm glad I found it

title: Great!
body: I was just diagnosed with Type 1 a couple weeks ago and this app has been so useful with keeping track of my blood glucose. The premium feature that lets you export a pdf of all your numbers is also really useful for informing your diabetes team!

title: Love it!!
body: We started using this app in December. So far very impressed with it. I wish it wasn't so costly but understand there needs to be a charge. We are new to diabetes with my daughter, however not new to diabetes. Type 1. I wish it was able to sync with Aviva Connect. Overall love it!

title: Easy to use
body: I downloaded after recently being diagnosed T2. This has been great for keeping track of my readings and being able to see trends. I love the notes you can make at each reading as well.

title: Great app!
body: My friends seven-year-old daughter told me about this app. She uses it and I thought it was so cute and comprehensive I decided to try it too. I really like it. When the little monster giggles it makes me smile and I like getting points for doing things I should be doing anyway.

title: Great app to keep me accountable and on track
body: mySugr has been a great motivator to stay on track and stay accountable. My doctor likes that I can print out detailed PDF files that tell a more complete story than my previous logbooks did. I also enjoy the challenges.

title: Love this app!! So easy to use!
body: I'm new to the diabetes monitoring world, I have gestational diabetes, this app is perfect for tracking everything I need to track!! I've tried so many others and they were confusing and bland, but this app is easy, pretty self explanatory and the bright colors are great :)

title: Mysugr app
body: Though it does another round of data entry, I find the app to be fun and motivating. It gives feedback that no bg meter or pump does, with sounds and actions that make me want to keep up with my record keeping. Anything that does that is worth a little extra effort in my book!

title: Interactive, great app
body: The app has a lot of things to offer.  Recently, I was diagnosed with diabetes and this helps me track and report the necessary information. With the 'Diabetes Monster' interactive mascot, I can see where this would be great for kids who, unfortunately, have diabetes.

title: The only logbook you need
body: Why aren't there tons of really good diabetes/pump logbooks out there? They're all missing crucial elements or are extremely clunky to use. Not this one though. Easy, easy, everything all in one, and right at the tips of my fingers (in my iPhone that's always by my side!). THANK YOU, THANK YOU, MYSUGR!

title: Great App!
body: I tried quite a few other diabetes log apps but none compare to this. It's so easy (and fun to use) and I've been able to keep up with it everyday! I highly recommend it to anyone who is unfortunately suffering from this horrible disease

title: Fab app
body: I've tried many BG apps and this is the only one that I have been happy to use. It's fun! I love I can personalize it with pics and the fact it also keeps tract of the amount of insulin and carbs I use daily is superb! Love the challenges too; they make you want to track your BG even more.

title: Keeps me motivated
body: This app keeps me motivated in wanting to track my numbers. I like earning points, and seeing my data from day to day. Haven't been able to figure a few things out, that I think should be easy thus the lower star rating. I'm looking forward to showing my doctor how I'm using this app.?

title: Great Ap
body: Overall this ap is awesome. It is the best stand alone ap for keeping track of important diabetes related info. The only down side is it is slow in updating with health kit. I don't know if this is on the Apple side or the developer side but with all that this ap offers it is certainly not a deal breaker.

title: A lifesaver!!!
body: My teen and I are new to this T1 thing and have been having trouble keeping our logs. This app is perfect!!  We can both use it, it's fun, easy to use, easy to personalize, and very thorough. I was thrilled to see the reports that the app generates and it's worth every penny for the upgrade to pro!

title: Awesome and Encouraging
body: This app has helped me a lot and has been great to help with managing type one with my active and crazy lifestyle. I have found efficient and effective ways to manage patterns of highs and lows through this app's phenomenal graphs and displays of data and I am so thankful I have this tool!!!:))

title: Best App for Diabetics
body: My daughter is 4 and was recently diagnosed with T1D. This app has been a lifesaver for our family. My husband and I can access the same logbook, chart her glucose changes, and even print out reports that come with us to doctor appointments. Cannot recommend it enough!!

title: Close to perfect!!
body: This is the closest to perfect of any of the diabetes apps I have tried.  The only thing left on my "wish list" would be if there was a way to look up carb nutrition from within the app so the user wouldn't need to use a secondary app.  Otherwise, I am in love with MySugr!

title: Great diabetic app
body: I'm a diabetic and a nurse. I will recommend this app to all my patients and tell my doctor and the doctors I work with about this app.

title: Only one I've left on my phone
body: I had lost interest in keeping my numbers in check. This app made a game out of controlling my sugar levels. I would recommend it to anyone. There's also a record for my doctor to look at and follow my progress.

title: Great App- Best log book
body: Proving the age old adage- people who do anything if you give them fake points.

title: Review
body: I just love the simplicity of this app.  I really feel encouraged with the results of my blood glucose levels since I am measuring and recording on a meal by meal basis!  Having the knowledge of how I am doing just motivates me to eat better!  I just love it!  This will be life change for the better.  Thanks a bunch!

title: I love this app
body: I've been a type 1 diabetic for 17 years and I have never written down my blood sugars I have just gotten them off my pump. This app actually has helped me realize that my blood sugars are perfectly in control and my doctor loves that I'm using this app too. Best app around!!!!

title: Love this, unbelievably helpful
body: I love this app. It's takes the monotony of the logbook and makes it fun. I wish I hadn't missed the period to get the full version for free because unfortunately it is very expensive for the pro version. But I love this app and I would recommend it to my T1d friends.

title: AMAZING
body: Honestly, I've tried just about all the other apps, and none of them make me actually look forward to checking my blood glucose. My levels were going out of track, but this got me back in to order. AMAZING! Keep doing what you're doing!

title: Great tool to keep your blood sugar under control
body: Easy to use and visually easy to read and follow.

title: Love this
body: This is the best Diabetes Management System. It's fun and easy to use. It's adaptable for both pump therapy and traditional pen/syringe therapy. I received a welcome email from them and when I answered back, on a whim, I received a personal response back. These guys are nice, funny and knowledgable. Oh and ask them about the weekend kitten herding. ;)

title: Best app I've used for logging
body: I've tried lots of apps and have had the most success with this one. Most consistency I've had logging and a great user experience. If I could have written my own app, this would have been it in terms of the features!

title: The best. Period.
body: I have tried several diabetes management apps in the past, and this is the only one I've stuck with. It has the most intuitive interface, the best reports, and the most appealing design. This app almost makes logging readings and insulin fun. Almost!

title: Keeping my monster in check!!
body: This has been a fun and organized way to keep track of my diabetes. It makes a game and adds some humor to an otherwise depressing situation. I will be buying the pro addition because I love that they export your info to excel!

title: Wonderful app!!
body: I have had diabetes since I was two years old... Since I graduated high school I have been an awful historian when it comes to my blood sugars... I downloaded this app a week or two ago and have loved it! It's simple, quick, and easy to use.

title: Beyond words !!!
body: My 10 year old son was diagnosed with T1D last October. Been searching for easy ways to document and trend data ever since. This app has by far met our expectations and more. Very user friendly, printable reports are great to take with us to Dr appointments.

title: Great app
body: This is the best app for diabetics that I have used. It is simple and fun to use it. Challenges and the monster make sure that you will not stop using it. It does not have food database but it integrates well with Apple Health so you can use specialized apps to calculate carbs or scan barcodes of your food.

title: play your way manage your sugar
body: This app is fun even for someone older. It let's you make the job of managing you glucose less stress and more like a game.  I use to miss monitoring my sugar levels during the day but now with the challenges I want to come back and keep going.

title: Great way to keep track
body: I think the app is great and love the graph.  Couple of things wish you could turn the phone horizontal to get a better look at the overall graph and maybe add a few more description Icons, like pasta.  Because little kids eat a lot of that and it's it's own food group.  ;)

title: Try it out for a few days
body: I did not find it intuitive initially, but got the hang of it after a couple of days. Now I prefer it over any other app. I wish their challenges were better developed. Other than that, I love it.

title: Phenomenal!
body: This is the best app on the market to track blood sugars- it has a simple interface, provides a ton of data, and has a fun little monster to help keep diabetes management "light." This works for any age and, after your meter and CGM,is probably the best tool to keep yourself healthy and happy.

title: Very happy
body: I took a chance and bought the upgrade for this app. So glad I did. I was diagnosed in 1999, and this is the first time I have had everything digitally in one place. My whole life feels organized and the best is that my numbers are really great. Thank you.

title: Awesome!
body: I'm a type 1 on an insulin pump and this is by far the best app to mange your numbers, what you eat, how much insulin you have taken. It's just Awesome!! Nothing I have found even comes close to this app. Thank you so much for making one thing in my life a little easier!😃

title: Convenient!
body: I find this much more convenient than writing in a log book and food diary. I upgraded to pro so that I can send reports to my physician. When I was diagnosed w gestational diabetes I was overwhelmed by how much info I was asked to track and share. Much more manageable now.

title: Frustrating program
body: It is a frustrating program to use. It doesn't like giving you the data. A lot of times you enter your data and it likes to give you a summery.

title: Effective and fun at the same time!
body: I have found this app very helpful in tracking and watching patterns. Everything is in one spot.  Plus the sound effects make me chuckle.  It adds levity to a daunting task!  I would definitely recommend it to others!

title: Easy logging
body: I have used app for a few weeks. Easy to use, fairly comprehensive. By using phone, I do better following BS levels. The yearly rate seems expensive. I have not taken report to my PCP yet, so I do not know if he likes documentation. I plan to continue to use.

title: Game changing
body: I just switched to MDI from using a pump for 11 years and I needed a way to log my numbers, carbs, and doses, which I have never REALLY tried to do in all my 14 years of T1D. mysugr makes this easy, intuitive, and even a little fun. I wish the pro were cheaper but IMO it is worth it.

title: Keeps me on track
body: While using the app my A1c went from 15 to 6.1. My doctor loves the amount of information  it gives her. I enjoy the monster even if I can't hear him every time. I just wish they had more labels to describe my day/mood/health/activity.

title: Makes life a breeze
body: Logging numbers has never been easier. Now my son can log numbers while he's at school, and it automatically updates in all of our phones. Much easier to detect patterns and make adjustments now.

title: Well thought out and easy to use
body: Great to have a logbook app that includes so many measures that impact blood sugar and lifestyle. Great that it connects to Apple health app. Cost to pro version is steep, and it would be helpful if it connected to Fitbit and similar apps. The download feature is excellent for doctor visits. Overall, highly recommended.

title: Best app I've found
body: This is the best app I've found for helping me control my type 2 diabetes. I can get email my results to my doc. I love the sound effects I get for on target results. Easy to use. I recommend it to anyone who is serious about control.

title: WOW!
body: Who would've thought that logging could be fun?!

title: Works great for our needs!
body: Love this app. My husband and I both have it on our phones so we can each add information and keep up with our daughter's numbers, meals, activities, etc. The view is changeable to meet your needs also. Love it!

title: Road king
body: I love the app. It makes logging results easy and entertaining. The challenges and game like feel adds to the ease. I have been able to keep my levels more in my target range better than before I started using this app. Thanks.

title: Awesome
body: I've been a type 1 for 15 years and never found an app that was easy to use and navigate with as much information as this one allows. Awesome app all the way around and definitely would recommend it.

title: So useful and fun to use
body: Makes my day easier and it's so cute that it makes a not-so-fun chore a lot more enjoyable. Love the giggles when you enter your readings! The fact that it can export reports of your readings and email them to yourself and your doctor makes it the best app ever!

title: Best yet!
body: I have never written a review, good or bad, about anything. I felt like this app deserved it. I have been through many diabetes apps for the past 2 years since diagnosed and have found this one to be the most user friendly and fun to use:) thank you!

title: A good data integrator and nice little tool
body: After one gets past the animations this is a nice tool for entering the raw data about your health. It is also a good sharing app using the apple health app as a hub. I can certainly recommend this  app as a health data capture/logging system.

title: not Bad
body: I'm pretty impressed although the near constant yammering for a review is mighty frustrating. It is a little hard for someone like a caregiver who doesn't use the app a lot to figure out previous or even current trends. My partner is baffled and it even took me some while to figure it out. But it is pretty comprehensive.

title: Love it!
body: This is such a cute, well designed app to keep track of blood sugar. I was just diagnosed as gestational diabetic and this app is very helpful. I plan on upgrading to pro soon so I can print my logs out as PDFs so I can show my dr. The app is very modern and fun looking, but very easy to use. I highly recommend it.

title: Detailed tracking and fun for daughter
body: Newly diagnosed 4 year old and this help track everything from my phone. Get the junior app also, even on the same phone. Get your kiddo involved and feel like they have control over this "monster" . Good luck!

title: Great Reports
body: We have a newly diagnosed child. As parents we are in the process of learning the counting and logging of carbohydrates. This program has been very helpful with our required logging, and the reports are very easy to send to the Doctor. Love this program.

title: Seriously, great job
body: I absolutely love this app. I'm trying to get on a pump and this is helping me out way more than I thought it ever would. It is so user friendly and overall just diabetic friendly and super intuitive. Thank you so much for this app!

title: Amazing
body: First app I've taken the time to review. My blood sugar has recently started spiking again and in preparation for visiting my doctor I decided to use an app instead of a spreadsheet to log my blood sugar levels. I'm glad I found this. Great work and shout out to the developers.

title: Very good app
body: Very good and I don't even use all the parts of the app.  The color and the animation keeps me interested.  I would like to see bigger and darker fonts because someone with diabetes has problems with their eyes and it becomes difficult to see

title: Amazing!!
body: We love this app to track my son's numbers. It allows you to input so many different data points and track several items. Big points for how user friendly it is!!  I highly recommend this app!!!

title: Love it!
body: My mom and I have been looking for an app to help keep track with my numbers so we started to use MySugr and we were really happy with it. It is adjustable to your need. Such as if you need pill or ketones. Overall, I really love this app and would recommend it.

title: Love it
body: I have been a type one diabetic for about 13 years now and this is by far the best app I've used to log my blood sugars. I love the little blood sugar monster, I just wish that more things were available for free verses having to upgrade.

title: Good but many issues
body: It's really great but there are lots of issues, like how data won't save and sync probably when going between iPhone and pc. It also logs me out constantly at random times. Also, the text on the pc is very light and hard to read. Otherwise, it's amazing!
response: HI! Thanks for your feedback and yes the logging out is super annoying. I am totally with you! BUT there is an update out (18th of May) where this bug should be fixed. Can you try to update the app and then you should not be logged out any more.

title: Makes Diabetes … Fun??
body: The Diabetes Companion by mySugr makes the diabetes monster easier to manage, even if he’s a sometimes frustrating, but not all the time, kind of guy.   Clever application, and one that I can see inspiring people with diabetes around the world to take their monster to task.

title: Great app!
body: I've tried a few blood glucose monitoring apps and this by far is the most enjoyable to use and the easiest to get data out of. I love the fact that you can scroll through your logbook and see a visual representation of your blood glucose readings. Thanks for a great app!

title: What a great app!
body: I've probably tried every app there is to monitor my type II diabetes. This app not only helps me monitor, but it keeps me motivated to monitor. The avatar and the sound effects are just what I need when I'm frustrated about my progress. Thanks for helping me with this process.

title: Amazing log!
body: This app keeps me motivated! It makes having diabetes a little more fun. Even my friends remind me to enter my stuff so the monster will giggle or go nom! I have been diabetic for almost 15 years and I have never been good about a log but this app makes it easy!

title: Amazing. Literally my companion.
body: This app has proven countless times to be very resourceful. It always makes it fun to log in my sugars. Before this app my A1C was a 6.4 and I was struggling to make it lower but now I can step back and see my sugars for the day and before and after every mean. Perfection👌👍😍

title: Even better now with HealthKit
body: I love this app now with Apple HealthKit integration and dexcom share CGM data. I am able to see relationships even clearer now. The reports and analysis options are better than what my pump and dexcom offer currently. Highly recommended for any diabetic

title: MySugar APP
body: I have been a diabetic for 33 years and this is one of the best technological advances by far during my disease. It allows you to keep track and slice data any way you want to. I HIGHLY recommend it! Now if you could incorporate this into a pump then my life would be perfect!

title: Excellent tool and fun too
body: My Sugar makes testing easy to manage and turns a boring routine into fun.  I don't test for anything except blood glucose and sometimes carbs, so I don't know what all of it means.  I just know that the little monster adds some levity.  I can't afford the premium to go further with it, but I appreciate the free service.

title: Handy app
body: I like that it helps me stay on track and responsible. Fairly easy to use and no fuss. The one thing I wished it would do was track what my meals are...like some of the food trackers. But it is worth having this extra app, especially telling me my averages. Helps motivate me to say "no" to foods that will spike my numbers!

title: Best App for a Diabetic
body: This has to be the best and only app that works. I recommend it to any diabetic that is having trouble logging bg on paper. Keeps everything organized and makes it easier by making a spreadsheet to send to your doctor.

title: Couldn't live without it!
body: My 5 year old was recently diagnosed with type 1 and this is very handy when were checking several times in the night when I don't have the energy to write it down in her logs! ~pray for a cure~

title: Newly diagnosed number freak loves this!!!
body: I'm still learning everything but love the ability to watch my numbers. My Dr was impressed at the ease of sharing the information as well as the amount of data I had for her.  She says she's going to refer others to it

title: Favorite diabetes app
body: I keep trying out different diabetes apps, and keep coming back to this one. It's just so much more fun than the others. I only wish it would track my weight and A1C too. Then I could have it all in one place.

title: Easy to use, and fun, too
body: I've tried a few blood sugar apps over the last few years, but this one is the easiest to use (and most fun) I've found. I wish I didn't need it, but for those like me who do, I recommend it highly.

title: Fun & Easy to Use
body: I tried several logbook apps and this one was by far the best in multiple ways. My son is a type 1 and it's so nice to have all of this information available and synchronized across all of our families devices. Cheers to the mySugr team! 👍🏻

title: Great app
body: It's a little overwhelming at first with everything you can keep track of but once you get used to it the entire thing is great. And it keeps tracking your diabetes fun which can be a challenge sometimes.

title: Big Picture
body: I find this app very useful. If used consistently, it gives me a clear picture of my blood sugar trends and allows me to take appropriate action. This allows me to view the "big picture" of my food consumption and my insulin dosage needs.

title: Useful and multi dimensional
body: Nicely designed app. The sync when you first open can be at times a bit slow but it's a nicely done carb/blood sugar/diabetes app.

title: Awesome app!
body: Helps us track her when she's not home with real-time updates. We are a newly diagnosed family and have tried several apps, this is the only one that is easy and fun to use. Also the reports are awesome! I emailed my first report on Friday and the nurse loved it!

title: Great for new diabetics
body: I was just diagnosed with type 1.5 and found this app right away. My doctor was impressed with the capabilities and said he would be recommending it to all his patients in the future. Can be as simple or complex as you want to make it.

title: Gorgeous
body: This app is amazing. Really helps me to keep track of my sugars throughout the day. Being able to see the line plot helps to gauge and predict how to treat. Also AMAZING customer service. Got back to me with a question within 12 hours. I definitely suggest this app for EVERYONE.

title: Great app!
body: Our family has really appreciated this app. It has allowed us to communicate with each other (mom,dad,kid), with our diabetes staff & school nurse. We've even communicated with the company on a suggestion & they have been nothing but great. You are a blessing. Thank you!

title: Changing my life
body: This app is easy and fun to use. With ADHD and four busy kids, journaling on paper or other apps was impossible. In the month I've been using this I've gotten my numbers down from 300 to 160, realized when I was dehydrated, and been inspired to exercise.

title: 😘Can't thank you enough
body: We were overjoyed to find your app after our son was recently diagnosed. It is playful, interactive, genius (with all it's many features), and above all it's inspirational. Thank you for helping to lift the spirits of our family

title: Truly Awesome
body: I will keep it short and simple. This app rocks. I rarely write reviews but truly want people to know this app is awesome. It keeps track of EVERYTHING you would want it too. I am T1 and have not found a better app and I have tried more than a few.

title: A literal lifesaver!
body: This app is wonderful! I use it not only to log my blood sugars and insulin doses, but also to track my daily food choices and activity levels as well as the symptoms of my other autoimmune disorders (namely IBS and fibromyalgia). It's much easier than carrying around a logbook.

title: Awesome!
body: This is finally a really cool DT1 app. UX is great and easy. I really like the picture taking possibility. It is more like a game then a annoying necessary task you have to do for your diabetes. The little monster is a cute and incentive game like little thing. Thank you for making diabetes more fun!

title: Finally acting on diabetes
body: This is the first diabetes management app that has me actually engaged. I look forward to logging my data and seeing the results. User friendly, minimal effort, and the pro version is awesome. I can see what my BG is doing and why.

title: Impressive!
body: This is a great app for tracking! It is easy to use and great for keeping a photographic history. I showed my sugar history to my doctor and he found it very impressive and easy to get a quick snapshot of my sugars. I will continue to use!

title: Fantastic tool for the whole family
body: My son is a Type1 diabetic and he, his father, and I all have this app. We can see in real time what his entries are even when he's at school or elsewhere. Only wish it had a carb counter so we could search for food choices.

title: Great app
body: Have been using the app for almost a month now. Like it a lot. It had been a great motivator to track my sugar levels. The menus are intuitive and easy to use. I would recommend this to anyone serious about managing their Diabetes

title: Wonderful but buggy
body: I love this app it's perfect for what I need it has a lot of features. But it also has flaws it will crash constantly on me the moment I open it I have a 5s up to date iOS and app. Also sometimes it will freeze my iPhone. I don't know what is wrong with this app I followed the support team but it was stuff I already knew. Uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help and the recent update did nothing. I would really like to use this app please fix

title: I'm finally tracking!
body: I love this app. It's so easy to add your info, and go back to edit, tag, or share. It gives me motivation to track my blood glucose and amount of insulin because it only takes a second to grab my phone.

title: Great App
body: This app makes it very easy to keep track of blood sugars along with total insulin taken, carbs, activity & more. I'm very happy with the results. The exportable reports are great for printing out results & bringing them to your doctor. Wish the cost was a little cheaper or I could pay for the app once & not have to renew yearly.

title: Lexi 10 year old
body: This has helped us as a family to get her numbers down. We are starting to do it right. Thank you for the pop up that changed our Lives to be better.

title: Update is missing best feature
body: Been using this app for about 5 months! It really helped me jump start taking care of my diabetes the way I should! Love the new look with the update but I must say I'm really upset you guys took away the analysis section of the app. Is that only part of the pro app now?

title: Great job!
body: So far this app is great. I have only been using it a couple days and have found that it is easy. I love that my monster giggles and awes...

title: Great tool for managing my diabetes
body: Mysugr has become a key part of my diabetes management. New version added ability to track pills, I felt it was the only thing missing with the last version. Clean layout and very user friendly :)

title: Excellent app
body: This app makes it easy to record all the important items for monitoring your blood sugar. From meal types, diet, exercise, highs and lows, to insulin volume, and a really cool graph to help visualize your numbers, this app has practically everything you'll need. Highly recommend!

title: Great app
body: I like what the app has to offer.  The point system makes a game out of daily management.  I wish the app could merge with myfitnesspal so I wouldn't have to enter in both apps. I have tracked in the other for 4 years and not ready to stop,

title: Love it!
body: I use this with my 8 year old son.  He loves to tap the monster, who we've named Squishy.  I LOVE the layout of information and analysis it provides!  The colorful visuals appeal to us because we can quickly see the various ranges.  We will recommend to our or friends!!

title: Very helpful
body: Being pregnant and finding out you have type 2 diabetes can be overwhelming, after trying a couple different apps i found the one that helps me keep track of things. Very easy to use & fun!

title: Great App!!!
body: Love this app it's the best one I've tried so far, and I think I'm done looking any further. Has everything I need and then some. I've found that with this app I'm keeping much better track of things than I used to. It's just fun to use.

title: Best App for Diabetics
body: On a data standpoint, I love inputting information and seeing trends before I visit my endo. I love that it asks for almost every possible detail when I log numbers.

title: Too expensive...
body: Price point is excessive for the content of the app, especially when they state in the TOS that your data is monetized. Either you wh0re my data or my money, not both.

title: Best Diabetes App
body: MySugr diabetes logging all is the best app on the market; it is the only app that motivates me to log my blood glucose levels consistently.  One of my favorite features is having my Dexcom readings integrated in the app which makes managing diabetes and my data a lot easier.

title: RN
body: This program has helped me reduce my A1c by making me accountable for meal planning and carb counting. It makes it easy to look back and see how I've done over the week and see times when my blood sugar spikes. I like the ease of having it in my phone.

title: Helpful
body: I have an insulin pump and a sensor, but still have difficulty keeping my blood sugar in the proper range. With this app I track bs, food, carbs, highs & lows, and it's been another very useful tool to help control my daily struggle with diabetes. The developers are communicative & responsive. Recommended!

title: Easy Logging
body: This is my first experience testing by glucose levels. Not only have I had to get used to using a meter, I had to come up with a way to log my levels. This is a great little program and very easy to use.

title: Very good app
body: I am newly diagnosed adult onset type 1 and like this app better than those I tried when I had gestational diabetes. I can't speak for the food side yet as I'm just tracking glucose levels and night time insulin right now. It works great for these.

title: Awesome!!!!!
body: I am a type one diabetic using an insulin pump and just started using this app today, I think it is awesome. Love the GUI style interface ,very easy and all your info at your fingertips. If you could use with the "lose it" app it would be   unbelievable!!!!!

title: Great App
body: This is the best app out there for diabetes.  I've been using it for just a few days and it helped me control my blood sugar!  I would recommend this to anyone with diabetes.  Huge thank you to the people who created this app.  Well worth the money!

title: Excellent
body: If you are looking for an app to help you control your sugar intake, to control your insulin, then this is it. Easy to use, it is probably the best app for those people who don't want to get highly technical. Simple to use, it maintains your records and maintains your analytics.

title: Very useful!
body: This also helps keep up with your A1c. I'm not sure how accurate. I will find out at my next checkup. Allows you to see what foods might be raising your sugar levels. For a free app it's pretty good. I'm thinking of getting the paid version.

title: Crashes upon opening
body: I liked this app when I first got it, however, at this point, it crashes when I initially open it. The scanner module I purchased for it is unreliable. It frequently picks a date from last year, even though my meter doesn't display the year. So you'd think the current year would be an implicit assumption for this app, but no, it's not. Getting the data from the scanner reliably into the log is hit or miss too.

title: Excellent
body: This app is great for tracking your blood sugar, food intake, and activity. It estimates your A1C after so many readings and all data is automatically transferred to Apple's My Health app. Information can be exported to physicians' office easily. The little Sugar Monster is funny also 👱‍♀️🤖😍

title: Log
body: The last app I used I could also keep track of my blood pressure, which I really liked. My last phone died and all my log book entry's disappeared when they transferred things from my old phone to this one. Luckily I had also kept a paper log book too. Hopefully this app won't have the same problem.

title: So far so good!
body: There nothing remotely like this app out there that is mostly free. This is it! It keeps me from having to have multiple apps. Easy to use and user friendly. I'm type 1 so it helps to have all your insulin options.

title: Makes me want to poke my fingers
body: I have enjoyed using this app. It really does make tracking my glucose, carbs, and activity fun and easy. But then, I'm kind of a data geek anyway. Highly recommended for other data geeks who happen to be diabetic as well.

title: Highly Recommend
body: I love it so much! I get weekly reports, it says what my average was, and you can enter a description or a picture of what you were eating so that you can go back and see why you were high or low. Love it so much❤️

title: Love it!
body: I love this app!  It's so easy to use which makes tracking a breeze. I upgraded to the pro version and am able to send reports as an excel or off document for my docs to look over. Best Diabetes tracking app I've found!

title: I loved it for months, but I don't like the update :(
body: This app has been really helping me monitor my blood sugars, and I had a lot of fun with the tags, but now you have to pay for most of them and I'm really sad about that :( I would probably do it if it was a one time payment, but I can't do monthly or yearly :(

title: Do not like the update
body: The update looks great but it is missing my favorite features like syncing with Apple health. It was so cool to have my Dexcom share data on mysugr! And it's harder to find info. I miss the analysis section. I also cannot find where I used to put my A1c result. Please bring back these old functions. It's upsetting to purchase something for particular features and then those features are dropped.

title: Fantastic App
body: I don't have any complaints the app only keeps getting better. Ever since I was diagnosed with Type 1 about a month ago this app has helped me log and keep track of sugar levels. Highly recommend

title: Superb App
body: This app is a fantastic tool to manage and track diabetes info. I love all the options for input. The format is user friendly, you can as much or as little info as you want. It's great for just tracking BG or tracking more info to find trends.

title: Really Great!
body: So far this app has really helped to remind me to take better care of myself by taking my blood sugar more often and count my carbs. Also helping me to take my insulin on time. Thank you. I have not gone pro yet. But soon maybe.

title: Great app
body: As someone new to tracking blood sugars and meds this app works great in helping me do so.  Simple to use, instant feedback, nice interface.

title: Life-Changing
body: This app has made it easy and enjoyable to monitor my glucose levels. After using the app, my A1c levels are much more controlled and I have noticed trends in my food intake and insulin. This has resulted in lost weight and better overall health.

title: I love it!
body: The little monster giggles when you finish entering your stats.  For some reason I love to hear him.  Great app.  I am having a good time just entering my info. Makes being diabetic not sooooo bad if you have something to look forward too.

title: Great tool to track your diabetes wellbeing
body: Diabetes for 18 years and never bothered to record the stats for it being too cumbersome. This app makes it very easy and fun to do and does a great job helping me manage myself.

title: Diabetes Monster!
body: I was recommended this app by another friend with diabetes.  Named my diabetes monster SugarWitch and started right off by showing it who's boss! :) Pretty fun actually, who would have thought, and some nice motivation for not-so-fun BG tests.

title: Great before the latest update..now its just "ok"
body: This app was excellent before todays update.  It allowed me to e-mail the pdf reports to my endocronologist weekly.  Now with the update, i have to to pay to send a two week pdf report of my sugars to my doctor?

title: More of a Game
body: I've been using Glucose Buddy for a few years now and thought I'd try this app. I read the reviews and decided to purchase the full app. Unfortunately, this app is too gimmicky and seems to be more about challenges and points vs seriously tracking your blood sugar. This app does not allow you to clearly follow your readings before and after each meal. The app is more suited for younger kids. I would recommend Glucose Buddy if you want a clear and simple app.

title: WOW!!!!
body: This app is absolutely incredible. It helps me keep track of my blood sugar as I often forget to check my bg. It has been so helpful in away that it is now fun!!!!! The challenges are great and the person who created this app (and the team) is truly a genius. THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!

title: Best all around app I have found
body: Great app for tracking sugar. Wish it did BT sync with more testers.

title: Best of breed
body: I've tried most of the diabetes apps out there.  This one is by far the best -- there is a level of professionalism in this app that's simply missing in all the rest.  And naming my monster after my ex-wife doesn't hurt either. :)

title: Fun
body: It's never been this easy or fun to monitor BG. I've tried lots of these apps, and then deleted them. This one is different. It's easy, it's detailed (but effortlessly easy), and it asks the right questions. For the first time in 15 years, I feel I have an ally in topping this nasty disease.

title: Great tool for tracking
body: This has been great this far. I do not have to keep up with writing down my readings when I am in different places. My phone is always with me so it is very convenient to log them in.

title: Tracking made easy!
body: Love this app, so easy to track my blood sugar readings and overcome the challenges of being new to diabetes. Helpful for tracking carbs, insulin, steps, and more! Super easy to use, super helpful   Blogs, reminders via text... app has it all!

title: Great tracking app
body: Thanks so much for this easy to use betes journal. I love that I can document my meals and insulin consumption and that my Dexcom G5 data is logged as well. I love the report as well. It's easier than documenting in a paper log as my handheld is always in my pocket.

title: Useful App
body: App has helped me to track my glucose & keep my doctor updated. The printed out logs are difficult to read & could use some improvement. My doctor had to look at logs to get a good picture of how medication was working.

title: Great app.
body: I LOVE this app. The chart is so helpful to watch and see when I get it right and when I can do better. Really helping me remember to check my sugars because I am always grabbing the phone for something.

title: Great for T1D
body: This has been a great way to keep track of my son's diabetes care. His dad, stepmom, and I all have this app and it syncs so that we can all access the info on our phones no matter who he is with. Excellent reports. Our endo was really impressed with them!

title: Awesomesauce
body: This app is fantastic! Having diabetes for so long i got out of my groove but i stumbled upon this app and it got me back into a routine! The challenges, bright colors, sounds and of course taming your own little monster made everything fun again!

title: Great App
body: Keeps me on track. Love the monsters. The only suggestion I have is to put back the analysis section. I liked to see my 7, 14, and monthly graphs! I would also add an icon for Dr. Visit so you could keep track of that. I love this App. Well worth the money!

title: Awesome
body: I love this app. It makes it simple and easy. I do wish I could put a max for my fasting number and a separate max for my after meal numbers. It would be cool too if you could look up food or scan it and it count carbs for you to input. But that's just little stuff. Overall amazing app.

title: Hate diabetic record keeping, LOVE This App!!!!!
body: This app is wonderful! Definitely worth it. This thing has me wanting to record my glucose levels, boluses, & food intake. Love the little monster, so cute! My doctor is gonna be happy to see some records from me next month.

title: Close to great
body: The ui is great. The ability to log even when there is no internet connection is great. The reports are excellent.

title: Best BG Log in the App Store
body: I love this app! It makes the sometimes annoying, tedious task of keeping track of blood sugar levels fun. I love the fact that it projects an A1C, and its exported reports are crystalline clear, something that has been very helpful to me and my healthcare team.

title: Love!
body: For the first time in my life with diabetes, I want to log everything! This app is fun and simple. The animation of the mysugr monster is great too! It helps me with my own emotions when it comes to my readings. I would recommend this app to every diabetic out there!

title: Excellent app
body: Great application to track carbs and BG readings. Have been using this app for over 70 days. Easy to navigate and input information. Great reports for the Doctor. I would highly recommend this application to any Diabetic to document there information

title: Love it
body: Didn't want to quit paper log book because I thought it would take longer with an app. It doesn't take any longer, and I get the bonus of tracking so much more than just my glucose values. Love it.

title: Amazing
body: Love this app. I have always had a hard time keeping my log up to date and remembering to give insulin for all I ate, but this keeps my attention.

title: Easy
body: Easy way to keep track of readings and everything else that comes with being diabetic. My doctor loved the print out reports I gave to him from this on my last appointment. Recommend 100%

title: Fun and functional
body: Use this to manage my 6yo daughters diabetes.  She likes the monster and wishes it made more sounds. Easy to use. Love the simple design. Wish there was a calculator function built in & could customize some tags. Love export option. Very, very pleased!!!!

title: Excellent program for first-time patient
body: I really like using this program, it's great to keep track of my readings. So easy to use and lots of good features. Very reliable and consistent program open it always works great

title: Huge help!
body: For the last few months tracking with My Sugr has been my only change for my diabetic health - resulting in a loss of 13 lbs and more consistent numbers! Easy, quick, helpful! Planning to go Pro next!

title: Great tracker
body: Has really helped my lower my A1C by .5 points which means I don't need to take any medicine. I just wish the developers would charge a fair price, I don't want to pay a monthly fee but would like access to the reports.

title: Great App
body: Been actively using for a few weeks now and other than a few customizable options I would want this is the best app for tracking my daily data!

title: Love it!!
body: I only wish there was a spot to input my diabetic pills I take. Am I missing that?

title: So far, so good!
body: I downloaded this app a month ago, and at first, I kept forgetting to use the app. But now, I find that not only do I remember to use the app, that my habit of using the app reminds me to check my blood sugar. I am sure my health will be enhanced by this app!

title: D-Mom
body: I am a mom to a new diabetic onset child, this app has been a great way for me to document everything and feel as though I can look for BS trends.  It is easy to use and helps me keep everything organized for the doctor.

title: Love this app
body: Using this app to track my results have helped me out so much. Love it. My most used app on my phone!! Need update needs work! My app keeps crashing when I try & open! Can't seem to fix it grrrrr. Keep up the updates!!

title: Easy
body: This app makes it easy to keep track of your glucose levels. I am newly diagnosed about 2 months ago When I went back to the doctor all I had to do is show him my app for him to see the numbers.

title: Great way to track sugar!
body: I've tried a couple other apps for tracking my glucose levels, and this has been by far the best! It's easy to use and let's me track many different things so that's awesome.

title: Super
body: This app really keeps me in check! And motivates me to actually check and write down my blood sugars. Only thing is sometimes I forget to add it in so it'd be nice to be able to add a certain time that you tested but forgot to log it.

title: Love!
body: Best app I've used to track my glucose readings yet!  Very easy to record the amount of carbs and see the resulting glucose value right next to it!  Very easy to scroll down all the results I've recorded!  I recommend this app to every diabetic I know :)

title: Excellent
body: I have tried other apps but they are not as detailed as this one. It has forced me to stay on track and I am almost in a competition with myself to do better based on my personal goals.

title: OMG!! It is so cute!!
body: Ok, probably NOT what you think of first when considering diabetic log apps. But, the wee sugar monster makes the whole process a little more fun and a little more amusing and a little more likely you will use the app to tame your monster.

title: Ehh, ok, I'll give ya 5 despite...
body: The app works. Can't figure out some of the uses like adding the other stuff; exercise, carbs, etc.. This is my first personal dealings with diabetes. It was the first app I ran across. We'll see how things go. Follow up review to come. Enjoy the beer.

title: Makes keeping records fun!
body: I just love the easy format and pictures that make entering data easier and faster. I don't mind taking the small amount of time it takes to actual enter information. 👍

title: Love the app!!!
body: The App is great. I wish I could easily switch between multiple accounts for my children.  I am sure there are other parents with multiple T1D children. Other than that, keep up the good work!

title: Great app!
body: I love everything about this app. I have a 6-year-old son with diabetes and he loves tickling the monster...who he named Mr. Giggles. It makes logging blood sugars, insulin doses, activity, and carbs SO easy. I like how you can print out reports or email directly to our Endocrinologist. This app is awesome!

title: Love it
body: Despite being on an insulin pump, the idea of tracking every BG along with what's happening at the time provides more meaning when I'm looking at trends. Plus, when I enter my BG's, carbs, etc. I'm much more aware of areas where I can improve control.

title: So easy to use
body: I love how easy this is to use! I also love the little monster, amazing how something like that makes me smile. It has every field you could want and store the information in a way that's pretty easy to review.

title: Best diabetes app
body: This app is the best I've used!

title: Great app
body: This app is wonderful for keeping track of everything. It's very user friendly however it would be easier to read if low blood sugars and high blood sugars were not the same color. Most other devices use purple for low and red for high.

title: Great App
body: I really like this app. Works well in keeping us on track and I love that it gives an estimated A1C, no surprises that way. And my daughter loves it when we tame the monster each day! Wish that I could add my own buttons though!

title: Makes watching your health more fun
body: Blood sugar is an elusive and difficult thing to control in the American society. This app helps a person learn what to eat and what not to eat, want to drink etc. to maintain a more healthy lifestyle and control blood sugar more accurately.

title: Easy and fun
body: It's easy to navigate. You can be as detailed as you want it integrates pictures. Still learning all the great features.

title: Sometimes better than my CGM
body: LOVE it!  Still learning, but the interaction with the diabetes monster makes it kinda fun.  I can see where I may need to tweak my I:C rates or learn some portion sizes again.  They tend to change without an occasional refresher.  Really like this!

title: Best way to track for Dr
body: I have to track my numbers for my endocrinologist and this is great because when I see her I can just email a report to her nurse when I check in and don't have to lug around a pad of paper.

title: New Type 2
body: I was diagnosed about a month ago after a really bad hospitalization. I like this app because it does help with motivation with games and challenges. It also emails me with different status reports.

title: Perfect for kids!
body: Our 12 year old was recently diagnosed and it's a great way to have us all keep track of daily progress even while he's at school. It's really easy to use. I highly recommend it!!!

title: Could be better
body: Present features are GREAT. Using often daily to control a disease I've now had for 56 years. THANK YOU! Much manual input while using Medtronic insulin pump and Contour Next glucose meter. Pleased with reports. Would like to suggest additional food icons.

title: Best diabetes app!
body: I have been using this app for a long time and it just keeps getting better. The staff are very accommodating, having implemented a few of the suggestions I requested. I would def recommend for anyone with diabetes!

title: Awesome and super easy to use!
body: We LOVE this ap!!!! It is so easy to use and even fun!   We have tried so hard to find something to help us track my god son's BS!!  This is THE answer!   One easy and convenient place to keep up with everything!!

title: Helped keep me on top of things.
body: I preferred the previous interface with less to enter/fewer prompts to press. You could also see more averages without having to go "pro." However, this app is easy to use, see, and navigate. I wish there were charts or long term data visible but for day to day logging for my t1d it has helped.

title: Love it
body: I love this app. It makes my love so much easier. Probably the best logging app I've ever seen. I just wish all the tags were available for free because I like to track my feeling or other things to see how they are affecting my bg.

title: Wonderful!
body: I have tried many apps to assist me with my diabetes and this one has been absolutely wonderful. I will be upgrading and using this for a very long time. Great job on the development of this app. My wife laughs every time the monster gets fed. Haha

title: Life changer
body: My BG levels used to be all over the place and impossible to keep track. I started feelin miserable and completely out of control. But this app seriously help my life and my levels back on track. Thank you so much mySugr. :D 💙

title: Love this app
body: I love this app. My doctor approves of it too. It's so simple to use and take pictures of meals. It's very easy to email all the blood sugar and food tracking to my doctor. It even has an option for my insulin pump! And the diabetes monster is cute.

title: Amazing!
body: I've used a few other apps to try and manage my diabetes but I get bored with it and it feels more like a hassle in the end. but with this, it's fun and it feels rewarding. I will definitely keep using and it's a big recommendation!

title: Great App
body: This is the best app I've found that helps me keep track of my blood sugar, my carbs and you made it fun at the same time. This keeps me motivated in trying to keep better control of my diabetes and trying to beat the monster.

title: Keeps me motivated
body: I've always had a problem with staying motivated to track my BG. The app makes it fun and challenging. The support is excellent.

title: I love this app. LOVE.
body: I'm a brand new Type 2 diabetic who is still trying to cope and accept what is happening and this app has been my virtual hand to hold for the past 3 weeks. I went to the pro upgrade and am having even more fun with it. ❤️😸💖😜😼🐱🐈🐈🐈🐈🐈

title: Easy to use and valuable tool
body: I tried just about every diabetes helper app in the store and this one is the best.  Easy to make entries with blood sugar, carbs, and dosing. It's nice to track coverage and correction values.  The reports are better than other apps.  So far so good!

title: The best
body: I downloaded several apps to aid me with tracking information pertaining to my diabetes. This app proved to be by far the best. The longer I use it, the more I learn.  Thanks for providing something that is easy to use and beneficial to my life.

title: Simple and Easy
body: It is nice to see the estimated A1c and the graph on how I'm doing. I'm eating a plant based, whole foods diet with no animal products or oil. It has been fun to watch my numbers level out and my weight go down while enjoying starches and lots of veggies and fruits.

title: Problems since last update
body: No longer syncs multiple devices. Also - must close the app & reopen it to see results entered. Have notified the IT support team, but nothing yet. Loved it until this update. Now starting to think of changing apps if this isn't fixed soon.

title: Great App!!!
body: It's a great app to help keep someone's diabetes under control. It's a great visual aid and for those who are competitive it also gives someone motivation to want to win, to tame the monster. Would be nice if it could be made available in Canada too.

title: Awesome
body: This is a wonderful app for keeping track of glucose levels, meals, activity, and even carbs. It's become my favorite. And I can't wait until I get an i watch by the end of the year so I may link all my activity together.

title: MySugar
body: I'm very glad I added this app. It not only helps me to keep track of my readings but it also challenges me to keep my sugar level on track. I can always look back and compare the readings from day to day.

title: Can't download anymore?
body: I have used this diabetes logbook for 1 1/2 years. I tried to update it because I was really excited about the A1C feature but it wouldn't do anything. I uninstalled it thinking them I could just re-download it. Now I can't download it for some reason. I'm really frustrated. Any other day I'd give this 5 stars.

title: Best Log/Analysis App for Diabetics
body: I've used a few of the apps out there but this is the best and the most fun to use. Who doesn't like too see an animated version of their diabetic monster. The analysis and reporting features are perfect for my needs.

title: Best Ever
body: I was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes in 1995. Let's face it: testing, insulin injects, tracking food, exercise, and monitoring blood sugar is challenging. This app makes it super easy to not only track, but it generates awesome reports that I can send to my health care team.

title: Recently Diagnosed
body: I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. My doctor now requires that I test my blood up to 4 times a day, this app helps me keep track of my numbers. So much easier then filling out a log on paper.

title: Excellent BG tracking app
body: Just diagnosed this month with type 2, and have found this app to be awesome in keeping track of my blood glucose levels. Very interested to

title: Awesome App
body: I'm 22 and love using this app. I can email reports to my doctor. Print them out and give them to my doctor. Get an estimated A1C. All for stupid cheap prices. I highly, highly, highly recommend this app to anyone who is growing stagnant in caring for themselves. Perfect app.

title: Pay for basics?
body: Why would you put a ridiculous payment option for an A1C and no have any field to enter amount of insulin per entry.

title: Great app!
body: I love this app. It's great being able to log information on the go and be able to generate useful reports to share with my doctors. The developers listen to your suggestions about ways to personalize the app for you.

title: mySugr is awesomesauce!
body: mySugr is easy to use, modern looking (seriously, no medical clunkiness here!), and extremely rewarding. It's fun to play, keeps my information stored and accessible in a bunch of useful ways...and it's pretty too! Check out my full review on cyberneticdiabetic (dot) com.

title: Life changer
body: Perfect app for the analytical person who needs details to control their health. App is the true epitome of ingenious and will provide 10 fold worth of data and all you have to do is give it a little bit of time.

title: Amazing App for New Diabetic Lack Food Tracking
body: This app is amazing! The only thing that would make it better is if it did a better job with tracking detailed information on the food you eat and the carbs in the food instead of just a summary line you enter.

title: Great app
body: I downloaded this app the other day after seeing my doctor and it is helped me immensely in keeping track of my daily sugar levels, carbs and insulin amounts. I would definitely recommend you get it, considering it's free.

title: Love Mysugr
body: It's easy peasy & very helpful. The only problems I see are the importer takes a while to show up in the log book, or doesn't show at all , it also stalls for a few moments & needs a better selection of meters capatible with the importer , for $27 I expected a bit more. So 3 stars because not doing what it's suppose too !

title: Great tracker
body: There are only two things that keep me from a 5-star review. First, the field that are numeric only and don't switch the input to numbers (only one does that I've seen) and the critter. I want to turn that of.  I find it more annoying than cute, but I'm a grumpy old man :)

title: My sugar review
body: I love the little monster. I only have two issues:

title: MySugar
body: I've only been using it for a few weeks but like how easy the interface is. Haven't explored all the features yet but will soon. I will be interested to see how close my A1C will be to the tools estimate.

title: Easy to use
body: Just started to take insulin and I like how this app lets you log dosages as well as pills. The estimated A1C is helpful as well to give you an idea of what your test results will be, plus logging often keeps me on top of my sugars.

title: Greatest App for Diabetes
body: I've been out of control with my diabetes for a while. However with this app I've been doing great and turned around my diabetes in just a month. My doctors were really surprised. One of the best apps I've ever used :)

title: Great App!!!
body: I couldn't ask for more from this app! I use it for my 5 yr old daughter and she loves to feed "Squishy"! Plus, everything is intuitive and user friendly and the ability to send logs off to the doctor is great! Thx MySugr team!!!

title: Finally
body: I have never been good at checking my bg because I found it difficult to log. I kept a little notebook but kept track of nothing other than the glucose level. This app makes it easy to log levels, foods, moods, activities, etc.

title: Very helpful
body: After months of issues with diabetes. My doctor asked me to keep a record this helps very much with me always being on the go

title: If only it had it all!
body: This app is great! It causes me to think about what I am doing and be more thorough in my diabetes care. I just wish that I could keep track of what I eat through this app. It would be great if I could find a app that did it all!! But this one is great for diabetes care!

title: Makes tracking fun
body: Easy way to log, I actually look forward to logging. It's flexible and fits my needs. I've recommended it to numerous friends. The big plus is that I can email it to my doctor.

title: Love the app!!
body: This is the greatest app since a slice of bread was invented!! I love the ease of being able to use my phone to log my glucose any where that I am at. And being able to just download my log at my dr's office is a huge plus.

title: This app is awesome
body: As a 36 year old I think this is a great app. I was off track for a while and this app has helped get me going in the right direction.  It has also let my kids be involved and help me want to cage the monster.

title: Best we found after researching
body: It helped us monitor and analyse the progress of our 4 yrs old girl who was diagnosed with Type 1. After few days we managed to understand how to balance insulin units against food given.

title: Impressed!
body: I'm impressed with the app and its ease of use along with the the multiple categories that offer input. I also like the ability it provides to sync with my iPad and iPhone. Well done.

title: Very helpful
body: Extremely user friendly. Keeps everything you need in one place. You can use use as many or as few of the features as you choose.

title: Best app!!
body: This is an awesome app!

title: Fun + Effective!
body: I love not only how cute the app is (how often do you get to tickle the monster that eats your blood sugars?!) but the ease with which you can view trends and enter information; and I only have the free version! Definitely a must have!!

title: Makes tracking my blood sugar fun
body: The app helps me make my day, whether my glucose reading is low or high. When it's high, your app tells me so but gives me support to keep on going; when it's on track, the app cheers me on!

title: Awesome!
body: This is great tracking tool. Would be great if it came with when to log manual and even maybe diabetic tips (merge with a diabetic association so can get more educated about food and diabetes while also tracking) but overall awesome!!

title: Fabulous and Fun
body: Fabulous data tracking and super fun graphics. I enjoy tracking my carbs/data with this app and the platform makes it so easy to do it and pull reports as needed. I highly recommend it. Haha, plus it's pretty!

title: Makes tracking diabetes engaging!
body: I too have had Type 1 diabetes for many years (47 years!) and find tracking my data tedious. This app changed all this. It's engaging, rather fun and makes it all so easy. Kudos!

title: This app requires you to give your email
body: This is just a warning to not bother getting this app if you're like me and refuse to give in to apps that require you to enter personal info (i.e. your email address) in order to function at all. There is no reason in the world why you should have to "create an account" in order to keep track of a series of numbers, which is private HIPAA information anyway. Deleted.
response: Thank you for your concern. Because the app is connected to the mySugr cloud right away and the data isn't saved only locally to the device, the user must create an account so that we can properly associate the data to the right user and the password keeps it locked safely away. Here is a link regarding the safety and privacy of your information :)

title: Fantabulously  East to Use App
body: The MySugar app is a great tool for tracking your blood sugar.  It even estimates your A1C value.  If your tired of keeping track of your log book to keep track of your blood sugar readings, I strongly urge you to check out this app.

title: Its got everything I need
body: It's annoying to track BGs but this takes the frustration out of it.  Reports are good.  A1C is a great feature.  I've been using it for a year or so and haven't yet seen an equal competitor.  Worth every penny

title: Great!
body: This app is so helpful and funny! I use it everyday and it has made a big change in my ability it stay in control and feeling positive about the hard work I am doing!

title: I love this app!
body: This app is awesome!  I actually am more motivated now more than ever to check my glucose levels and stay on track.  Plus all the features are extremely convenient and easy to use!

title: Compared to the Rest - The Best
body: Clean simple to use interface. The ability to log exact times is crucial to depict gradual changes. The ability to document food and moods is also useful as stress and other factors affect glucose.

title: Love this app
body: This app has saved my life basically, I'm very bad about keeping track if my sugar levels. But thanks to this app I now keep track of my sugar, food, how I feel and what I eat. Thank you for making this app

title: Get that monster!
body: I have just been diagnosed with diabetes and wanted a fun and easy app to help me with my diabetes and this was it. It was so good that I went pro right away. Thanks to the app I have already start on the road to a healthy diabetic lifestyle.

title: Love this app...
body: I'm new to glucose testing but love this app for all the various items it lets me keep track of. I'm still trying to figure them out but really like being able to track my progress.

title: Excellent
body: Easy to learn and easy to use daily. Lots of fields to enter your daily info or you can use just a few fields as I do. Display of you current and historical info is easy to see and understand at a glance.

title: A Big Help
body: Having this on my phone has made it much easier to keep track of my blood sugars and my food.  I feel like I'm getting much better control.  Only thing I wish it had the ability to scan my glucose monitor.

title: Great!
body: I love it! I don't have to have a paper log book and I have an easy way to show/share my logs with my doctor. Awesome! And it's fun! I'm sure this is great for kids if an adult likes using it! :D

title: Review
body: Great app to keep track of blood sugars. I am a very bad diabetic but this app helps me to get back on track.

title: Deleted the other ugly boring diabetic apps!
body: Very attractive app, cool sounds and makes logging enjoyable! Very simple to use and did I mention how cool looking this app is?!! Thank you for this app! It will make logging for my 6 yr old child easier.

title: Great, but wish more options for kids
body: Love this app.  I use this to log for my 7 year old daughter.  I only wish they included some options that applied for her age group such as school, etc.

title: awesome
body: Love the homepage; love how easy it is to log as little or as much as you want; love that you can take screenshots or get pdf to email or print. This app motivates me to log and is easier and quicker to use than

title: Easy
body: Easy to keep track of numbers, without making it tedious.  All my info in 1 place, & I don't need a calendar.  I always have my iPad.  I have only used it for 2 weeks +, not a lot of exploring yet.

title: Love this app
body: This app had really helped me control my blood sugar. It is user friendly and the add on importer is great if you have one of the listed meters. Then you can just scan in your BS from your meter. I hope they add more meters soon!

title: Best app for control
body: I have been non-compliant for three years. I have decided to take control of my condition, this app has made it easy for me to track and control my life. It's so easy use and track.

title: Revae
body: I'm very new to this app. It was recommended by my dr. I have been type I for 56 yrs and this disease has started kicking my rear in the last ten years . This app seems fairly simple and easy to use. I am quite pleased with it

title: Great app!
body: This app keeps me on track with my tests and makes a complicated process a bit easier. I would love to see interaction with My Fitness Pro so that it could import food data automatically.

title: Me
body: This is an easy to use app for those just wanting to track daily blood sugars or for those needing to track dosages, carbs, activities, and more. I wish I had found this app earlier!

title: Excellent App
body: This app has open my eyes about what I eat and what my BG is. This has been a great tool for me to use to keep my diabetes in check. Please if you have to check your BG try the app you will be glad that you did.

title: The monster makes it fun!
body: This is, by far, the best app that I have used for diabetes. The monster truly makes it fun! It's easy to keep track of my numbers for my doctors appointments and just as easy to print out and take with me.

title: Highly recommend this app!!!
body: This app is amazing! So much easier to see the bigger picture as opposed to clicking up and down the glucose meter. This app was a game changer for me. Not sure how it works with pump therapy but it is great for those of us on the pens.

title: Simple to use and fun to use
body: Very easy app to use.  You can track almost anything you need to.  Would definitely recommend as a fun tool to track blood glucose levels.

title: Helpful tool
body: We use this app to help my 11 year old type 1 log and it's been great and super easy to use. Love how we can connect to all our iPhones so mom, dad etc can all see up to the minute numbers.

title: Easy
body: Got this app because the blood glucose part of apples health app went missing but have enjoyed it so much I'm going to keep using it. Very easy to use and provides way more save options.

title: $30/year to print/export logs
body: I generally like the app, and while I appreciate that the developers need to make money, Diabetes, especially Type 1, is expensive enough and to have to pay (you have to GoPro) to print a "report" (blood log for your doctor) is just excessive. I would pay 9.99 for the app out right, but not $30 per year. In my opinion exporting logs is the only real value in going pro, the challenges are good, but not essential.

title: Best way to log!
body: I am currently logging everything I do and I actually enjoy logging using this app. I don't think I have ever had fun keeping track of things but MySugr makes it easy and entertaining.

title: Still New to the app
body: I really want this to help me. I'm still trying to figure it all out. If nothing else, I like feeling connected to others out there, knowing there's a younger generation coming up with new tools to help. Thanks, from a Type 1 of 45 years.

title: Awesome app for diabetes
body: This app has literally allowed me to collect every data point from blood sugar to meals to weight and beyond. The app allows me to visualize this information in a useful way and help myself to move forward

title: Best Tool I Have
body: I just want to encourage anyone who is a diabetic and not already using this app to give it a try. It's easy, fun, and motivating. For the first time, I enjoy checking and logging my blood sugar. And I'm learning a lot along the way.

title: Great App
body: Probably one of the best diabetic tracker apps to date! Great to connect what you're doing to social media sites and photo your meals. The only thing I wish I could do is set which insulins are used. But for now I use notes.

title: Basic is very basic
body: The basic app does make it as enjoyable as possible to have to enter your data. BUT, there is no export unless you go pro. That wouldn't be a problem if pro wasn't a monthly fee. I would be more than willing to pay for the pro version, just not a monthly fee. 😞

title: Great Log App
body: My son was just diagnosed with type 1 diabetes.... This app has helped me a lot in keeping his logs..

title: Working well for me
body: This app is easy to use and offers plenty of features in the free version.  It helps me track my blood sugar and can add location, meal information, medicine consumption and much more.

title: Great app!!
