body: I've used several diabetic apps through the years. This app is my favorite, I love all the features available on the free version. I'm sure the paid version is even more awesome than the free version.

title: Just Fabulous !
body: Best app available for managing T1D! It's great because you can log in everything you need! Wonderful for keeping track and watching trends. It's kid friendly as well! I just love the little monster icon.

title: Getting it under control
body: I love this app.  It has helped me develope a better picture of my BG's and so much more.  It so comprehensive.  I feel that my health is much improved & I'm more in control.  Easy set up & easy to use!

title: Best diabetic app
body: I've been a type 1 diabetic since 1970. I've tried other apps, this is only one that works for me. It's EASY EASY to use and actually fun. Quick, too. The PDF reports are perfect to take to endocrinologist.
response: Great to hear that you like the pdf reports :) Hope your Dr loves them too :)

title: Great for gestational diabetes, too!
body: Really helps me keep track and stay motivated to log my numbers. I wasn't sure this would fit my needs with GD but I'm so glad I gave it a shot! The cute animation doesn't hurt either :)

title: Life saver
body: This app is amazing!!! It allows us to constantly see how our daughter is doing and what she is eating no matter who she is with. It has really made managing t1d  a lot easier. My hat is off to your team. This is a life saver!

title: Sensational!
body: Even my endocrinologist was amazed with the app! It's helped me stay on track with logging, and have a better idea of how my blood sugar is running. It's fun too as you get challenges to motivate you to do better. So cool. Love. It.

title: Awesome!
body: Love the app! My son was just diagnosed about 2 weeks ago with T1D, and the cute little monster has kept him entertained as we keep up with everything. It's also great to have his info with me all the time.

title: Funtastic
body: If you're like me and encounter diabetes burnout in months that end in "r" or "y" this is the app for you.  Seriously, I'm not sure why getting points and badges entices me to stab my finger more often, but it does.  This is totally helping keep me a1c in range.  Great app!

title: A little too much
body: Not a bad app, good for tracking, but 20 dollars is a bit much for a reporting/ email system. All the silly face icons and games are not what I want or need. I found one that does all that I need for 2 dollars and it lets me sync to my other devices via wifi and cloud.

title: Gives me something to be accountable too
body: I love this app. It's the first time since 1997 where I have accountability. I can look back and find my patterns and understand what is happening. I'm so happy I have this app.

title: Motivation monster
body: Diabetes is a monster in my life now I feel like I get to tame it day by day because this is a marathon not a sprint. I enjoy the interaction. It makes me better and any little better I'll take in this battle.

title: It helps
body: I like that you can earn the app free if you log in enough times. Otherwise, it's out of my price range. I like the little monsters too. Hopefully, it will keep me in check.

title: Extremely useful and well thought out app!
body: Very well developed app. I'm a app freak, so just by having the app I been the most consistent ever in keeping up with the diabetes that has attached itself to my body.

title: Perfect addition
body: This is what I've been missing! The ability to see my trends in real time and a convenient application is exactly what I needed to get a better handle on my blood glucose levels!

title: So easy
body: It's a great tool to help with tracking your days. Personally I don't like sound effects but that doesn't mean I don't think app is great. Thank you for making our days easier

title: Love it! Good support
body: It takes the daunting task of taking my sugar and keeps it interesting. More people should experience this. Wish the price would go down. I am definitely considering purchasing.

title: GET IT
body: Best app for diabetes i have ever used! Type 1 for years tried a bunch of apps... This one blows them away! Takes a sec to get used to but they actually makes it fun to use the app rather then a monotonous chore!

title: Love it!! Best app ever!
body: This is the best app. It's the perfect logbook that doesn't even feel like a logbook. I eagerly await more features!! Especially more analyzing features would be amazing (showing more trends, etc) but really, the app is perfect as it is

title: The app you've been waiting for
body: I had been waiting for it. Even started designing what it might look like. This is pretty amazing. You owe it to yourself and your loved ones to give it a try.

title: So easy!!!
body: I really like the ease of just logging your readings instead of going through all these steps just to log a glucose level with other apps that I have tried. I love the simplicity

title: Great app
body: Keeping diabetes info can be tiresome but this app makes it fun and easy. Data is vital to better treatment of diabetes and after 40 years of living with diabetes, I now have an app to help me. Really like the friendly approach and attitude. Love it!

title: Great app
body: I am a newly diagnosed type 2 diabetic and started using this app 2 months ago. It is a great tool to log my results and view them to see the progress I have made. Highly recommend this app.

title: HANDS DOWN. BEST APP EVER FOR DIABETES
body: I have had type 1 diabetes for 12 years now and I have been looking for a perfect app to manage my diabetes and this app WORKS PERFECTLY. I know theres monthly payment but its sooooo worth every penny. I love this app and would recommend to any diabetic.

title: Love this App
body: Easy to use. One place to keep track of everything to better manage BG.  It's nice seeing things graphed and color changes when you are in and out of target range.

title: Just what I neeeded
body: Great tool to log my numbers plus meals, activities and how I feel.  I wish you could free text on each day i.e. -had two desserts or went to party etc. I am still learning all the ins and outs of App.  I might try the pro version for New Years.

title: The best way to manage your Diabetes
body: I've struggled with everything from checking my blood sugars to correcting, and this app has helped me take care of myself more than all other methods combined

title: Awesome!
body: I've been a diabetic for 13 years now and it's always been a hassle to have the little paper books! This is so nice and super easy to use! I upgraded as well!! 110% recommend this app!

title: Awesome
body: I got the app for my young son to track his blood sugars. He is 8 and was diagnosed at age 1. We have lots of ups and downs. I love this app. I can see a clear picture and make decisions on his insulin adjustments with confidence. It's 100% worth the purchase!

title: Love it 😊
body: I have enjoyed using this app better than another one I have used. It is very user friendly. When I did my a1c is was exactly the same as the app. I want to upgrade one day.

title: Very useful App!
body: I was recently diagnosed with CFRD and this App has been a lifesaver so far. Just wish that I could look up the carbs in my food so that I don't have to keep switching between the MyFitnessPal App and this one.

title: Love this app
body: I was not very good about checking my glucose level before getting this app. Now I check three times a day. The tracking becomes a challenge to complete on a daily basis.

title: Great app!
body: Love this app in that you can track everything from your activities, meds and food to the number of carbs you ate at each meal...highly recommend to anyone!

title: Excellent app!
body: A very helpful app for diabetics. It has helped me keep better track of when I have to take insulin and my blood sugars throughout the day. It has allot of other helpful tools I have yet to use.

title: Just diagnosed
body: My husband was just diagnosed with type 1 diabetes and this app has been amazingly helpful to share information with the doctor and in figuring out the amount of insulin that is appropriate for him!

title: Like the app so far
body: I have only had it a week and it's working to keep me on track. I wish it had more options for exercise like walking not sports. When I get my new monitor I will see how well it does with automatic sync to my phone.

title: Best app
body: I've always had a hard time keeping track of my sugars until this app. It's fun, user friendly, and great for everyone! It's made logging my info 100 times better!

title: Love it
body: Excellent app. This is the 1st time I ever wrote a review. Very easy to use even for old people who are challenged by todays technology, like me. Light hearted not boring like other apps I've tried. Upgraded to pro after using it for a week.

title: This is my new tracker
body: Love this app.  I'm 40 years old and for some reason this app gives me the motivation I need to keep a close eye on my sugars.  I recommend you at least try it for a while.

title: Does the job
body: This app does the job of keeping track of your insulin intake and glucose measurements. You have to pay for the pro version in order to email reports to your doctor. The monster stuff doesn't work for me but the app works as promised.

title: Good app but could be better
body: I have used a few other BGL trackers and logs and none were as easy to use as this app. That being said, I wish the activities tracker would sync to my health app and give credit for all the walking I do.

title: Wonderful app
body: I love how easy it is to use. The interface reads clearly and helps me keep track of my sugar levels. A great thing to have with you when you don't have your testing kit.

title: Finally, I don't feel guilty for not being perfect!
body: Type 2 for about 6 years. I've always felt guilty about everything having to do with diabetes. This app is really good. It's like a non-judgmental best friend.

title: Great App
body: I am learning a lot of things about myself and my blood sugar levels. Wish I could add more medicine that I am taking that shows up in that field since I take more than one.

title: Mom
body: Like this app. My son just got diagnosed with type 1. This has helped us log his blood sugar and have fun. Little challenges keep him motivated to test. Nice to log meals and moods to keep track of what

title: Easy to use and see results
body: Love to record my blood sugar and food.  It's easy to follow your progress and you can sent reports directly to your Dr. Via email.  I love it!  Thank You!  Now we need Medtronic pumps to blue tooth directly to the app!

title: Awesomeness!
body: I love this app. I use it to keep track of my 5 year old's carb and food intake, bg, exercise, mood... Etc. it's perfect to track data and recognize patterns with various foods and exercise and how they affect blood glucose. Looking forward to the kid version!

title: Exactly what I needed
body: mySugr is exactly what I needed to start caring about my diabetes again. It's attractive, intuitive, and easy to start using. Plus, I had a really lovely, supportive email exchange with one of the founders. It's the full package!

title: Great
body: I was just diagnosed with Diabetes and so havering this app to log on has made it not as stressful. There's challenges to do also. When you sign up mysugr email can even share stories with you about there diabetic stories. GET THE APP IT'S GREAT!!!

title: Great Way to Log Blood Sugar
body: When I was told to start tracking my sugar readings, I wanted something that was easy to use, integrated with Apple Health and gives me a visual way to tell what my trends are. This app delivers on all fronts!

title: Love it
body: Love this app! I only wish this one would merge with the myfitnesspal app so my carb intake would be more accurate without having to switch apps back and forth.

title: So happy
body: I'm really happy with all the features of this app. I love that it estimates A1c. The log has a fun atmosphere so I don't feel bad about bad control. The icons for the notes section are awesome (from site changes to stress to housework)

title: Amazing!
body: I've never EVER written a review for an app but this one deserves it.  It's the best thing that's happened for my health.  I want to take my blood sugar!!! I love seeing the graphics and it's helped me improve my blood sugar from the first day.  Best app ever!!!

title: Easy to use
body: Tried several different apps. But this one is easy to use and the log book shows the readings in a list. So its it easy to see good or bad trends. Very happy with this app. Thank you guys

title: Great app
body: Great app; lets me save enough info to accurately track all my glucose info. And it sounds silly but the little animations and audio from the little monster tracking character actually motivates me!

title: iPad App
body: We have used this app ever since I was diagnosed its type 1. I had to get the iPhone app on my iPad and it doesn't look that great. It would just be great if you made an iPad app so it would look better on my device. Besides that I absolutely love this app!

title: Great app!!
body: I have type 2 diabetes and on insulin. This app has been a great motivator for me. I truly hope on the next update that we will be able to log our after meal blood glucose numbers.

title: Diabetes Made Fun
body: I've never had an app that understood me more. I do EVERYTHING on my phone and keep a daily log of my diabetes is a godsend. I've had type 1 for 5 years and I truly believe this app will help me live a long healthy life.

title: Best by far
body: This is by far the best app we have used for diabetes management.

title: Awesome app
body: Great app. Easy to use. Only thing I might want is the built-in ability to track my Metformin pills. The challenges and sounds make it at least tolerable to track this information.

title: Good app but not syncing with other health programs
body: I love this app. Makes tracking my sugar fun but doesn't play well with the healthkits apps as they don't track the sugar. Wish it would grab my carbs from my fitness tracker

title: Very useful with a great and fun design
body: I keep better track than ever of my health. I actually look forward to writing down my BS and my meals. I really like the fun and colorful design, it makes diabetes not seem so serious.

title: RN
body: This app has greatly reduced my stress, since I can now See in a graph all the pertinent data that can contribute to my son's Highs and lows. Plus, it's fun and colorful! Thank you for providing a positive aspect to this new and sometimes scary diagnosis. It's such a huge help!

title: Awesome App
body: My doctor loves this app because he gets a snapshot of my daily numbers and if he has any concerns then he can open up the day and see the activity and the foods eaten. I love it because the app is easy to use.

title: Helpful
body: As a diabetic for decades, this app is wonderful for logging and seeing trends between endo appointments. Much needed since the only other apps deal mainly with calories and exercise for fitness and not the details of this disease. No way to do a negative correction for BG.

title: Great app!!!!!  Easy to use and takes the mystery out of controlling diabetes
body: This app is great and has really helped me as a new struggling diabetic.  It is a one stop tracker for weight carbs exercise.  It makes a complex situation manageable for a lay person.  One word - lifesaver!!!!!!

title: Wonderful
body: This app has truly been amazing. With my youngest being a new type 1 the tracking and export has make sending his numbers to the doctors so much easier.

title: Fantastic app!
body: Love the app! I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I wish it had a feature to look up food carb counts instead of having to go to another app for that. Otherwise it's a fun and detailed app. Great for reports to the doctor.

title: Love the app
body: Love this app. Easy to use and you can keep lots of important information. Very convince to show my doctor my numbers!! Also impressed the doctor and asked me what app it was. Thank you so much!!!!

title: Fun
body: Fun to use. I enjoy the little live sugar monster, his little animations, sayings and personality. I also like the push buttons. This app 'gets the diabetics' and the analytics are a major plus. I enjoy logging my numbers now.

title: Wonderfully easy App
body: This app works great for tracking trends for my 11 year old son's Type 1. Easy to enter data and also easy to read. Would love a built in calculator though!!

title: Love this app! Carolinapear
body: I use this app to record my blood sugars and get an idea from the analysis and trend reports how I'm doing. I like that I can also list specifics of my diet and activity. Easy to use. Highly recommend.

title: Diabetes made less awful
body: This app really helps me want to test my blood more. I can easily email and export info to my parents or doctors. It's beyond helpful and I would recommend it to any diabetic'!

title: Helps track
body: This app is easy to use and it is helping me keep my numbers in check. Like anything it is up to the user to log but is a great tool.  The monster is fun too.

title: Great app
body: I have found that the app is quite easy to use. Its helpful. One thing that would be nice though is to be able to seen more of the graph. Other wise i like it.

title: Great app
body: This has helped me lower my a1c by 2 points in 7 weeks. I think it's just makes me accountable.  I would love to see a pedometer and or a calorie counter added in to the app!  But it's worth the cost as is!

title: So fun and easy!!
body: I'm in love with this program! I've been a type 2 diabetic for almost 5 years and this app has actually made it fun to keep track of my sugar and it's so simple to use!!

title: Cute app
body: I'm enjoying the different ways to log things and look forward to a computer/web log option as well but di far very cute.

title: Just what I needed
body: This app works great for me. I always have my phone with me and it's no problem to keep track of my meals, carbs, insulin and exercise. It's got so many different features I can keep my CDE informed I just love it!

title: New update is great
body: The new update is great cause I never really had way to chart my carbs unless I used another app, now that it sends my carbs and BG to the health app I can keep track of both more in a simple chart form

title: Mysugr
body: Awesome app!! It helps me keep our blood sugars monitored and helps us remember our carb counts. Especially useful at the doctors office when asked about monitoring. My son loves to watch the monster and his antics. Use this and tell others, it's super!

title: Actually life-changing
body: I'm 25, and I've had Type 1 diabetes for 18 years. This is the first time I've actually wanted to use my logbook --- enjoyed it, even.  This app is fun, super easy, and a game changer in my diabetes management.

title: Excellent diabetic log
body: New diabetic here. Specifically gestational diabetes. This app makes it all easy. Logging food, glucose levels, it has it all. I would love to see an option for saving frequently used meals/foods. That is the only thing that is missing for me.

title: Making life with diabetes easier
body: Wow!! This app is really helping me. Makes tracking fun. And with a glucometer that syncs automatically makes it easier!! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

title: Needs a few more logging options
body: The reports are great, but it needs a few more features. E.g., a Wake Up tag for morning BG readings and an option to customize the report length. Also, I haven't seen if there's a CSV exporting option.

title: Not bad at all!
body: Keeping track of my blood sugar is still a chore, but with this app at least I can visualize my progress and my slip-ups. With this app, I don't feel like I'm fighting an uphill battle all the time. 👍🏼

title: It was great until the most recent update
body: I have really enjoyed using this app until the most recent update.  It is more difficult to use now compared to before.  I am not happy that some of the most recent additions were now placed in the "Pro" version of the app.  Not all of us can afford to go Pro!

title: Log on issues
body: I have to log on several times a week

title: One of my favorite BG tracking  app.
body: One of the best I used. If it had little more versatile features - it would definitely warrant a five star - like for instance - more flexibility in producing reports. E.g. a fasting BG report...etc. Would have also liked a one time price vs membership.

title: hella
body: really helps with keeping up with everyday life as a person with type 1! the little creature is so cute and it really helps that I can send PDF files to my doctor!

title: Lifesaver
body: I was out of control and in denial. Type 2. This app is easy, convenient, and always with me. It was really helped me focus understand and improve. My doctor likes it too.

title: Big help!
body: I'm a brand new type two, and this app is helping me stay on top of my numbers. The monster is hugely motivating, and I find the way this app tracks meals and meds very intuitive.

title: Newly diagnosed
body: I've been a nurse for a very long time and diabetes is not necessarily new to me- until it became real to me.  This app has helped me to understand so much more of what diabetes is as how to treat it. It helps me as a new diabetic, AND to be a better nurse!

title: Helping big time
body: This app is helping me to get back on track with my glucose tracking. Really like the concept. I wish that I could put on there what time I bolus my Lantau, but I really like using this!

title: Almost perfect
body: I appreciate everything about this ap.  My only wish would be if it could track insulin on board.

title: Totally cute and fun...
body: I love this app, the little monster is so funny and cute when you earn points whether he's praising you or makes a noise to 'scold' you for going over -- can't wait to go pro!

title: Love it!
body: If you have to track so much info for diabetes at least the app makes it easy and kind of fun. Worth more than the $9.99 I paid for the full version! Big fan :)

title: I freakin love this app!!
body: I use this app several times daily. Its easy to use and gives great analysis in easy to print or email format. Not sure what I would do without my diabetes monster!!

title: Great App!!
body: This app is really great to track your BS. Carbs, insulin and a lot of other details others do not. It is also fun with the challenges and little reminder sounds. I highly recommend this app.

title: Best app to track my sugar
body: I have used app for 2 years. Works great just can't seem to spend the extra $$ for pro version. Keeps me on track and the drs like the print outs I give them.

title: Best App Out There
body: This is the best app out there. The best part about the app is that its user friendly. The developers definitely paid attention to the needs of someone trying to manage their diabetes. It's great for any age.

title: A little buggy
body: I like this app and have used it for awhile. There's not enough of a selection in the symbols to accurately log activities. What was the reason to link it to Apple app? Useless. Combining with a food section so that the number of carbs and dietary suggestions would be accessible would be great.

title: Amazing!!!!
body: I'm a type 2 who needs all the help I can get!!! I actually look forward to putting my numbers and injections in and taming that ️sugar monster!!!!! I ❤️this app!!! Thank you!!! thank you!!! thank you!!!!!

title: Helpful
body: I really like the app, it has cool challenges that make you want to achieve and the fact that it has a little monster that reflects how your diabetes is going is interesting.

title: Best diabetes app
body: I love this app. It's very useful and actually makes you want to keep a log. I love the challenges, sounds, and the diabetes monster. It's really been motivating me to keep a log so I can beat the diabetes monster!

title: Nice App!!
body: Keeps track of the 7 day average which is nice. I like the email one gets at the end of the weekend with your current numbers and last week numbers.

title: Great app
body: Great log keeper, very easy to use.

title: I love this app!!!!
body: I love this app!  I have type II diabetes and this app has motivated me to keep up with what I am eating and logging and all the other stuff I am supposed to do!  I am 36 years old and still love to feed my monster!!

title: Amazing.
body: I have been a diabetic for the past seven years. Always looking for the right tool to help me keep track and for me this is it. It is perfect. I upgraded to the Pro And couldn't be more happy.

title: Great App
body: I'm new at needing to keep track of my levels, the app provides me with an easy way to track my numbers, as well as let's me print out a stats sheet for doctors visits. Very happy with it so far.

title: Shouldn't say this, but fun
body: If something is enjoyable, I'm more apt to do it. I got this app and the iHealth meter, with Bluetooth and I haven't missed a reading or food log, since. For a gadget geek like me, this brings blood checking out of the "Stone Age".

title: Great app
body: This app will help you keep track of your glucose levels and more. It is also fun to hear the little monster laugh every time you earn points.

title: Good stuff
body: This app makes it entertaining and, dare I say, kinda engaging when it comes to tracking the 'beetus. I like the pro version, and the devs are quick at tech support, even over holidays.

title: Fantastic
body: Outstanding and comprehensive tracking that supports a healthier lifestyle.  Would love to see a few more bells and whistles like remembering meals and carb counts.  Overall I can't recommend this highly enough.

title: Good Sugar
body: This app is awesome all u have to do after you take ur blood glucose is input the numbers. And when you go to your doctor u have what you need no more guessing are keeping a log book. Yahhhh

title: New to Diabetes
body: I am newly diagnosed and was feeling overwhelmed with all of the information I had to keep track of. This app has helped me immensely. Now I am excited each day to "feed the monster"

title: Good For Tracking
body: I love the recent updates! They're user friendly and make it easier to track my stats and activities. This is a wonderful app!

title: Love it
body: This is probably one of my favorite apps. It's easy to use, convenient and the aesthetics are great too. I love the little picture tags and the challenges help you stay motivated to log.

title: Newly Disbetic
body: Thus far this app is helping me keep track of my levels and it motivates me to keep pushing myself to take control of this illness. I do recommend this app to the diabetic communist whether Type 1 or 2!

title: Great Tool
body: I find this app fun and useful. Setting a goal to help me keep track of my insulin and little reminders so I know it's time to check blood sugar. I can also keep track of carbs and Meds.

title: Family app
body: This is the best app I found to keep everyone in the family inform about O's diabetes at all time. Been using it for about 2 months now and will keep using it!

title: Type 2
body: The more I use the app the easier it becomes to want to log and the more I enjoy the benefits it provides. It provides a great way to log numbers.

title: Handy log
body: After a couple of years ignoring my type 2 a hypo incident has me checking my blood daily now. I like this app for ease of use tracking my numbers and ability to add various notes as they occur.

title: Best App
body: This has helped me watch my sugar under control. It's been the greatest thing to keep track of my glucose readings right on my phone instead of keeping a paper log.

title: Must have app
body: This is an incredible app! I love tracking my sugars with this product! After 20 years of being diabetic it's nice to have something fun and easy to use like this!

title: Love it!
body: I'm a new diabetic and having this app helps me feel more in control.  I'm able to identify trends that are happening and show my doctor what has been going on too.

title: Awesome App
body: Great to have an automatic calculation of 7 day bg avg right in front of you. With it being linked on both mine and my 13 yr old T1 Daughter's phone we can easily share he information on her bg levels.

title: Love this app!!
body: It is wonderful!! Really helps me keep track of my bgl bolus etc. i love the reports you can export saves me from having to deal with the annoying booklet! 5/5 would recommend!

title: Best App Ever
body: I have several illnesses I found it a real pain to deal with my diabetes constantly being reminded that I am sick until I found this app, great work and your support is outstanding

title: Fantastic!
body: I absolutely love this app, it is my ideal logbook, I can keep everything all in one place and I know I will always have it on me! Plus the challenges really help keep me motivated! Overall this app is great!!

title: Little Monster
body: Just love my little monster. It's nice for someone to be on your side. Not that anyone is against me. It is just like me and my little monster have a secret.... We at managing this thing together!

title: Great tool!
body: I love the tool, hate my numbers! It really helps me to see patterns over time and hopefully get me back on track. It's already making a difference for me. Very easy to use.

title: Missing something
body: Seems like extra work to record on this app. I have to manually input all data (no way to scan results!?) then I can't print off data for my doctor/dietitian unless I pay a huge amount to "upgrade?" What is the benefit?

title: Great app
body: I have a two year old son who is diabetic. I am also separated from his mom so he goes from house to house a lot and this app is perfect. Also great for when someone is watching him.

title: Great app for tracking
body: My 7-year old likes to enter his own data because it's so easy and fun. I like it because it's one more thing he can do himself. Thanks for such a great app!

title: Great APP
body: I love this app. It makes me want to check my blood sugars more often and keep on track. Hoping to be able to upgrade so I have access to all areas of this app!!!!

title: Staying on Track
body: I bought the premium edition for $2.99 so I could get reminders to check again and so that I could printout pdfs to take to my endocrinologist. Over all a great app

title: Download this app!
body: This is such a great app and it helped me stay sane during the first days of my diagnosis. Now my sugar monster makes me smile even on my worst days. It is so easy to use. I totally recommend it!!!

title: Most worthwhile and efficient
body: The app meets all my logging needs.

title: Super helpful!
body: I have been using this app for a few months and it helps me with tracking my highs and lows. As a uncontrolled diabetic the A1c is a great motivator to keep trying. Definitely worth using.

title: Awesome way to keep track
body: Ok even my doctor loves this app it's easy to use if your premium you can email all of your records to your doctor or advisor to keep them up to date

title: Love it!
body: Much more than a logbook! Recommend to all my patients for ease of use, motivational components, junior version, cute monster, and PDF export feature. Developers are very receptive to user feedback too!

title: convenient
body: Mysugr is definitely better than writing it down on paper. The pro feature should help us print for free though.

title: Awesome App!
body: A great app. The free version not only does great in keeping my logs, it also keeps me motivated to continue doing better. The only improvement could be the price of the paid version as I would definitely buy it.

title: Makes logging so easy!
body: Love this app! You can easily log while on the go. The reports allow you to see trends and my doctor appreciates all my hard work. Excellent app!

title: Fun app!
body: I'm old enough to do stuff that isn't fun, but it's way more fun if it IS fun! My Endo folks like the monster noises too, but maybe not as much as I do. Way better than finding a piece of paper to write on!

title: Perfect
body: I've been T1 Diabetic for 25 years and finally there is the perfect app to keep track of my daily bg readings, insulin doses, exercise, and diet. Keep up the good work and thanks for helping make my diabetes easier to manage.

title: So well designed!
body: This app is intuitive, comprehensive and has a great interface. Everything about it is great, I love it. Thanks a million, perhaps now I'll actually enjoying logging!

title: Awesome !!
body: Best app out there to track and organize all my numbers. Creators are extremely helpful and are there to talk to if I'm confused about something. Very easy to understand and love the look.

title: Great, but not perfect
body: The free version is fine for me except it would be great if it would remind me to test my sugars.

title: mySugr
body: This app is amazing!!! It makes it so easy to track everything related to diabetes (plus some extras). AND it's even easier to download and take with me to review with my doc. HIGHLY recommend!

title: Great ap
body: Love this app. Makes it so easy to track and trend.  Also makes you think about what you're eating if you log each meal. Keeps you on the right track

title: Great app
body: I like this app because I don't have to write down my numbers when I take my sugar. I like the little monster that makes noises and gives you encouragement😊

title: Really helpful
body: I've recommitted myself to reduce my blood sugar levels and this app has helped me do this. My only issue is there is almost too much information.

title: Great logging app
body: I really like this app because my son likes to help enter his stuff in. Also when I'm gone my husband can enter stuff on his own phone and I can see it.

title: Good app
body: I enjoy logging my data with it. It could be better if I can at least see the data in a chart. But overall it's still good.

title: Easy to Use
body: It is easy to log meds and blood sugar as well as keeping a log of food and exercise. Like a diary of quick info to reference and see patterns

title: Monster-ific
body: Excellent, and easy to use. Only complaint is that reports are in CSV, and you can only get PDF if you pay for Pro (which is way too expensive).

title: Good app
body: I like this app a lot I think it helps me keep track of my sugar in a better and organize manner. The only thing is the reporting thing I would like to see some type of chart and an easy way to print.

title: Happy
body: I am enjoying the new app i use the omnipod pump so it keeps a lot of this data but i like the format! Love the monster, he makes it fun (using that term loosely). I am not able to separate how much is for food and how much is correction but it works. Thank you!

title: Love the reminders
body: I've tried many different logbook apps for my iPhone in the past three months and this one is looking like the winner. Love the notification.  Most features of the ones I've tried.

title: Newly diagnosed and loving this!
body: I was so overwhelmed with the diagnosis and figuring everything out to just function and this has been so great! I religiously check my sugar and immediately log it. Thank you!

title: Works nice, if you have the right meter!!
body: If you have one of the limited list of meters it works very well!! Just make sure you've chosen the right date format or it goes nuts!! As for the Logbook the health app to sync doesn't seem to work!

title: Great app
body: Still learning all the ways it helps me be honest with my self. I know the rules for diab living. I just ignore them when I want to. 👎. This little guy reminds me that I can't do that!! Keeps me honest!!❤️

title: My Doctor loves you!
body: I have type 2 and I am horrible about keeping my logs. Now I won't get yelled at every month:)

title: Great App
body: Just started using the app, and finding it is easy to use.  The support is great.  I received an email welcoming me.  Was I surprised? And thankful in this computer world there are still people there who care.  Fun app!

title: Best app for T1 Diabetics
body: With features that cover the insulin pump, this app includes every detail for BG and insulin management. Would eventually love to see an integrated nutrition guide for carb counting, etc. Totally worth the $10 for the Pro version as well.

title: Best diabetic tracking app I'v come across!
body: I'm 27, and I cannot tell you how excited I was to name my sugar monster and start completing challenges. Anything that makes this disease a little less tedious to live with is an extreme gem! :)

title: Record keeping made easy!
body: This has made life a whole lot easier since being diagnosed with type 1. Well done guys!!

title: Best app I've found
body: Having diabetes is not a fun thing to have. This app takes it and helps put some fun in it. I love the charts and averages. I like how the monster talks to you. He even wished me happy birthday! Easy to learn. Love it!!

title: Amazing App
body: Let's face it, charting your blood sugar isn't fun but it is necessary for your health. This app makes it fun and easy. I like the challenges as well as the feedback from the app. Customer support is best in class.

title: Apple Health Intergration
body: What's the point of adding the Apple Health Intergration? We can no longer keep track of our glucose levels on the Apple health app anymore! :( that's the only reason why I'm giving a three star for this update because it's pointless now. Other than that I do love using this app.

title: Thnx
body: Thank you so much for making this app so helpful it really helps with my type one diabetes thank you for making it easier on me I really appreciate it

title: Best app for diabetics
body: I love being able to track my food, what type I've eaten, and seeing how I yoyo throughout the day. I recommend to anyone who is looking for a great app for their blood sugars.

title: Wow
body: After being overwhelmed a bit with my diagnosis mySugr has helped me cope in a meaningful way. I'm getting control and it's not so bad, I can't help but feel like I owe a little bit to this great app!!

title: Excellent tool for record keeping
body: Allows each of us (husband, son, and I) to update and view on our new devices.  User friendly and cute graphics for kid/adult.

title: Excellent!!
body: I've used it a week so far and already see improvement.  Easy to use with lots of information provided.  Best of all the apps I downloaded.

title: Finally Getting Under Control
body: After months of struggling with my t1D, this app is keeping me honest with myself, and is giving me some concrete evidence to show me what's going on in my body.

title: Realy useful app
body: I like to see how the sugar levels look on the graph. And to get a report of them is great. I just think the should put an option where you can indicate if the reading is before meals or after meals.

title: I use this a lot
body: Along with diet and exercise, this app has helped me bring my blood sugars down to a good level. It's also really nice to print out and take to your Endocrynologist appointment.

title: So helpful!
body: I have been using this app for about two and a half weeks and it has helped me both maintain a good routine for diabetes care as well as fun to keep track of!

title: New guy
body: Having only recently been diagnosed with type 1 diabetes at the age of 32, I have found this app to be extremely helpful in tracking my blood sugar, insulin, and carb intake. Keep it up.

title: Just what I needed
body: This app is extremely timely for me right now. Makes it easy to track and react. Looking forward to sharing this with my doctor.

title: Nice app
body: Really nice app to keep track of my glucose, meals, activities and blood pressure. I wish I could also record my pulse. Hopefully in the future that feature will be added.

title: My sugar review
body: Love it.  It enables me to keep in tune with my numbers, but also to help my doctor keep tabs on my diabetes. The only thing I wish was available with the application is a carb counter.

title: My monster
body: Extremely helpful app that helps me keep motivated and on track.  Clever design is quick and easy to use.  Best of all I get a personal monster.

title: Couldn't be better
body: Perfect! Not one issue or complaint. This makes logs easy peasy! (Especially when your logging for a 3 year old) keep it up guys.

title: Thank you so so much!!!!
body: We love this app for our daughter. She was diagnosed right before turning 9 and before starting 4th grade! I can't think of anything different I would want in this app!!!

title: Download this app
body: I've been diabetic for 7 years and stopped logging a long time ago... This app makes it fun and easy to record all your stuff in one place!! Super. Awesome. :)

title: Super helpful app.
body: This app is the best way to monitor blood sugar ever. It makes it really easy since I always have my phone with me. Way better than carrying a log book and a pen with me.

title: Great reminders
body: It keeps up to the game on recording your blood sugar and what u are eating. With this being a free app it does a great job. Just wish I could take the pictures in this app without having to buy it. Really loving it

title: Loving the App
body: I like the app and I really enjoy the sounds from my entry.

title: MySugr App
body: I use this app to keep check my sister BG. Great app. The only thing missing is a Pulse or Heart Rate Section. Overall it's a great app. I highly recommend to anyone that checks family or themselves.

title: My sugars
body: I love this app because it helps me see my deviation, estimated A1c and how many carbs and how much insulin I am taking in. It would be nice to have a food search in order to get calories figures.

title: Best app for diabetics!
body: I love it. Keeps me on my toes and the pro version lets you record moods, scenario, before/after meals. My doctor loves the reports it generates. Highly recommend this app to anyone that wants to control DM to the T 😊

title: Great app
body: I wanted to give 41/2 stars only because my info doesn't always transfer.  This makes keeping a record of my readings so easy.  I would recommend to anybody trying to manage this disease

title: Love it
body: I love the app. Tried a few others and were disappointed. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for a tracker.

title: Great app
body: I love that I get points for tracking what I should tracking anyway. I also love the little monster's celebrations for me. I wish this app would talk to my pump and meter though.

title: New app
body: I just got this.  Looks like a secret sugar babysitter and more.  Just what I need to keep me on track. Thanks so much.  Will come back in a month to update the team.  Thanks...can't wait to get started.

title: Easy Handy Tool
body: It's easy to work and makes you aware of how your day is going. Like the fact that it asks about medications,eating and your mood.  Handy app.  And I like the little guy with the giggle! LOL

title: 5 star
body: This app has improved the way I communicate with my doctors in the best way! I would recommend it to anyone wanting to keep better records of their sugars.

title: Quick & Easy
body: Nice app, works quickly and easily, and fun to track not just your blood sugar, but many other aspects of your health. Also interfaces with iPhone health app.

title: Please fix
body: I like this app a lot but I can't download the new update? I thought it was a problem with my app, so I deleted the app and tried to re-download MySugr but it won't download. I'm betting it's a problem with the newest update. Please help!

title: Great app!!
body: The only thing that would make this app better is the ability to have more than one user without logging in and out for each person. We love it!!

title: Amazingly fun and easy
body: Newly diagnosed with Diabetes Type 2 - this app makes it fun and easy for me to keep track of my glucose readings.  The weird character changes colors depending on your reading.

title: a godsend
body: after being diagnosed, I search the App Store for fun and childish apps such as this. Give it a try. within a month of being diagnosed my a1c dropped from 8.8% to 7.5%. this app is anazing

title: What's that noise?
body: The kids came running when they heard the fun noises made by the app.

title: Dropped my A1c 3 points
body: Love this program.  I currently use it and I have dropped my A1c by 3 points.  It's got a ton of features and the point system makes it fun.  Recommend this for any diabetic!!!!

title: Great motivation
body: I've always had trouble with testing regularly, but this app has helped me be motivated and I actually am looking forward to my next Endo visit.

title: Good App for Tracking Sugar Levels
body: I really like this app as it assists me in keeping a more accurate record of my sugar levels. However, I would like to suggest that the developers allow room for the addition of medication logs.

title: Awesome
body: Love this app!💕 the reminders are awesome and I love that there is a point system for how much you log in. It encourages me to fill out everything and have things more organized.

title: Great Motivator!😃😱
body: I love this app! It really keeps me motivated to track my BGL several times a day, and thus, keep on top of my diabetes. I've been using it for a year. Also, tech support is prompt and accurate.

title: Great app
body: Makes recording what I eat and do easy. I find it very helpful in maintaining my blood sugar levels. Support was quick and efficient when I had a question. I would highly recommend this app.

title: Great app
body: I love that we can all have the app on our phones. No matter who my 12 year old is with we can log in the same place. I am interested to have more info on how the paid app works . Is it worth the $$ ?

title: Makes keeping track of your blood sugars fun!!
body: Easy to use and fun. I hate to keep track of my blood sugars so when my doctor told me I had to I freaked this app makes it easy.

title: Good App for tracking
body: Started using this app a couple of weeks ago. I'm still getting to know all the features. I have been using a different app for a long time so I have to get use to this one

title: Fantastic.
body: I use this app all day every day and love it. It helps me stay organized and informed. Highly recommended for anyone who likes to keep lots of data about their BG

title: Fantastic
body: Thank you. The APP works great. I have been type 1 for 38 years I used to keep this info on wire ring binders. Thank you for making my life easier and maybe saving a forest

title: Fun and Easy
body: I just wanted an app so that I can record my carb and sugar numbers on the go. This does just that. I also get a kick out of the monster. He cracks me up every time I enter my food.

title: Incomparable
body: This app is amazing. I show it to my non-diabetic friends, but they can't even comprehend how great it is. I've tried a bunch of other apps and everything is archaic. This app is the future.

title: Saved my life
body: Your app has changed my life I went from an a1c of 14 to 6.4.  The logging keeps you focused I tell everyone including my doctor about your app

title: Must have app
body: This app allows me to easily log my blood sugar data that I otherwise not log. It makes quick, easy and simple.

title: MySugr
body: I like the app and its many features.  However, I would like to see better graphing that would include weekly, monthly and yearly with numeric axis labels.  This would help out to see a visual trend and let me know if my dose needs changing.

title: Best Log Book Period!
body: Have tried other log books for our son and keep coming back to this one! Best features and easiest to use!!

title: Works well
body: App makes recording blood sugar enjoyable. Not presently using any advanced (paid) features. Don't yet understand the sounds (if they have meaning at all).

title: Awesome
body: I could manage my diabetes without this app.  I can show my results to my doctor and she can keep her records updated. It also warns me when I stray into bad food areas‼️

title: Great App
body: Not only does it help you keep track of important information, it provides motivation to continue tracking.

title: Great
body: The program is great compared to some others I have used in the past this has to be best one I have ever tried even the report are good for the doctors too

title: Excellent, Easy to use app
body: This app makes recording your blood sugar very easy. Easy input and produces nice reports that you can share with you doctor. Highly recommended!

title: Great app
body: We are using this app to help track my husbands BG levels and carb intake. This app makes it easier to understand how eating correctly is so important when you have diabetes.

title: Great app for diabetics!
body: This app keeps me on track.  Easy to use, view and understand.  I like the color coding based in your glucose level.  Highly recommend.

title: Love it
body: Editing my review to 5 stars. Sooo many things have been added since my last review. And now with the new bolus calculator it puts all my needs in one place as someone on MDI.  Love the app!

title: Excited
body: I am some pleased with this app.   It has a place to keep up with my out of control blood sugar.   I love that I can keep up with carbs, meals, activities and meds all in one place.

title: Great app !
body: This is a great app , it keeps me on track plus lets me know when my sugar is low and I need a little something . I'm an old lady so using it keeps me up to date too

title: So amazing and Helpful
body: My 13 year old decided she wanted and insulin pump and I told her she needs to track her numbers. This app is what she has been using and has helped her so much.

title: Great app but needs to improvements
body: This app is wonderful.  However, it needs to be able to import my BG values and activity levels from Apple HealthKit.  I shouldn't have to transfer my steps from my Fitbit to the app, it should know.

title: Rocks
body: Best app ever.  A must have for any diabetic or diabetic parent.  Not only is the app easy to use but also communication with the owners is easy and they actually respond back and do what try say.  Amazing

title: Quick and easy
body: Very easy to keep track of blood sugars. The app runs on my phone and iPad very easily. Sometimes it logs me out and won't let me log in...

title: Great
body: Exactly what I was looking for to record my daughter's bg, insulin and carbs. I don't have to carry her giant logbook around anymore and do it by hand. I would love an addition that computed her ever-changing ratio and gave proper insulin dosages for carbs consumed.

title: Great app
body: Overall it's simple to use. The free version offers a lot of features but the pro version is very tempting. Don't usually purchase apps but this one made the cut.

title: Makes trends easier to spot
body: The mysugr pro reports make it really easy to spot trends.  I'm getting ready to go on a pump and they really need to see my fluctuations.  This has really helped.

title: Easy to use!
body: Easy way to track my numbers after being diagnosed with gestational diabetes. No need to write my 4 daily results in a piece of paper.

title: Easy and fun to use!
body: Was only diagnosed with diabetes a month ago but this has made keeping track of my sugars a breeze. Very glad I found this app!

title: Amazing
body: I love this app! It's a great way to track my diabetes on so many levels and super easy to use. I really appreciate the positive vibes it puts out every time I enter info, whether good or bad.

title: Nice App
body: Does all that I need it to do and helps keep me on track. Nice graphing and reporting for my doctor. It would be nice if there was a built in nutrition calculator but it allows me to input my meals with carbs so it meets my needs.

title: Easy to use
body: Love this app. Easy to use. Putbinbyiur exercise, take photos of meals, log carbs, sync blood sugar reading. I'm learning why I have trouble at certain meals by the aggregation of the data.

title: Awesome!
body: I've tried a few companions apps and they were all terrible. This one is fun to use, I actually look forward to logging now. Thank you!

title: What a great app!
body: It is VERY easy to use and for me to check back with all of my log ins. It's quick and covers all the information I need to see what is causing my sugar to fluctuate.

title: Best Diabetic App
body: I've been using this for a couple of weeks and have been impressed with its features.  Make sure you download and use this diligently!!

title: Debbie
body: So far I like the app it is kinda fun to see your progress and I like the challenges

title: Great app!
body: I've used many programs to keep track of my Diabetes. I got to say, mysugr companion makes it fun, it also syncs so I can use my multiple devices. You should try it!

title: Useful Logging
body: Finally an app that's fun to use and easily accessible. I wish there were more challenges though- that's really what helps me remember to log.

title: Review
body: Definitely easier to track trends for better control of diabetes.  Very simple to use and takes no time at all.

title: Best app
body: This app will help you stay in control of your diabetes and on time with your meds I can't live without my app thanks for making such an awesome app for people with diabetes

title: Love it!
body: I'm an 18 year diabetic struggling with control. This app is making me aware of exactly what I'm eating and doing to be in control. I am eating better and certainly testing more often!

title: Great tool and simple to use. Would recommend it to my patients.
body: Would definitely recommend this app.

title: Great app for diabetics
body: This app lets you easily keep track of your blood sugar patterns. You won't regret downloading this. It's everything you could ask for in a diabetes monitor app.

title: Great App
body: I have been using this app to manage gestational diabetes, so I don't need a lot of the features. The only way this could be better is if you could tailor the reports to leave out info you don't need.

title: Log book
body: I love this app, it helps me when I go to the endocrinologist to see my log. Also when I log my parents can see them too.

title: Good app
body: Lots of features are available for free and helps out a lot. Has more features than I expected. Helps me stay on track

title: Really helps by teenage son
body: This app is an easy way to keep track of all the essential factors of my son's type 1 diabetes. The great thing is that even a 14 year old boy will use it.

title: Love it
body: Love the creativity and ease of using this app. I have had type 1 for over 20 years and this is the first time I have enjoyed using a tracker on a daily basis.

title: Sugar list
body: I find the app very useful to record of my sugar levels to keep me on track daily. Also good to show your doctor. Not sure what the weekly score on points are yet. Not using app long.

title: Updating the app
body: I have been trying to update this app all day and it won't let me.  I tried deleting the app and won't do that either.  It's like stuck in updating from the first time I tried updating.  HELP ME!
response: Hi! Oh sorry to hear that the download causing issues. You can try to restart your phone and try it again. If it is still not working try to sign out from app store. Then sign in and try to download again. (https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT203983) . Is it working now?

title: Great app so far for logging
body: Great app for logging. Very simple to use. Only suggestion is if it can figure out carbs based on what you type for food description.

title: This what I am talking about
body: The app is awesome!!! It keeps me in check through out the day in keeping me sugar levels on point. I highly recommend it.

title: Great app
body: I have tried several apps but this one really helps to keep me motivated. Seeing my sugars through the day and what I did helps keep me on track

title: GREAT APP
body: This is the first app I have ever reviewed. I live this app. I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and need some thing to help monitor sugar levels. This is by far the most fun and easiest way to do just that!

title: Diabetes monster app
body: I've used several apps to record blood sugar and for my needs this is the best. It's easy to use and does a great job of tracking info.

title: Great app!
body: Being a newly diagnosed diabetic, and a numbers geek I love the ability to email the data from the log book in an excel file.  It's also fun and easy to use.

title: This one is my favorite!
body: It's a drag living as a chemistry experiment so anything that makes keeping track of all the things you have to as a diabetic easier is a winner! This app does it with a sense of humor.  I appreciate it!

title: Makes this journey fun!
body: Even though this affliction is serious at least tracking your numbers can lighten the mood. Only bad point is that you can't download records without going pro.

title: Good app
body: I was previously using glucose buddy. Like this app much better. Haven't explored all of what I can do and I don't have the pro version but so far I like what I see very much.

title: Life Changing!
body: mySugr has been a truly life changing addition to my daily routine. Keeping track of my numbers used to be a chore. No longer. Live this app!

title: 12 year old kid
body: We love mysugr! As parents we love how we can track all of our daughters info. Our 12 year old daughter loves the monster and all of his cute and funny noises.

title: New way to keep a log of blood sugars
body: I love the monsters and voices . it's a new way for me to keep a log. I'm type one diabetic . this helps me a lot. Thank you very much from my heart. K.T.

title: Best app I have tried
body: I have tried several apps but by far this is the best. Easy to understand, full functionality makes nice reports for my dr.

title: Great app
body: Well as far as these apps go this is the best effort I've seen. It's got everything you need and it's layers out well. There's always room for improvement but this is pretty dang good. THE PRICE is crazy but you don't HAVE to go pro so...that's that.

title: My sugur
body: I love this app I don't to write anything down I just have to remember put in my phone it make it fun to track my numbers! This all true it a wonderful app

title: Love it!
body: This app is so useful! Can't wait to complete the challenge that gives you the pro version for free! Plus I was told this got someone free beer and I'm a fan of that, drink up friends.

title: My blood sugars
body: I really like this easy app and it actually motivates me to take and monitor my blood sugars and records he numbers.

title: mySug
body: Great way to track your blood sugars as well as your food intake. I will be able to give my doctor a more complete and comprehensive report. My thanks to the app creators.

title: FANTASTIC
body: Great tool- so user friendly.  Love the color coding.  Not techie.  Type 1 since 1956.  I get no symptoms of low blood sugar.  Entry choices easy.  I keep CALORIE KING APP next to it to try to more accurately enter # of carbs so my insulin pump can calculate Bolus of insulin at meal.  BRILLIANT CREATORS -THANK YOU!

user_name: Climbing back to the good life
title: Great Uncomplicated App
body: I looked around it a bunch of apps, and this was the only one that was not only free but simple enough to track all the basics.

title: Very cute
body: Very cute way to keep track of you numbers. Love the little monster that makes cute sounds every time you add information

title: Great app
body: Easy to log and easy to see your changes throughout the day. The logs are stored in an easy to read fashion.  Glad I switched from a different app.

title: Cute and easy to use
body: Other than the annoying noise the little thing the app is easy to use and tracks your daily, monthly + great for the user and to show at your doctor appt.

title: Awesome app
body: Love the app. Great way to keep track of my kids sugars. She likes the app it's fun and challenging her to get points keeps her entering info. Great that I can i have it linked to my phone too.

title: Works well on lots of areas
body: I have used other apps. This one seems to be inclusive for my current needs.

title: It does what it needs to do!
body: It works perfect for my needs. It tracks my progress, provide me wit a daily, weekly and monthly view. The reports are good. It does what I need it to do.

title: Offers to track everything
body: This app is so useful. I love that you can track as much or as little as I want!

title: Easy to use
body: Helps with tracking of BG, activity, and food. Keeping all this info in one place has helped bring A1c down.

title: Good app
body: Like the app has been helpful but wish had more ability to help keep track of food tracking like if have sandwich if u put in what was made with :example type of bread kind of meat and other toppings! If it could help estimate carb shuvra & calories ect.

title: Considerate
body: This app is obviously designed by someone anxious to be a user of it. It is user friendly and tracks easily. Great for all ages and levels of control.

title: Fantastic
body: I went through a phase where checking my sugar seemed like too much of a hassle, and I really let my health slack. This app actually helped me get back on the wagon. It's great.

title: Great app what else can I say
body: Greatest app here on my iPhone ! I tried others but this worked the best for me but unfortunately I can not add any add ones due to financial .

title: Essential
body: I bought the full version right away. This app is fantastic. It does everything I want in tracking and reporting

title: Love it...but
body: Great app for tracking daily readings....but new update requires poking in email address and password every time you open it. This gets old. Why not have some kind of memory on this?

title: Love this app!
body: I'm newly diagnosed as type 2 diabetes & this app is so easy to use! It really is the easiest part of this mess! It needs more tags & I wish it helped me figure out "net carbs" but still a great app.

title: Love this app
body: This is the first app I've found that I love for managing diabetes! I wish you could look at a graph of your past days BGs (not sure if that's available on pro) but I love it!

title: Awesome!
body: I love this app. Have tried others that don't let you log enough info or don't display it well. This one lets you log as much as you want and I LOVE the estimated A1C!!!

title: Great app
body: Works well. Wish when you print out results you could read descriptions better.

title: Just started
body: I am new to this but so far I really like it and think it will be very helpful. Just have to remember to enter everything

title: 31 years, Type 1
body: ...and this is the first time I've really been successful at logging over several weeks. Very easy to learn and input.

title: Awesome !!!!!!!!
body: I love this app! It's very easy to use. And you know what makes it fun entering in your numbers. Thank you guys for making this part of being diabetic easier.

title: Gator
body: Love this app. Since discovering that I have diabetes I have tried several other tracking apps, but they weren't as easy to use as this one.

title: Great!
body: Stable, responsive and very nice looking. It has all necessary features that I need, so I can quickly enter my data, or find it when it's needed.

title: Best entry screen
body: MySugr has the easiest data entry of all the apps I've tried. This makes a lot of difference to me as I can quickly and easily add my BG readings, carb intake and bolus dosing and move on.

title: Easy to use
body: I downloaded a bunch of glucose tracking apps and have since deleted the others to stick with this one.  Pun intended.

title: Tremendous help
body: What's easier than a food journal? Quick photos. Makes it so much easier to track progress.

title: Easy to use
body: Great app. Easy to use. Sent a question to the help and received an answer within a few hours.

title: Should be 4.5.
body: Outstanding! Diabetic x21 years, and I'm enthusiastic

title: Keeps me on target!
body: This app keeps you accountable to yourself.  If the features are really used, your diabetes control should get better.

title: Simple but Effective!
body: Love this app, easy to use, I love that I can go back and enter previous information, love the weekly summaries sent to my email...a few button suggestions for us pump users:"suspend", "temp basal", "shower", and "juice". Thanks for the awesome app!!

title: This app makes diabetes care manageable!
body: This app is easy and fun! I've been a type1 diabetic for 32 years and have never been this consistent with documenting my blood sugars. Thanks for making it fun!

title: Mysugar app
body: I like this app and how everything just transfers to my phone and it makes it easy to track blood sugars spikes so I can notify my doctor so he can see how my blood sugars go up high at times

title: So helpful!
body: I have been diabetic for 7 years and have struggled to log the entire time. This tool has been very helpful and fun to use.

title: A little disappointed
body: This was my go to blood sugar recorder however now you have to subscribe in order to send my blood sugars to my doctor... I liked it because it kept my attention but now that I have to subscribe in order to keep my doctor informed of what my blood sugars are, it is useless.

title: Very easy to use!
body: I love this app! It would be nice if you could print out your info to show your doctor.

title: I like it more than using a paper log
body: Easier to read the printed graphs than my chicken scratch log book.

title: Very helpful
body: This app helps me keep track of my blood sugars much easier. I'm hoping to get it more controlled by keeping track and seeing trends.

title: Fun App
body: I have been looking for an app to help me record my blood sugar numbers. I have found it easy and actually fun to use. I am remembering to test my sugar everyday.

title: Skip One Drop Meter & App 👎🏼
body: This app syncs with Accu-Chek meters. It is faster and more intuitive than the One Drop app. This app is super easy to use and helpful to keep easy to track of carbs, activity & insulin.

title: Mysugr app
body: This app is terrific. Easy to use and so much nicer than my old hand written journals. I also like the easy and quick sync to the Health app on my iPhone.

title: Absolutely perfect for me
body: This app does exactly what I wanted. I can record my blood sugar and blood pressure and export to a CSV file for my doctor, all for free. Tons of other features too.

title: MySugr
body: I like the way it connects with my glucose machine even connects better than my meter's app. I have been using 5 months still working great

title: Great way to monitor glucose levels
body: Fun and accurate way to keep track of daily glucose level.   Much better than the traditional written logs.

title: I love this app!
body: I love how easy this app is to use. I like how I can record my meals as well as my sugar readings. It so easy to just snap a picture of my monitor and it logs it for me. Thanks for the great app.

title: Great!
body: This app is wonderful for helping me to keep track of my 9 year old. It is so easy to see his trends and it's simple enough for him to use as well.

title: Funny
body: Neat app.  Makes testing more fun and the monster is very cute.  Takes a very serious problem and lightens it up. Great reminder system to check.

title: Log book
body: Great app. The only thing I got to add is, can you guys make the iOS version go to landscape view when you turn the iPad sideways

title: Awesome!
body: So I've had to write my numbers in a book and I didn't like that.  So I found this app and I've loved it! It's helped me a lot and it's just what I was looking for!

title: This app rocks!
body: I've had other apps to keep track of b/s. I love that I can take pics of what I'm eating and the graph makes it easy to see my numbers

title: Easy to use
body: Wish it would sync with the importer better

title: Awesome app
body: Very convenient to use log book.  Don't have to remember to bring a separate log book as it is on my phone

title: Satisfied Customer
body: As someone who is new to the Diabetes game, this app provided to me what I was looking for. Perhaps as I journey forward, I will find faults and failings. So far, I am pleased.

title: Great! Love it!!!
body: Newly diagnosed, tried several different apps this one is the best!!! Upgraded to pro and it got even better! Definitely worth the money! This is the best diabetes app hands down!!!

title: Looooooove This!
body: I love this app. Helps me manage my diabetes and I don't have to carry around an actual log book and pen to write it all down! It's so easy and fits in my lifestyle

title: Fun an Easy
body: I never kept up with tracking my blood sugar. But discovering this app changed everything. And my doctor loved being able to see all the details.

title: Outstanding
body: I have used several apps to monitor Type 1 diabetes for my 13 year old son.  This app is excellent and easy to use.  The monster is fun.  This is the best app.

title: Worked then didn't
body: Had this app on the light version and worked great and loved it and decided to upgrade.  Once I up graded it stopped working, called technical support and they blamed it on the Heath app connection and fitness pal even though I have no problem w my data there.  So sorry I spent 20 bucks on an app that doesn't work right...  Really like this app too...

title: Fun to use
body: This is my 3rd diabetes app and by far my favorite. Easy and fun to use. Nothing overly complicated, just simple and clear cut information and logging.

title: Fun tracker!
body: Makes tracking diabetes info a lil more fun!  I do wish you could put all food info In As well to have everything together!

title: Love it!
body: I saw that a friend of mine who is a techie and has T1 loved this app, so I thought I'd give it a try. Beats any other app I've used. Easy, comprehensive, and the developers are responsive. Thank you.

title: Luv it
body: This app ha made it so much easier for my newly diagnosed teen to keep track and for me to be able to check in on him without being intrusive

title: Does well tracking my sugar
body: Used it for about 2 months now and it does a good job tracking progress.

title: Great app!
body: This is the kind of diabetes app I have been looking for.  I track everything like I would in the little journal I keep.  The only changes I would like to see are:

title: Use it for GD
body: I needed an app to track my sugars for a gestational diabetes program.  This one is perfect.  Interface is easy and cute and the reports are just what the doctors need to assess how I'm doing.  Love it.

title: Great App
body: I recently started using this app and love it. It's easy to use and it interfaces with iPhone's Health app seamlessly so I can go to one place to see all my health related information.

title: Keep the monster tamed!
body: This app has helped me get back on track with controlling my diabetes. I use the free version and so far it has been sufficient.

title: Great
body: I am thankful for this app but at the same time I believe the premium is too expensive. I stick with the free version right now, but if the premium were cheaper or a one time charge I'd happily pay it.

title: Thank you for getting me the support
body: I love this app it has help my husband in a big way! He now looks forward to hearing the praise of being in the green! Best app ever!

title: Great app!
body: I was just recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and this app has been a great help with logging my glucose numbers.  So easy to keep track of it!

title: Mysugr
body: Works well and helps to see graph of how your sugar is. Would highly recommend. Always have it available

title: Easy and fun
body: This app is really fun to use! I love that my glucose numbers are color coded to clue me to know if it's too high or that I may need to eat a Carb less lunch.  The graphs are awesome too. A very useful app

title: Loving this app
body: I love the way this app records my numbers and tracks my carbs. I would recommend this app to my family and friends. Thank you!

title: Love it
body: Would be fantastic if it has the ability to interface with the meters

title: Would have been 5 stars...
body: Really disappointed that after using this app for a year they took away so many key features that are for those who pay the HIGH subscription costs.

title: Great way to track
body: This app is great to log values on the go. The ability to show my doctor my tracking quickly is nice.

title: Fun and Easy
body: The app is very easy to use and seeing how many points I can get is fun! I just don't like that I have to pay to get a report. I wouldn't mind if it was an option of a one time fee for each report, but a monthly fee is not feasible for me.

title: Phenomenally Helpful
body: Great help for a new diabetic looking for a way to get adjusted to the changes. Useful features, easy to use interface, and a helpful support.

title: Love it
body: Great app to track my numbers and progress it really is user friendly and I highly tell anyone this is the app to use

title: Really handy.
body: I love this app, it helps me to log my blood sugar levels and writing down what you eat and drink. Very helpful coroner since I have Type 2 diabetes

title: The best app I've tried this far!
body: Very Comprehensive. Helps me keep track of my humulog and Lantus shots as well as my diet. In the process of trying the new A1c feature. Very helpful.

title: Great app!
body: Fun, easy-to-use app. It's convenient to use, which is a good thing. If it isn't, I tend to procrastinate updating it, which eventually leads to losing interest and stopping altogether. So far, so good!

title: Very useful app
body: It is very easy to use and I love the weekly reports. I'm pre-diabetic and this helps me track my glucose levels so I can stay away from diabetes!!

title: Excellent app!
body: Thank you for a great blood sugar log app. Others I've tried were terrible. This was helps me try to control my type 1.

title: The BEST!!
body: I have tried many diabetes management apps and mysugr is by far the best!!  I haven't had this much control in years! Thank you for all that you do!!

title: Best companion ever!!
body: My recently diagnosed 5 yr olds sugars we're driving me crazy with highs and lows and this app has eased my own guilt and helped control her numbers and hypers/hypos so easily!!! Thank you !!

title: Love this app
body: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and struggled remembering to record my numbers. This app really helps. All levels in one place and easy to show to my doc. Thanks.

title: Love this app!!
body: This app makes it fun to keep track of your glucose levels. I tried several others and this one is the best. Thank you!!

title: Funtastic!
body: Great app. Love the graphs, the little monster, the food photo option, the customer service. Super. I highly recommend using this app for any diabetic.

title: Does the job
body: This app does what I need and then some.  I believe I have finally settled on this app after many years of searching.

title: Fabulous app
body: Been using this app now for a couple years. I absolutely love it and can't really think of anything to add or issues.

title: Easy to use
body: Very easy to use and issues I had were quickly addressed by tech support the same day.

title: Awesome app
body: It actually keeps me motivated to check my sugar more often and it helps me keep track of how I react to certain kinds of food.

title: Informative and easy!
body: A very well written app, that's very user friendly and very informative, even for the free version!  I won't use anything else.

title: Good aid for tracking
body: We also do blood pressure & have to add to notes as dr wants to see that trend as well. Have used for almost a month & have not learned how to do much more than tracking & notes. Haven't figured out instructions yet....

title: Great for tracking
body: Really like the app. Wish it was compatible with my meter. The one real con is the color for pictures on display. Very hard to see. If they fix contrast would be stellar

title: Best chart export
body: Love this app. My cgms has ugly charts. Tried this for its ability to get that data from apple health and show it well. Then started tracking food, activity, and finger sticks. Great, great, great!

title: Love it
body: I've always hated logging my blood sugars but this app is a lot of fun and helps me see where I can improve. I highly recommend it.

title: Love this app
body: Just got diagnosed with pre diabetic and pre hypertension. This app keeps up with both. I can right in what I have eaten or if I'm fasting. Great way to keep a record of your health.

title: Solid
body: The more you put into it, the more it gives you back.  It's very easy to access and use.

title: Great App
body: This App has really helped me keep up with my sugars.  I'm new to this, so I'm still learning about type 2 diabetes and also my way around this App.

title: Great app!
body: Very easy to use to keep track of my blood sugar readings. Allows me to document all the necessities that my doctor wants to know all in one place.

title: Great app if I could sync iPhone again.
body: Great app with so much information to be collected. My iPhone was synced but now it isn't and I can't get it to re-sync. Can't find out how to contact the app authors for   support.

title: A fun yet confusing app
body: This tries to turn diabetes into a game.  Logs and options are confusing.  The pro version syncs but there is no iPad app, so it will sync between my two phones?  Cute and fun but needs to be easier

title: Great!!
body: I have tried several apps for tracking my diabetes. This is the best so far. Easy to use and understand. Keep up the great work

title: Useful!
body: This app has made it so much easier to track my bloodsugars and its easy to see how you've been doing. I love this app!

title: Great App
body: Recently diagnosed with type two diabetes. This app is great to help you log your daily sugar levels.  And you can take pictures of your food so you can remember what you had. Great job great app

title: Happy kid
body: My daughter was experiencing diabetic burnout and not wanting to do the work anymore.  Using this app has her motivated to manage again thanks to the built in rewards tracker.

title: Useful
body: It keeps me focused, on target and motivated. I think it's one of the easiest apps do you use for diabetic's. Thank you for all your hard work.

title: Fun and easy to use
body: Using it to track gestational diabetes. Easy to input meals (using MyFitness Pal to get carb info) and glucose levels. And great export tool to share with my diabetic educator every week.

title: You'll wonder why you ever kept a paper logbook!
