body: Easy to use, fun! Very helpful for monitoring your progress and keeping notes! Download now!

title: Love
body: I use this to keep track of my son's blood sugar. Just wish you could download the PDF on the free version but I'm willing to upgrade.

title: Great Help!
body: I was just diagnosed with type 2. This app lets me keep track not just of my glucose level but weight, meals, and so much more. It even makes it fun.

title: Love it!!
body: I'm 15 and this app is helping  me to take control of my T1D!! I've been struggling with it since I was 4 and this just makes it so much easier to do!:)

title: Cute App!
body: Makes pricking my finger in the morning a little more enjoyable with that cute monster and the little noises that he makes! Keep up the good work!

title: So far so good
body: I've tried many apps for tracking glucose and also insulin, this is this only one I've even remotely liked

title: Great app!
body: Very easy to use.  Very convenient!  I was writing my blood sugars down in a notebook and then transferring to spreadsheet to show my doctor! Now I can just do one step!

title: Love this app
body: Especially like that I can use either my iPad or IPhone and access the same data.  Totally worth the cost!

title: My sugar is awesome
body: I love this app!  I love how it can predict my a1c! The little monster is adorable and I love to enter my numbers now for tighter control! New year and new attempt to have lower a1c numbers!

title: Love it!
body: This app has really helped me in tracking my blood glucose. Keeping track of numbers can be a pain, but this app has really helped me. Love it!

title: Amazing
body: Makes logging so much easier. It also adds an element of competition, helping me to try to do better. Love it!

title: Awesome sauce ❤️😍😘
body: This is my favorite app. For my blood sugar of course but I even want to check my blood sugar. I love ❤️ this app and I hope everyone that has diabetes gets this app too!❤️❤️❤️

title: No glitches
body: Works well with no glitches.  My doctor likes the fact that I can get monthly and 90 day averages.

title: Nice!
body: Works well, but seems to be missing a few things that I think are needed: BP log and body weight. Might just be me, but I'd like those features. Otherwise, it's easy, fun and informative!

title: Easy to use
body: Very easy to use, have to track for three months for insurance purposes, makes reporting easy.

title: Pro Not Worth the Cost!
body: The app itself is good enough but I upgraded because I wanted to get my a1c. Now I realize it wouldn't be as accurate as when the doc takes it but I felt it would be decent. Well, unless you take your sugar 3x a day it's just a logbook. I regret the almost $30 I spent. Lesson learned

title: Great App- I just need more reminders
body: I love the app! I just wish I had more reminders!

title: Great app!
body: This app has helped me to get my blood glucose under control. It's easy to see the relationship between diet and exercise and sugar levels.

title: I log everyday
body: I was forgetting to take my blood sugar, but since using this app, it has become part of my morning routine.

title: Get This App!
body: Love love love this app. Totally alleviates a lot of the anxiety I feel towards my type 1 diabetes. It's also makes a fun competition against myself to keep my a1c in check!

title: I love my cute monster
body: I'm finally getting my diabetes control and my little monster brings some cheer to this serious disease for me. Thank you.

title: Great app
body: Just diagnosed with Type 1 at 38...love the app helps me keep track of everything - the paid subscription is worth it for the reports generated.

title: Wonderful!
body: This is a wonderful and entertaining app to keep track of your blood sugar. Too bad it doesn't have a companion that will give information to your Apple Watch.

title: Best App!
body: I have spent a lot of time and a fair amount of $ looking for the right app for my glucose tracking. I stumbled upon this and boy am I glad I did!  Best 10 bucks I have spent!

title: Amazing
body: Whether you've had diabetes for days or years this app is amazingly helpful for both yourself and your drs. Thanks mySugr team you're the best!

title: Just what I was looking for
body: Love this app. It very clean and easy to use. Great for all ages. The challenges are a really cool feature as well as the points system.

title: Very useful!
body: Very useful, helps you take back control of your diabetes! Great user interface and the graphs help you really keep track!

title: Helpful
body: Great and helpful. Being newly diagnosed I wish it allowed more detail about what foods you're eating/drinking to better keep track on a larger scale of what is triggering.

title: mySugr
body: I was enjoying the app with only a few lacks (no way to track TDDs, only able to see one day of the graph at one time, etc), but I signed up for the GoPro challenge and it hasn't logged any of my work. I always meet the 50pt minimum and the challenge isn't registering any of it. Frustrating.

title: Great App!
body: This app is amazing I'm able to keep track of my blood sugar levels and show them to my doctor every time I visit him

title: Love love love
body: This app is great. It allows me to watch for trends and also put everything I do on the app so I can tell what could have deviated my blood glucose. It is super helpful in maintaining a good a1c!!

title: Super Buggy
body: I used this app a while back and it seemed to work fine. Just recently came back to it and it's extremely buggy. It always freezes for 3-5 seconds for everything you do and is super annoying. Also the syncing with Health app is weak because data is only partially there. It is really disappointing.

title: Fantastic
body: Does exactly what I need it to do, and the points always make me feel extra proactive fit logging my meals too

title: Two thumbs up!
body: This app not only helps me keep track of my diabetes, but also motivates me to do better! I love this app and so glad it was released in the U.S.

title: This is a great app!
body: Great app. Very user friendly. It has everything the type 1 needs to successfully log their blood readings, food, and insulin. Love this app!

title: Easy
body: This app is so easy to use and also fun! I love adding all of my information and seeing it charted out and all organized! Thanks guys!

title: So far so good
body: Great using for logging in my husbands blood sugar. We will see next Dr. appointment.

title: Very Helpful
body: Even if just using basic functions it is very helpful for tracking.

title: Perfect for the job
body: This app has been very helpful to our family as we help our son with his Type I diabetes.

title: Great Ap!
body: Helps me keep track of my BGs and estimated HGA1Cs. I haven't used the other features yet, but am looking forward to see what else it can do!

title: Fun with great graphics n reports vet
body: This app is easy to use and I can put in lots of detail. The reports are also well done and very informative.

title: Great !!!
body: Easy to document BG, carbs, corrections among other things. It also puts in perspective where your peeks and valleys are throughout the day! I have lowered my a1c since using this app!

title: Almost perfect
body: The only complaint I have is minor--I wish my Fitbit app could import my sugar log. Otherwise, this little app is aces.

title: Great program!
body: I have been using this app for about a month. It is very helpful. It is linked to other apps which is great!

title: Best Logbook App Out There!
body: So easy to use, and I love being able to export my numbers in a simple to read logbook c: I recommend this to any diabetic, type 1 or 2!

title: Best Free App
body: Even without subscription this app gives me my 7 day average and helps me see the small things that effect my blood sugar

title: Excellent app
body: The mysugr logbook helps me to remember to test and gives me easy access to see how I'm doing. It's user friendly, easy to use and fun.

title: Couldn't live without this!
body: This has made my life easy, organized, and efficient!

title: Great for on go!
body: I love using this app! They have great features for me to review my logs while I'm on the go! I'm using a log consistently for the first time thanks to my monster!!

title: Awesome app!!!
body: I love this app it has helped me with the big picture A1C with the estimate it gives if I have a few highs or lows I can see how it changes the number.

title: Very helpful
body: Very simple and helpful. Not only does it keep track of my sugar levels but it also keeps me motivated to stay on a healthier diet

title: Monster App!!!
body: This app is what I've been looking for the past 10 years! It makes managing my diabetes so much easier.

title: Easy to record my stats
body: Great to use for record keeping of my sugar levels and carbs eaten I can then show my doctor.

title: Fun, informational app
body: Easy and fun to use. Much better than logging data in a booklet. The analysis feature is great to see trends on a month to month basis.

title: Nice App
body: I have been using this App for about a month now. It's an ok App but I wish it would get my address or home location right. Depending on what area of my home I get a different address every time. It keeps a good record of my results.

title: Can't live without this app!
body: Just got diagnosed with Diabetes and found this app to track it...I absolutely love every aspect of it! Can't live without it!!!

title: In love with this app!
body: I've been T1 diabetic for 29 years and this app makes my life way more fun to track my blood sugars and carbs. Would absolutely  recommend

title: 5 star app!
body: Great app! I may not always have a pen and paper handy, but I always have my phone nearby. Makes tracking my blood sugar a breeze.

title: Absolutely love this app!!!
body: Love this app. So easy to use, so many great features, so many options of what to track, and I love the report you can print out. LOVE IT!!

title: Best app ever
body: Highly recommend using this! Easy to put information in and keep track! Love it!

title: Needs better graphing
body: I have type two diabetes. I control it using diet and exercise. It would be very useful to me to show blood sugar rising or hopefully decreasing overtime not just during the day but over weeks and months.

title: Good but needs some improvement
body: App is very useful and easy to use. There are however too many fields for my taste. I would like a way to limit the fields shown.

title: Great app!
body: Its helped me track everything easily after just being diagnosed. Even my doctors are impressed

title: Great App
body: Found this app and started using it. Very easy to use love the convenience of it and like the comparison's which are helpful for my doctor and me,  great app

title: Love this app!
body: Easy to use, but wish I could link to something like MyFitnessPal to track all my food

title: Great App!
body: Super great and easy to use. Has really helped me keep track of my diabetes and my doctors love that I can email reports right from my phone

title: Great App!
body: Able to log everything in one app and run reports. Glad I bought it. Also syncs with health app. Recommend this app.

title: Fun & Clever
body: Having fun while tracking. Gotta feed re monster. Love the emails of support and ways to use the app beyond just plugging in numbers.

title: The only way I track
body: This app is so helpful. It's the only way I track my BS throughout the week. It is beyond helpful and fun. I also use it with the T1Ds I babysit!

title: Sad
body: Not Clearly Stated in the description: You must create a login to use.  Reading the privacy statement fully gives the impression that any and all data entered may/will be uploaded to the developer.  It appears that no one can create a usable app that does not have first and foremost as its primary function to be a data miner.  This is just getting ridiculous!

title: Excellent easy data entry and reporting
body: Love it for how easy it is to enter bsg results and meals and activity. Reports and visual tracking helps me understand what helps and harms my bsg goals.

title: Right on target
body: I find that this app is user friendly and keeps me right on track.

title: Kills the battery
body: I LOVE the features of this app, but man does it eat the battery. I had it open for 8 minutes (on screen) and it used 32% of my battery. By comparison, Music was open 4.4 hours, and it used 50. Fix the battery issues, and I would be a subscriber for life!
response: Hi there! Thank you for your feedback! So sorry to hear that you are having problems with our app. It should not consume battery like this. Please contact us at support@mysugr.com. We would love to help you out 💚

title: Pretty great!
body: So far so good. I've been using the app for about a week. I love the graph and averages and being able to log food, bolus, basal and activity info!!!

title: Like the idea
body: I really like the idea behind the app but I'm not sure or maybe I haven't taken the time to fully understand it.

title: Love, love, love!!!!
body: This app has it all!  Liked its I much I purchased a year subscription after less than a weeks use!

title: Great app.
body: Very easy to use. I showed this app to my Doctor and he liked it and plans to share it with other patients

title: Great app
body: Love the features of this app, I can log my blood glucose and carbs, correction doses, meal times etc. I like the chart also to see my trends. I'm able to see how many hypo and hyper. It's a like to like about this app

title: Great app
body: Great app and very easy to use. I wish it had more features for insulin pump use. Would also be great to have more reports.

title: Great app

title: LIAR LIAR PANTS ON FIRE!!!
body: They are NOT a class 1 medical device. They have a 501k exemption and are therefore UNCLASSIFIED with the FDA.
response: Thank you for your concern. Because the app is connected to the mySugr cloud right away and the data isn't saved only locally to the device, the user must create an account so that we can properly associate the data to the right user and the password keeps it locked safely away. Here is a link to help you understand data privacy and security within the app. https://support.mysugr.com/hc/en-us/articles/203892086-Is-my-data-safe- . Fell free to reach out with any other questions or concerns.

title: Wonderful app!  Needs 10 stars
body: I love this app. I've been type 2 for over 10 years and have tried a lot if different logs. This one is the best by far. For the past two years I resorted to an excel worksheet out of frustration with other apps. One of my coworkers overseas recommended this one and I'm extremely pleased. I downloaded the free version and immediately upgraded to the pro version. I have a form of diabetes that is hard to control with large swings in my bg levels; as a result I test about 7 times per day. It's easy to enter data into the log and I love scrolling through the pictures to see what I did right or wrong. I also like staging my food pics to see where I've been during the day. I have an extremely hectic job that is fun but makes me likely to quickly forget that I'm diabetic. The mysugr team responded quickly to my emails and I haven't had any issues with the app loading. After about 4 weeks of usage I find I am logging more now than I did in the first week. Since I started using the app I have had a significant reduction in the number of high values (only 2) and low values (none too low) which is awesome considering I started about a week before  the devils holiday , aka Halloween. My family likes to pick up my phone and scroll through the pictures; they are also big fans. We now have more constructive discussions about how my day is going, which is great. My sons want to find an app like this for non-diabetics. Even the little monster is starting to grow on me. The mysugr team has some improvements to do on the nutritional aspects, but overall I agree with the other reviewers, this app is a life saver.

title: Great
body: This app is wonderful. 5 year old daughter is Type 1. We found ourselves needing to remember what she had eaten in the last few days, up to a week prior and couldn't recall. This app lets you put food entries and so much more. It has helped us to keep up with her changing insulin needs just by logging her meals, carbs and correction amounts. She uses a pump and we are able to correct by 0.025. The only complaint I have about this app (and why I gave the app 4 stars instead of 5) is that when I go to log the app the correction her pump says for her food/high, I can only put two decimal places instead of the three that the pump does. Currently, I just put a note on the entry that says if she was given a correction that ends with a 5. The way the app does it right now isn't an issue if, for example the pump gives her a 1.250U correction; I just put it in the app as is. But, if she gets, for example, a 1.225U correction instead, I have to make a note on the entry to clarify that she got the .225U correction, not just .220U. Other than that small hiccup, it's fantastic and wonderful and we love it. We don't let her use the app herself because she can't read yet but she watches us do the entries and we let her poke her diabetes monster. In time, we're going to teach her to use it since she'll be starting school this coming August. We plan to use it and have the school nurse, and possibly teachers, use the app to help us track her diabetes while she's at school. I find the diabetes monster noises particularly cute, myself. There is a kid version of the app which we have fiddled with a bit. She will probably use that instead of this one when she is a bit older but still. It's a great app. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with diabetes. In fact, I have to my aunt who is Type 2. :)

title: Do not pay for membership
body: I got this membership hoping it would be a better platform than my freestyle libre. The testing kit/ starter kit accu check is cheap and terrible and is not worth the 49.00 a month. It constantly has connection issues and when letting support know of the issue constantly they just keep informing me to reset Bluetooth. And requiring customers to commit for three months is insane considering issues with my accu check began within the first three weeks. Stay away I only use this to log sugars from my libre.

title: The ultimate app
body: It easily links to the Apple Health iPhone

title: Cool beans
body: Cute.simple. Has area I can add when I’m taking other meds or like note to self. I don’t plan on buying anything from the upgrades however there are many I’d suggest - to keep tight on documentation and details. 35 been diabetic 25 years and I use an insulin pump, so I use the corrections dosage area as well as food insulin. Pretty cool app - I’m a no, I don’t want to waste my data space person however I don’t feel I’ve wasted space or time with this app and yes I suggest using it. It does give me something to look forward to while I’m in the hospital and I think it would encourage diabetics to keep track of their insulin and BG and we do need encouragement that isn’t annoying. Cool beans :)

title: Don’t get this app
body: Don’t get this app if you want to print out your data to send to a doctor. The fee for pro is 49.00 per month — which is the only way to print your results :(
response: Thank you so much for your review! The $49 is for our Bundle subscription which does include lots of goodies - but there is also an option to export a report for free even with our basic subscription! Feel free to write to us in support and we can help guide you with how to export one!

title: Not worth the effort
body: There is no telling how many people like me will delete the app because to activate it you receive a code to your email address.  I asked it to send the code to two different emails about six times each and never received an email.  Yes, I checked the spelling of the email address each time, and that is not the issue.  The issue is a glitch in the app.  Unfortunately, no one from the developer checks to make sure the app is working, and there is no way to contact the developer to let them know it screwed up.  So, save your time and energy and find another app that works when you install it.
response: I am so sorry you're having difficulties signing up for the mySugr app Rhonda! If you're checking your email on your phone, can you be sure to refresh the inbox you're sending it to? If you've already done that, please feel free to write to us at support@mysugr.com and we'll get on the case for you!

body: My sugar is great but it needs a bar code scanner  and connected to a list of foods for g counts. It’s too much trouble  going back and forth to one drop to scan and write down carbs for different foods and then go back to my sugar to log them.

title: Larry KLIPP
body: 09/28/2020:  Tried for two days .  Log did not record pre-supper glucose.  Would not record next day pre- breakfast.  Useless unless logging made easy to find where to enter and visible.  As is, useless.

title: So helpful and so easy to use!!!
body: At first I really didn’t put the time into seeing how much you can do with this app until my Glucose Numbers we’re running 200-300. In a few weeks of really tracking all that I can my Glucose numbers are beginning to stabilize.  Im amazed at how simple this is to use and the knowledge I’ve gained from it is endless and I believe for me potentially life saving. I love that you can customize your fields but I do wish with that you could also add fields personal to just you.

title: Mysugr
body: I love the app.but I wish there was a way to record my weight and my boos pressure

title: Not Pairing
body: My meter is recognized but when it come time to enter the pin code from my meter into the app, it keeps saying connection error. Had the same issue with ACCU-CHEK’s own app. Spent 30-40 min getting it paired. I don’t want to go through that again.
response: Hi 🙂 I am sorry to hear that. Please contact our support via support@mysugr.com - we are happy to help 💚

title: Update not good
body: Ever since the update came out my meter will not pair with my the app. It lets me go through the motions but when I hit enter code it freezes. Then it says it could not connect.
response: Hi Dianxae! Thanks for your message. We are really sorry that the meter won't pair. Please contact our Customer Support Heroes through support@mysugr.com - they will be happy to hear from you and help you. 😊

title: Sugar.
body: Dr. Is impressed with my sugar values.i am not on insulin either.This is an awesome feeling.

title: MadMc44
body: I like the program I like the idea of not being accountable to anyone other than myself

title: Love the simple to use
body: I love my sugar app the simplicity to track pretty much everything. I like the color code that give clear visibility

title: My Monster’s Story Deux
body: Like I had said in my first review I like this app.It really helps to see how you’re doing in trying to manage your diabetes day to day.Good app and keep up the good work .

title: Learning
body: This is a good app for me.I am just learning how to enter my data.When my meter arrives it should be a big help to me. So far I am enjoying my experience. Thanks Pappy

title: Reliable
body: Reliable

title: No code
body: I have asked for the code to be sent and resent at least 10 times.  I have re typed my email address several times.  I have checked my spam as well.  Ver disappointed.
response: So sorry to hear that you are having problems signing up! Please contact us at support@mysugr.com. We would love to help you out 💚

title: My Suhr
body: This is a good app but everything you want costs something it is not practical.This is a good
response: Hi there, thank you for your review! We have both a free basic mySugr app and an upgraded PRO version. Please contact us at support@mysugr.com if you want to know more about the different versions. We would love to answer any questions you might have 💚

title: My go to diabetes app
body: I found this app through sheer luck. I had a blood meter as provided by my insurance. It came with the Pro version of this app for free. Since, my insurance has changed meters and I liked it enough to pay for a Pro myself. I can keep the majority of my info in a single location. It works well with Apple Health and Google fit. Performs and looks the same between both Android and Apple. I know as I recently switched due to company requirements.

title: Does not work!
body: Cannot access the app. It doesn’t send the confirmation email with auth code.
response: So sorry to hear that you are having problems signing up. Sometimes the verification email ends up in the spam inbox. Please take a look there or order a new email in our mySugr app. If you have any problems or questions, please contact us at support@mysugr.com. We would love to help you 💚

title: Good job
body: Good job

title: Does not work
body: The app stopped working after two days. It was reinstalled. Device was recognized but won’t allow pairing code to be entered. Customer support was contacted. Absolutely worthless! No support whatsoever. They never responded. Then they sent an email after two weeks that said the ticket was closed and marked “problem solved.” This company should be ashamed of itself! Deserve less than one star!!!
response: So sorry to hear that you are having problems with the connection and reaching us. Sometimes our email ends up in the spam inbox, please take a look there. When it comes to the connection, very often there are just a few settings that needs to be done. Please contact us at support@mysugr.com. We would love to help you out 💚

title: Not truly free
body: This is not free it miss leads you to think it’s free but it will cost you $39.00. Once you download you get your free log after you pay $$. On a fixed income have to look at everything.
response: Hi Eaglewarr there is a free version of the app, as well as a subscription for our the mySugr bundle. The mySugr Bundle is $39/mo, but it's much more than unlimited test strips. You also get a starter kit that includes a BG meter, lancet device, extra lancets in addition to the app (synced BGs, estimated A1c, digital logbook, printable PDF reports, and much more) PLUS unlimited access to a Certified Diabetes Health Coach at the push of a button to help in between doctors visits.

title: Dino502001
body: Great app easy to use
response: Thanks so much for the positive review! We love the reports feature too :)

title: Helpful app
body: Helpful app— better than logging on paper. Multiple users can use if username and password is shared for app. The only entry missing is for Dexcom users who may want to manually document a trend but there is a place in notes to type freely and the Dexcom graph can be superimposed via download. The accucheck glucometer works well wirelessly so far.
response: Thanks for the positive review!! It's so much better to not lug around a logbook anymore :)

title: Greatest app!
body: Easy to use; and I use multiple meters. Here it is all in one place that I can print for my doctor or even myself. See trends, meals, make comments, track BPs and other stats too. Have used android and os versions-both good. Premium services are affordable and helpful offering printable reports, graphical representations and online courses. Worth it!
response: Thank you so much for the positive review! We are so happy to hear our app has been so helpful for you.

title: Expensive
body: Nice app and great equipment provided. $39.00 a month is a bit expensive. Before I was getting my supplies through Medicare without charge. Not sure I want to keep paying this per month.
response: Hi, thank you for the review. We hear you that the cost is a bit much and we wish we were able to offer the Bundle at a lower price, unfortunately that is not an option right now. We hope you will consider using our product still and we thank you for you feedback.

title: Best BG app in the store
body: This app is the best BG tracker in the store. It connects to Health.app and my doctor loves the detailed reports. If you do 3 sticks per day for a week, it will also calculate your A1C.
response: Hi! Thank you so much for the positive review :) we are so glad to hear you (and your doctor!) have been so happy with our app.

body: G
response: Thank you for the positive review!

title: No email
body: Never even could get an email with a code
response: Hi, we are so sorry to hear you ran into this issue. Please reach out to our support team at support@mysugr.com and we will be more than happy to help get you started.

title: Log book
body: Works well. Takes a bit of work to catch up if you miss a week while in the hospital.

title: Christian 11112222
body: Ok
response: Thank you for the great review!

body: Excellent.

title: Excelente
body: Excelente app para diabéticos, pero, me encantaría una versión para iPad.

title: Excellent app
body: Fun
So far so good

title: Marca error y no abre
body: Marca error no abre

title: Buena app
body: Muy buena app me ayuda mucho a llevar un orden con mi diabetes

title: If they'd only add...
body: I've been using the mysugr app for a loooong time & improvements ARE added here & there. I do wish they would not focus solely on IOS for the improvements. I've asked about Android & was told "maybe down the road". V. Disappointing. I had to go back to iPhone for last big roll out 🙁.

title: Fabulous App
body: Easy to use, gives 7-14-30-90 day average also A1c estimate.

title: Pdt060776
body: Awesome app

title: Makes diabetes management do-able!
body: This app has made a world of difference. I didn't know how to manage it before, but now I can see where I've been and where I'm going with dosing my insulin.  It makes keep track for my MD a snap.  Thanks for making it so user friendly, not to mention a cute user interface. ;)

title: my Sugr Review
body: I have been using this app since last spring and I like the up to the minute info it gives me each time I use it! I enjoy the weekly updates that are sent on my email and they help me make decisions too. I was able to print from my IPhone for my MD last spring but since then I have not been able to.

title: Works for me
body: I find this app helps my track and therefore lower my A1c. Was in low 9s in January. I am now in low 6s. Only difference is tracking it all in one place and therefore doing what I should. I track my time walking and walk 2 - 4 miles a day syncing with Apple health. Tracking carbs and looking for 100 - 150 a day. Monitoring bg levels 3 times a day. I have type 2 and the awareness has made the difference.

title: Recently diagnosed with type 2
body: Love this app! Having just recently been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes I struggled with tracking my levels, meals, exercise, and understanding their connection.This app has simplified the process for me and I can see what is & isn't working for me very quickly and adjust accordingly.

title: Nice app
body: For obvious reasons I need to keep track of my blood sugars for my doctors reference.so far I've been happy with the ease and functions. I do wish I could see a report with all of my numbers kind of in a spreadsheet form. I understand in the premium version there is something like this that you can export to an email form.

title: Just started
body: My doctor hit me with a sarcastic comment about my A1c and it hit a nerve this time. I needed a app to help me keep track of my blood sugars on a daily basis. I can't wait to record my blood sugar each time I take it and can see how my eating affects it. I'm still learning how this app works. Will update in a few weeks after my next a1c.

title: $35.88 per year
body: I went to the search option & all these colorful icons appeared. I thought this looks great. Icon after icon I tapped read "This is a Pro Feature!" I googled the cost of the Pro feature;$2.99 per MONTH!  Not a one time charge or yearly charge, it's a MONTHLY fee that adds up to just under $36 a year. I'm removing this app after the review and downloading a simple diary app.

title: Very Disappointed
body: mySugr was very disappointing.  I downloaded the free version just after my diabetes diagnosis.  It came with very little details of operation, so it took me several hours to figure the basic operation and a week later I was still figuring out the many nuances.  I was shocked by the cost of the “pro features”: $2.99/mo. or $27.99 for the year.  I was excited with mySgr because it touted an “estimated HbA1c.”   So, I poked my fingers 3x/day for 7 days to get 21 BG readings.  When I then selected the HbA1c with all those reading, the app gave me an alert that it was only available in pro features.  Nowhere did it specify that Est. HbA1c was only available in pro features.  I went back to the app description at the App Store and reviewed that.  It listed “Features/Add-ons” but did not clarify which Features/Add-ons were part of the paid version.  Even in the intra-app “logbook manual” describing Est. HbA1c, there was no mention of it being a pro feature.   I felt deceived.  Seven days of sticking my fingers to then find out that I was misled.  I was so furious I finally just quit using the app and found other means to track my readings like the Apple Heart App.  Also, I didn’t care for the childish animation, badges, and sound effects.  I am deleting this app.

title: Great app! Very helpful!
body: The app is easy to use. I can see all the results in one page. The report feature makes it easy for me to just click and send it to my doctor. Thank you!

title: Very Useful
body: Excellent app for tracking blood sugar rates and meds. Recommend highly. Update 11/6/14 lowered rating was a 5 but lately I have had to resign in occasionally when I go to log. They need to fix it. UPDATE: I deleted the app because of the issue had before and they updated the app and I reinstalled it and added new features and it works great. Changed my rating to 5 stars.

title: Great app
body: Best app ever! I have had type 1 for 18 years now and I hate keeping up with log books and everything else that my dr wants now there is an app that does it for me and I can send it to my d-team .

title: Good App‼️
body: Easy to use information in front of you.Helps in letting you know how many carbs you have eaton and what type of food.

title: Love
body: Love this app! Makes tracking my blood sugar levels for my MD easier than ever, and fun! The ability to print out a report for my appointment is the best!!

title: Good app.
body: My son (8yrs old) has Type 1 diabetes. He enjoys this app. He like the monster. He wishes that the monster would upgrade when he gets over 50 pts a day.other than that I like it.

title: Great app!
body: Has been a life saver!  Wonderful tool for tracking for patient and great way for MD to see how things are going....

title: Fantastic App with great Customer Support
body: I’ve been using this app consistently now for almost a year, which is by far the longest I’ve gone with any health monitor or journal, even my old paper ones.  It really does encourage you to keep using it and help you visualize trends and lower your blood sugars.

title: Simple app for recording blood sugar
body: This app will do a lot more than let you enter blood sugar, but that is all I use it for.

title: Worst age rating ever!!!!😱
body: I am a diabetic but it has a bad word.In Mysugr go pro it says keep on kicking a**!So change the rating for goodness sake!!Otherwise a toddler will say it probably.So change IT!

title: Review
body: It's a good app to keep track of your daily glucose levels. It's good for general record-keeping. The sounds are annoying and not too relevant. The logo is creepy as well. However, the app does a good job of letting you know what your glucose levels are and what they have been. Just eat more fiber and watch it go down. @drwashing

title: Get the pro, you'll love it!
body: Great app to log your BGs and keep you logging. The PDF report is a great summary of your DM management. It's easy to read, visually appealing and can be emailed to your MD. Thank you for making a great tool!

title: Review
body: It's the best app out there just wish it had a insulin calculator.... Should add to this since the app is 19.99

title: This app is super helpful!
body: This app is a fun way to track ur diabetes! Get the pro version it's a little expensive 19.99 but ur health is worth it!!

title: So helpful!!!!
body: I just got diagnosed with gestational diabetes in my third trimester of pregnancy. You can imagine how hard it is to learn all the diabetes stuff while being completely exhausted and 8 months pregnant. This app has really mad it easy for me. The reminders are good so I don't for get and it's so handy to have at every doctor appointment! I even told my nutritionist about it and she loved it too and is going to recommend it to other patients!!!! I also think it's great they have a junior version for kids!!! I paid for the full app and I feel like $19.99 was worth it! Plus the support team is really on top of answering any questions you have.

title: Priceless
body: I recently took in an insulin dependent Type 1 foster kid. She didn't come with instructions! She was removed from last home for medical concerns and her numbers were all over the chart. This app has been priceless in helping me track everything and work on getting her numbers in check. The charts have allowed me to communicate with the school nurse better, and once I can finally get a doctor appointment scheduled we can analyze her trends! I started with the free version, but quickly upgraded to the paid version. This app is easy enough for the both of us to use. We both have it downloaded on our phone and as long as you log in with the user ID you do not need to pay the upgraded amount for each device. Just a one time payment of $19.99.

title: A.MA.ZING
body: This app is perfect. It makes me want to log my numbers everyday and now I don't have to write my numbers down. It's now all in my phone.

title: Sweet app!
body: for a not so sweet problem.

title: Lost all my data!!
body: $20 app lost all my data, wouldn't sync to web, then after paying for the $20 update the app lost my pro status!!

title: Great App-Now want the Pro!
body: Love this app, but wish I can get the pro! For 19.99 it just seems a little too pricy. If it was 9.99, i think i'd buy it. Overall really helpful though! I love the challenges!

title: Best App ever !
body: This App has made my life 100000X easier. It's made keeping track of my blood sugar fun and easy! It's seriously the best App I've ever downloaded. Every diabetic needs this app!

title: Misses the mark
body: This probably could be a good app, but falls short on two very important fronts. Carb ratio only goes up to 1/20. Sorry, my son has not been 1/20 since he was 10! That is just crazy and not sure why they would limit that so low.

title: Best Diabetic App out
body: I tested about 12+ apps and this was the best diabetic app out there. This app is awesome. I use this app with my fitness pal, it's like a match made in heaven.

title: LOVE THIS APP!!!
body: This app helps me to remember to check my blood sugar. Love it even more that they dropped the subscription yearly fee of $19.99, and have just a flat fee to go PRO. Even better, I just got it for half price!!!
